11.content: what girl from the original series do we go with?
11.title: Original

12.content: who from yu-gi-oh gx do we go with
12.title: GX

13.content: Choose your girl to pick up from
13.title: 5d’s

131.content:
"My deck is too bright for your shadows." Misaki quips as she draws her card.

Misaki: 11 SC
Ren: 6 SC

"First, I'll use the effect of Speed World 2. Now since I have the Summon Speeder speed spell in my hand, I can remove ten speed counters to destroy one card on the field. Now say goodbye to your Archfiend." She continues as Ren's only monster is swallowed up in a bright light.

Misaki: 1 SC

"Looks like Misaki made use of that huge speed lead. Now Ren is without his Skull Archfiend, which means battle effects are back in play." The announcer reminds the crowd.

"Next I'll summon Wattpheasent in attack mode." Misaki continues.

WP: 1000 ATK

"And since its a thunder monster, Wattcannon fires again."

Ren: 1800

"This is it folks. If both those monsters land their hits, then Ren is out of the running. Can nothing stop this electric combo?" The ref continues.

"Wattpheasent, attack Ren directly."

"Not so fast. I have my face-down, Defense Draw. Now all battle damage from this attack becomes zero and I get to draw a card."

"Well I still have Wattcobra. Attack him directly."

Ren: 800

"And since Wattcobra inflicted direct damage to you, I can add another 'Watt' monster to my hand, and this time it'll be Wattberyx. That's it for my turn."

"Ren barely held on this time. The question is, can he do it again?" The announcer questions.
131.title: Bring Down the Beast

1311.content:
“Time to find out.” Ren draws.

Ren: 7 SC
Misaki: 2 SC

“First off, since it’s my standby phase, I can special summon my Dark Nephthys from graveyard thanks to his effect.” Ren said.

“Hold it. I play the trap card, Wattcancel. By discarding my Wattberyx, this trap will negate the summon of a monster you’re trying to bring out. Nice try.” Misaki said.

“That was my one shot. Damn it! Okay. I play the trap card, Escape from the Dark Dimension. This lets me get back one removed from play Dark monster. So I’ll choose my Great Majiu Garzet.” Ren said.

GMG: 0 ATK

“Next, I’ll summon out my Shadowpriestess of Ohm in attack mode.”

SoO: 1700 ATK

“With Ohm’s effect, I can sacrifice any number of dark monsters so that I can inflict you eight hundred points of damage per monster. So I’ll sacrifice my entire field to take you down by sixteen hundred points.”

Misaki: 2400

“Next, since I have five dark monsters in my graveyard and no monsters on my field, I can special summon The Dark Creator in defense mode.”

TDC: 3000 DEF

“And with his effect, I’ll remove my Mystic Tomato so my creator can bring my Great Majiu Garzet back.”

GMG: 0 ATK

“Last chance. I send this only card in my hand back on top of my deck so I can get my Plaguespreader Zombie from my graveyard as long as I remove it from play next time it leaves the field.”

PZ: 400 ATK

“Now I tune my zombie with Garzet to synchro summon back my Blood Mefist.”

BM: 2800

“And that will end my turn now.” Ren said.

“Looks like he’s getting back into the fight.” Akiza said.

“For now. Keep it up, bro.” You cheered on.
1311.title: Ren Might Have Something

13111.content:
"I'm ending this duel now." Misaki says as she draws her card.

Ren: 8 SC
Misaki: 3 SC

"Not so fast, I'm sure you haven't forgotten my Mefist's ability now, have you? You take 300 points of damage for every card on your field. And with your little tactic, things are about to backfire big time for you. You've got all four of your monsters, plus your cannon, and the two traps you got from your teammate. That's seven cards total, and at 300 each, that's gonna be a big hit to you." Ren says as his monster fires a blast at Misaki.

Misaki. 300

"Amazing! Even on the brink of defeat, Ren continues to give what little struggle he can. Misaki's certainly seen better duels." The announcer says.

"Not bad, but not good enough. I play the speed spell Wattcare. Now since I have two or more speed counters, I can sacrifice one to use this card's effect. I'm allowed to destroy one thunder monster on my field and regain life points equal to it's attack. So now I'll destroy Wattpheasent to regain 1000 life points." Misaki explains.

Misaki: 1300
2 SC

"Then I'll place a card face down."

"Don't forget, when you set a card, Blood Mefist dishes out another 300 points of damage." Ren reminds.

Misaki: 1000

"That's fine, because this is your final lap. Wattcobra, attack him directly."

"Uuughn." Ren grunts as he takes the hit.

Ren: 0000

"Looks like that's the end for Ren's streak, folks. Let's see if Team Arcadia's next duelist, Akiza Izinski will carry on what he started." The announcer wraps up
13111.title: A Costly Win

131111.content:
“Well, guys, I gave it my all.” Ren said as he pulls into the pit.

“You sure did and it was amazing.” You complimented.

“Thanks man.” Ren said as he passed on the cards on the field to Akiza. “Give it to her, will ya?” Ren said to Akiza.

“You better believe it.” Akiza said as she drives off into the track.

“Here she is, folks. The intriguing and fearsome Akiza Izinski! Let’s see how she can fair against Misaki!” The announcer said.

“Just watch!” Akiza draws.

Akiza: 4000; 9 SC
Misaki: 1000; 3 SC

“I summon my Rose Paladin in attack mode.” Akiza said.

RP: 1800 ATK

“Then I’ll place two cards face down and end my turn.” Akiza said.

“Looks like she’s starting off slow for now! But will slow and steady really win the race for her?” The announcer wondered.
131111.title: Akiza makes her debut

1311111.content:
"This looks bad for Misaki. Ren's Blood Mefist is still on the field, which means that come her standby phase, she'll take damage for every card on the field once again, and another hit like that will spend the end of this electrifying duelist." The announce commentates.

"I... draw." Misaki starts. "But while I'm still in the draw phase, I activate my face-down, Compulsory Evacuation Device. Now I can send one monster card back to the hand. So say goodbye to Blood Mefist." At that, Ren's monster is sent to Akiza's extra deck and the turn continues.

Misaki: 4 SC
Akiza: 10 SC

"Then, I'll activate Wattcycle speed spell. Now that I have four or more speed counters, I can destroy a card on my field to add a similar card from my graveyard to my hand. So by destroying Toru''s Portable Scrap Factory, I can add a trap card from my graveyard, and I choose Wattcancel. Now Wattcobra will attack you directly." Misaki says as her serpent begins to attack.

"Not so fast. I have my face-down Sylvan Waterslide. Now whenever you attack me directly, I can take a look at the top card of my deck, and if it's a plant monster, I can send it to my graveyard. Otherwise, it goes to the bottom of my deck. Here goes." Akiza says as she draws. "It's Dark Verger, so now I can send him to my graveyard."

"But that still doesn't save your life points."

Akiza 3000

"And since he inflicted direct damage, I can add Wattfox from my deck to my hand. I'll end it there."
1311111.title: A Close Save

13111111.content:
“It’s time I finish this. Here goes.” Akiza said as she draws.

Akiza: 11 SC
Misaki: 5 SC

“First up, I’m playing the speed spell, Tyrant Force. Now, cards I control can’t be destroyed this turn since I have 10 speed counters on me. Then I’ll summon the tuner monster, Copy Plant.” Akiza said.

CP: 0 ATK

“Then, since I normal summoned a plant-type tuner monster, I can special summon my Dark Verger from my graveyard.”

DV: 0 ATK

“Now I tune my Copy Plant with Dark Verger and Rose Paladin. I synchro summon! Show yourself, Black Rose Dragon!”

BRD: 2400 ATK

“There she is, folks! Akiza’s ace in the hole, Black Rose Dragon! Looks like Misaki’s really tangled up now!” The announcer said.

“Got that right! I know Watthopper prevents me from targeting your watts, but what would happen if I strike all of them at once? Black Rose Dragon can destroy all cards on the field once she’s synchro summoned. Go, Black Rose Gale!” Akiza commanded.

All of the cards except for her cards got blown away.

“And there’s more, Tyrant Force also lets me deal you three hundred points of damage when I destroy your cards.” Akiza said.

Misaki: 700

“With that out of the way, Black Rose Dragon, finish her off.” Akiza said.

Misaki: 0

“And with that amazing combo, Akiza manages to make two wins for her team.” The announcer said.
13111111.title: Akiza Blossoms Up

131111111.content:
"Sorry." Misaki says as she pulls up into the pit.

"It's fine. You beat one of them and damaged another. That's more than I can say about me." Toru says while patting his friend on the back. "Besides, we still have our ace."

"You got that right. I'll win it all for you guys." Sanada says before pulling out.

"Good luck..." Misaki mumbles to herself as he leaves.

"This is it, the final racer for Team Cameo. Can Sanada avenge his teammates? Or will he just be another notch on Akiza's runner?" The announcer questions.

"Let's find out, shall we?" Sanada says as he draws his first card.

Sanada: 4000

Sanasa: 6 SC
Akiza 12 SC

"Akiza has now reached top speed. She can now play any speed spell she wants." The announcer adds.

"Too bad it won't matter. I summon Six Samurai Zanji to the field in attack mode." Sanada starts.

SSZ: 1800 ATK

"Next, since there's a Six Samurai monster on my field, I'm allowed to special summon Legendary Six Samurai - Kizan to the field."

LSSK: 1800 ATK

"And how about some support from Grandmaster of the Six Samurai?"

GSS: 2100 ATK

"How did you summon him?" Akiza asks.

"Same as Kizan. I can special summon him from my hand if I have another Six Samurai on the field. Also, since I have two other Six Samurai on my field, Kizan gains 300 attack points." Sanada explains.

LSSK: 2100 ATK

"Cute, but none of them are powerful enough to beat my dragon." Akiza points out.

"We'll see about that. Six Samurai Zanji, attack Black Rose Dragon."

"What?!" Akiza questions along with the audience as Sanada's monster battles Akiza's and loses.

Sanada: 3600

"I activate Zanji's special ability. By sacrificing another Six Samurai monster, I can keep Zanji on the field. So by releasing Kizan, he's safe."

"Then why attack at all?" Akiza wonders.

"Because now that he's still on the field with another Six Samurai monster, his other ability activates. When he battles a monster and the monster is still around after the damage step, that monster gets destroyed." He explains.

"Oh no, but with Grandmaster of the Six Samurai..." Akiza starts.

"My monster can destroy yours. Go Zanji, slice that dragon in two." He calls out as his monster cuts right through Black Rose Dragon. "And now you're wide open for my Grandmaster to attack directly."

His second monster begins its attack. "Don't forget about my Waterslide. Now I can draw the top card of my deck and see if it's a plant or not." Akiza says as she draws. "And it's Spore, so into the grave it goes."

"Not that it'll save you from this. Go Grandmaster!" Sanada announces as his attack continues.

Akiza: 900

"I'll end my turn with one face down."
131111111.title: Carving A Path

1311111111.content:
“I draw now.” Akiza said.

Akiza: 12 SC
Sanada : 7 SC

“I activate Speed World 2’s effect. By removing four speed counters, I can deal you eight hundred points of damage for each speed spell in my hand.” Akiza explains.

Akiza: 8 SC

“Luckily for you, I only have one. So eight hundred points is all you’re going to lose.”

Sanada: 2800

“The card I showed you was Angel Baton, which I’ll activate. I now draw two cards and discard one.” Akiza draws two and discarded one. “The card I sent to the graveyard was Rose Lover. By removing her from my graveyard from play, I can special summon any plant monster from my hand.” Akiza said.

“Any plant monster!?” Sanada wondered.

“Yep. And who better than my Rose Tentacles?” Akiza said.

RT: 2200 ATK

“The best part about this is that Rose Lover makes sure my Tentacles can’t be affected by trap cards this turn. Rose Tentacles, go strike on his Grandmaster.” Akiza said.

Sanada: 2700

“With that, I’ll end my turn.” Akiza said.
1311111111.title: Akiza's Holding On

13111111111.content:
"Then I draw." Sanada says.

Sanada: 8 SC
Akiza: 9 SC

"A samurai is nothing without his armor, so I summon Spirit of the Six Samurai in attack mode." He continues.

SSS: 500 ATK

"And now for his special ability. I'm allowed to equip him to any Six Samurai monster on my field, like my Zanji, and give that monster five hundred attack points." He says as his monster attaches to the other like a suit of armor.

SSZ: 2300 ATK

"Oh no! But that means..." Akiza starts.

"That now Zanji is stronger than Rose Tentacles. Go Zanji, trim that weed." He says while his monster slashes right through Akiza's, destroying it.

Akiza: 800

"And since a monster equipped with Spirit of the Six Samurai destroyed a monster by battle, I can draw one card. I'll end my turn with that, though." He wraps up.

"These samurai of his are certainly impressive. They're relentless and can find all new ways to turn the tide of a duel." You say in the pit. "Let's hope Akiza has another plan for breaking through."
13111111111.title: A Helpful Spirit

131111111111.content:
“It’s my turn!” Akiza said.

Akiza: 10 SC
Sanada: 9 SC

“I summon the tuner monster, Twilight Rose Knight!” Akiza said.

TRK: 1000 ATK

“A tuner huh? Too bad you don’t have any other monsters to tune her with.” Sanada pointed out.

“Well, it’s a good thing that her special ability let’s me special summon a level four or below plant-type monster from my hand whenever she’s normal summoned. And I choose Rose Fairy.” Akiza said.

RF: 300 ATK

“Now watch as I tune my knight with my fairy. I synchro summon! Splendid Rose!” Akiza said.

SR: 2200 ATK

“Too bad she’s not strong enough to stop my Zanji.” Sanada said.

“Think again. I play her special ability. By removing a plant-type monster from play, you Zanji loses half of his attack points.” Akiza said.

SSZ: 1150 ATK

“Now, Splendid Rose. Destroy his Zanji!” Akiza commanded.

“Nice try, but by removing my spirit from him, Zanji’s safe and sound.” Sanada said.

“But you’ll still take damage.” Akiza said.

Sanada: 1550

“Also, since your spirit is gone, he’s boost is gone as well.” Akiza said.

SSZ: 900 ATK

“Also, I activated my Splendid Rose’s other ability. Whenever she attacks, I can remove another plant-type monster from my graveyard from play. She may lose half her attack points, but she gets to attack again.” Akiza said.

SR: 1100 ATK

“Crap!” Sanada gasped.

“Finish what you started!” Akiza commanded.

Sanada: 1350

“And with that, I end my turn. Since my turn ended, Splendid Rose’s effect wares off and her attack points return to normal.” Akiza said.

SR: 2200 ATK

“Amazing! Akiza managed to get herself out of a rough spot and dishes out a big point of damage! But it’s still far from over, folks! What will Sanada have up his sleeve next?” The announcer wondered.
131111111111.title: A Thrash of Roses

1311111111111.content:
"Just you wait." Sanada says as he draws his card.

Sanada: 10 SC
Akiza 11 SC

"I'll summon out Shien's Squire in defense mode." He continues.

SS: 700 DEF

"A tuner monster?!" You say in shock.

"That means..." Ren leads on.

"Then I activate my face-down, Double-Edged Sword Technique. Now I can special summon two 'Six Samurai' monster from my graveyard in attack mode, and if they are still on my field during the end phase, they are destroyed and I get hit with their attack points. So come on back Six Samurai Zanji and Spirit of the Six Samurai." Sanada continues.

SSZ: 1800 ATK
SSS: 500 ATK

"Now for a little tuning action. I tune Shien's Squire to my Six Samurai Zanji to synchro summon Legendary Six Samurai Shi En." He calls out as a massive warrior appeared from the two.

SSSE: 2500 ATK

"Then, I'll equip him with my Spirit of the Six Samurai to increase his attack points."

SSSE: 3000 ATK

"But with Splendid Rose's attack points..." Misty starts

"Now, Shi En, attack Splendid Rose and end this duel!" Sanada calls out as his monster begins his attack.

"Not so fast, I still have a face-down, Wall of Thorns. Now since you attacked a plant monster, I can destroy all monsters you control in attack mode." Akiza reveals. I know his Spirit's ability will protect his monster this turn, but at least I can save my life points.

"I activate Shi En's special ability. I'm allowed to negate the activation of one spell or trap card per turn. So much for stopping me with that wall. Shi En, continue your attack." Sanada unveils as his warrior slashes through both the wall and Akiza's monster.

Akiza: 0000

"And since neither monster summoned by my trap are still monsters on my field, I take no damage." He wraps up.

"Looks like that's the end for this rose, but not without her dishing out some big pain. Now it falls to Team Arcadia's last duelist, Yuten Anjiou, to win it all for them." The announcer says while Akiza made her way back
1311111111111.title: Wrath of the Samurai

13111111111111.content:
“Sorry. I tried.” Akiza said sadly.

“You did. But you’ve done tremendously fantastic out there. I’m proud of you.” You said with a smile.

“Thanks, Yuten.” Akiza smiles at you.

“It’s all on your shoulders now, bro. Knock him dead.” Ren said.

“You got it.” You said before you kissed Akiza on the lips and left to the track.

“This is it, folks. The last two competitors of this round. Who will win and advance to the next round?” The announcer said.

“Let’s find out.” You draw.

You: 4000

You: 12 SC
Sanada: 11 SC

“Since I have no monsters on my field, I can special summon Kaiser Vorse Raider in defense mode.” You said.

KVR: 1200 DEF

“Then I’ll summon the Maiden with Eyes of Blue in attack mode.” You said.

MEB: 0 ATK

“With that, I’ll end my turn.” You said.
13111111111111.title: You're The Last Hope

131111111111111.content:
"That's it? Then I'll gladly take the offensive." Sanada says as he draws his card.

Sanada: 12 SC

"Now, Shi En, Attack his Maiden with Eyes of Blue!" He announces with his monster beginning to attack.

"Not so fast. I play my Maiden's special ability. Once per turn, when she's attacked, I'm allowed to negate the attack by changing her battle position." You reveal. "And since it isn't a spell or trap card, your Shi En can't negate it."

A barrier forms around Kisara as she changes to a defensive stance, blocking Shi En's attack.

MEB: 0000 DEF

"And that's not all, I'm now allowed to special summon one Blue-Eyes White Dragon from my hand, deck, or graveyard. So I think I'll play one from my deck in attack mode."

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"Damn. I was too careless. Looks like I played right into your hands. Nice move Yuten. I never heard of that card before, so you caught me off guard, but don't expect it to happen twice. I use Speed World 2's effect to remove seven speed counters to draw one card, and the speed spell in my hand is Slowdown Machine." He resumes his turn.

Sanada: 5 SC

"Then I'll end my turn with a face-down."
131111111111111.title: A Reckless Charge

1311111111111111.content:
“I’m up now.” You said.

Sanada: 6 SC

“Now I tune my...”

“I don’t think so. I play the trap, Six Style - Duel Wield. Since a Six Samurai monster is out in attack mode, I can use this trap to send two of your monsters to your hand. So, bid farewell to Kaiser Vorse Raider and Blue-Eyes White Dragon.” Sanada said as he send both of your monsters away.

“Damn it. Well, it’s a good thing I have a plan B. By showing you the Blue-Eyes in my hand, I can special summon my Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon to the field in attack mode.” You said.

BEAWD: 3000 ATK

“And with his effect, he can destroy your Shi En!” You said.

“Not quite, I removed my spirit from him so he’s safe.” Sanada said.

LSS - SE: 2500 ATK

“Well, lucky for you, my dragon can’t attack this turn. That’s fine because I tune him with my Maiden. I synchro summon! Arise, Blue-Eyes Spirit Dragon!” You said.

BESD: 3000 DEF

“Then I’ll end with a face down.” You said.
1311111111111111.title: Tricky Samurais

13111111111111111.content:
"Then it looks like I'm up." Sanada says with a draw.

Sanada: 7 SC

"I'll start with the speed spell The Warrior Returning Alive. Now since I have three or more speed counters, I can add one level four or below warrior monster from my deck to my hand, and I'll add back my Spirit of the Six Samurai. Then I'll play my Spirit right back on the field."

SSS: 500 ATK

"And you know what that means. He's getting equipped right back onto Shi En to increase his attack points."

LSS-SE: 3000 ATK

"Then I'll use Speed World 2 with my Slowdown Machine speed spell to use seven speed counters to draw one card."

Sanada: 0 SC

"Then I'll place one card face down and end my turn." He finishes.
13111111111111111.title: Re-Arming

131111111111111111.content:
“Then it’s my go.” You said.

Sanada: 1 SC

“First, I’ll use Speed World 2’s effect. So by releasing seven speed counters, I can draw a new card.” You said.

“I’ll let that slide.” Sanada said.

You: 5 SC

You draw and liked what you got.

“I play the trap, Raigeki Break. By discarding a card, I can destroy your Shi En.” You said as you tried to destroy his monster.

“I think not. Shi En, negate that trap card.” Sanada said.

“Fine. But since the card I discarded was the White Stone of Legend, I get to add a Blue-Eyes from my deck to my hand. Now, I play the speed spell, Speed Fusion. I now fuse the three Blue-Eyes in my hand to make up for your defeat. I fusion summon! Let’s go, Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon!” You said.

BEUD: 4500 ATK

“Now that’s a juggernaut of a dragon! How can Sanada go toe to toe with that behemoth?” The announcer said.

“Just watch. But first, I sacrifice my spirit dragon so I can summon my Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon from my extra deck.” You said.

AESD: 3000 DEF

“With his effect, neither of these dragons can be targeted or destroyed by card effects until the end of your coming turn. But I don’t think we’ll find out.” You said.

“Yes we will. I play the Threatening Roar trap card. Now you don’t have a battle phase this turn.” Sanada said.

“That’s fine by me. I place one card face down and end my turn.” You said.
131111111111111111.title: Giving It A  Go

1311111111111111111.content:
"I'm up then" Sanada says as he starts his turn.

Sanada: 2 SC
You: 6 SC

"I'll Summon Legendary Six Samurai Enishi in defense mode" He begins.

LSSE: 700 DEF

"Then, I'll play the Angel Baton speed spell to draw two cards and discard one. Then with one face-down, I'll end my turn." Sanada concludes.

"Looks like he's given up. That monster can't stop his Ultimate Dragon, and he didn't even switch his Shi En to defense mode, so it can't protect him. Looks like we're moving on." Ren comments.

"I don't think so. Look..." Akiza comments as she looks over into Team Cameo's pit. Toru and Misaki were both unphased by these events. "There's more going on here and they know it. I don't think this battle is over yet."

"Whatever happens, my bro's got this. Trust me." Ren says with a hand on her shoulder.
1311111111111111111.title: A New Strategy

13111111111111111111.content:
“Here I go. Ha!” You draw.

You: 7 SC
Sanada: 3 SC

“First off, since it’s my standby phase, Azure-Eyes let’s me get my Blue-Eyes back. Let’s do it buddy.” You said.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

“Let’s take it home, Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, destroy Shi En and finish this.” You commanded.

“I think not. I play my trap card, Mirror Force. Now both of your dragons are history.” Sanada said.

“In that case, I’ll end with a face down.” You said.

“Amazing! Sanada managed to take the big Goliath down to size. Could we see the beginning of the end for Yuten and his team?” The announcer said.
13111111111111111111.title: You’re In Trouble Now

131111111111111111111.content:
"Let's find out." Sanada says while drawing his card.

You: 8 SC
Sanada: 4 SC

"First, I think I'll switch Enishi into attack mode." He starts.

LSSE: 1700 ATK

"And then I'll use his special ability. By removing from play two Six Samurai monsters from my graveyard, I can send one face-up monster on the field back into the hand. So by sending Grandmaster of the Six Samurai and Legendary Six Samurai Kizan from my graveyard and removing them from play, I can send Azure-Eyes back into your hand, or rater, your extra deck." He continues as his monster sends your dragon back into your deck.

"Oh no!" Akiza gasps.

"And now that your field is empty, I'm free to attack you directly. Go Shi En" He calls out.

"Not so fast, I have a face-down. Compulsory Evacuation Device. Now I can send Shi En back to your extra deck." You retort.

"Sorry, but Shi En still has his special ability, allowing him to negate one spell or trap card per turn. Nice try, but that won't stop me." Sanada responds as his monster cuts through your card.

"Then it's a good thing I wasn't planning to stop you with that." You announce.

"What?!"

"I play my second face-down, Call of the Haunted. Now I can revive one monster from my graveyard in attack mode, and I'll choose my Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon."

BEUD: 4500 ATK

"So much for a finishing blow this turn. Alright then, I'll end my turn."
131111111111111111111.title: Narrow Survival

1311111111111111111111.content:
“This is it. This could be my last chance. All I need to do is attack and it’s adios for him. Let’s do this.” You thought as you were about to draw.

When you touched your card, your eyes blinked blue for just one second before looking at your ultimate dragon. You have a feeling that this turn will take it home for you.

“I draw!” You draw.

When you looked at the card, you got something that’ll put a smile on your face.

“Sanada. Great duel. But it looks like victory is mine.” You said.

“So you’re going for the win huh? I’d like to see that happening.” Sanada dared.

“You asked for it and this is the card that’ll end it all. I can summon this monster from my hand by sacrificing my Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon. Since I am, you’re going to be in for a real surprise. My ultimate dragon, I sacrifice you to call forth this majestic beast. Behold, Blue-Eyes Shining Dragon!” You said.

When your ultimate dragon cracked open, it revealed a new Blue-Eyes that looks very futuristic and powerful.

BESD: 3000 ATK

“Amazing! Yuten has summoned forth a new Blue-Eyes! Could this beast be what he needs to end this once and for all?” The announcer said.

“Where did he get that?” Ren asked wide-eyeing on Shining Dragon in awe.

“Good question.” Misty said.

Akiza looked on as well and was amazed that you have such an incredible monster. All the teams in the back watching this, even 5ds, were all astonished to see you play a new dragon.

“That’s what’s going to finish me off? You should’ve just kept your ultimate dragon because he’s way weaker than it.” Sanada said.

“Not quite.” You said.

“What do you mean not quite?” Sanada asked in confusion.

“Watch and learn. My Blue-Eyes Shining Dragon gains three hundred additional attack points for every dragon in my graveyard.” You explained.

“Come again!?” Sanada asked.

“You heard me. Now if my math is right, I have eight dragons in my graveyard. That means my Shining Dragon gains an extra twenty-four hundred attack points.” You said.

BESD: 3000 - 5400 ATK

“And if you think you can use a card effect to stop him, think again. He can negate any card or effect that targets at him.” You said.

“Oh boy!” Sanada said.

“It’s over. Blue-Eyes Shining Dragon, let’s finish this. Attack his Legendary Six Samurai - Shi En and end this duel. Shining Neutron Blast!” You said as your dragon takes out both Shi En and Sanada.

Sanada: 0

“And there you go, ladies and gentlemen! Yuten manages to keep him and his team in the game as Team Arcadia moves on to the next round!” The announcer said.
1311111111111111111111.title: A Shiny Finish

13111111111111111111111.content:
As you pulled into the pit, you were quickly jumped by Akiza in excitement. "Alright! We won our first duel as a team!" She cheers before pulling you into a passionate kiss.

When she finally releases you, you get off your runner and turn to see Sanada in his team's pit. You see him talk with his teammates, then you see Misaki plant a kiss on his cheek as the two blush. "Come on guys, let's go be good sports." You tell your teammates.

They agree and follow you over to see the other team. "Hey guys. Good match today." Sanada says as he dismounts.

"Thanks. You guys did well out there." Ren says while shaking Toru's hand.

"You say that, but I never even scratched you." Toru admits.

"Maybe, but you still had me scared at plenty of points." Ren replies.

"Thanks for trying to cheer me up, but we both know you had me beat." Toru tells him.

"So, you two, huh? I didn't expect it when I saw you both." Akiza says looking at Misaki and Sanada.

"Neither did I. She just sprung it on me now." Sanada replies, making his teammate blush a bit.

"I wanted to tell him when we won, but it looks like that isn't happening anymore." She admits.

Talk about irony. You think to yourself. "Well, I hope things work out between you two. Good luck to you all in the future." You tell them.

"Will do. Maybe we'll see each other again next time you're in the Daimon area. Until then, see ya." Sanada says as he shakes your hand and leaves.

"I think we should head home too." Ren says.
13111111111111111111111.title: A Touching Goodbye

131111111111111111111111.content:
When you all arrived back home, you had Sion get the runners back in shape before the next round. You all then got upstairs before you see your parents talking to Akiza’s parents, much to your surprise.

“Mom? Daddy? What are you two doing here?” Akiza wondered.

“Akiza! Sweetie! So good to see you!” Satsuko said happy to see her daughter as she hugs her.

“And you too, Yuten and Ren! You all did a very good today!” Hideo said.

“You watched the tournament?” You wondered.

“Sure did. We all decided to watch our children succeed together in the first round.” Kai said.

“We also prepare you as celebration for your first win.” Kourin said as you all see the table set up for you all.

“Well, let’s party.” Ren said.

You were all enjoy yourselves as you go and grabbed a glass of punch to raise up.

“A toast to our first of many victories in the tournament. Well done, everyone.” You said as you all toasted. “So, how are things going on with you?” You asked Hideo.

“Well, we were just talking about the ring-.” Hideo stopped as Setsuko elbowed him before reminding her husband about Akiza. “That, uh, need some repairing.” Hideo said to covering himself.

“What’s wrong with it?” Akiza wondered.

“Oh. One of the tiny diamonds fall off. So I’m going to see if I can get a replacement.” Setsuko said.

“Oh! Okay.” Akiza said before walking away.

You all sighed as that was a close call before you continued the celebration.
131111111111111111111111.title: Celebrating One of Many Victories

1311111111111111111111112.content:
With the party over, everyone left your room to head home. You said goodbye to both yours and Akiza's parents as they left, and as they left, you can see both your mom and Setsuko elbow Hideo in the gut once more, no doubt for almost spilling the beans about the ring early.

When everyone was gone save you, Ren, and Akiza, you decided it best to see what's next for your team. "Okay, looks like our next oppenent in this block is gonna be... Team Catastrophe. We'll be facing them in two days. Everyone got that?" You ask.

"Yup. Now if you excuse me, I've gotta go." Ren says before heading for the door. "I need to take a few notes after what happened with Misaki. See you two later, then."

With that, he was out the door, leaving the two of you alone. "Big day, huh?" Akiza asks as you both prepare for bed.

"And then some." You reply. "The crowd's reaction to us really gives me hope."

"How? They didn't even cheer for us when we were introduced, and it wasn't much better after we won." She points out.

"That may be. But compared to how they were during the Fortune Cup, or even when we announced our entering the tournament, I'd say this is a good start. Who knows, maybe we can get the whole audience on our side come the finals." You say as you climb into bed.

"We can only hope." She says climbing in with you. "Goodnight." She says before clicking off the lights and falling asleep.
1311111111111111111111112.title: After the celebration

choices: After breakfast, you and Akiza enjoy the day
13111111111111111111111121.content:
You wake up and you looked over to see Akiza changing while shaking her hips around. You giggled as seeing your girlfriend almost naked like this in the morning is a sunshine that can beat any storm.

“Morning, Yuten. Enjoying the view?” Akiza asked with a smile as she wiggled her butt for you.

“You bet. So the first round really had me feeling fired up.” You said as you get up.

“Easy there, tiger. We still have this Team Catastrophe to deal with.” Akiza said.

“You’re right. Anyhow, what do you want to do?” You wondered as you got dressed.

“I was thinking about finishing our bet.” Akiza said as you wide-eyed a little. “Ha! I’m joking. I just want to spend some time together.”

“Okay. Let’s get going.” You said as you two head out the door. “You know, I like it when you shake your hips just before. You could make a great stripper. Just saying.” You said.

“A stripper, huh?” Akiza said as she thought of another idea for you.
13111111111111111111111121.title: Waking Up Fresh

131111111111111111111111211.content:
You and Akiza make your way down to the cafeteria, where you were met by the cheers of your students and staff once more. Seems they were celebrating your victory yesterday. After a few pictures and autographs, you were able to get your food and be seated. As you ate, you were given more shows of faith for your duel tomorrow as well.

With breakfast done and your plates given back to the cafeteria staff, you both left to the sounds of cheering behind you. "Say, what's the word on Ren? Where's he today?" You ask.

"He left a message while you were asleep saying he'd be watching the twins today. He says Leo was planning to challenge him today in a duel." She answers.

"Heh, well, if he loses, maybe we should have Leo as our third teammate." You joke.

"Maybe." Akiza says with a chuckle. "You think we're ready for these Team Catastrophe guys? From what I hear, the team that fought them yesterday didn't do so well."

"We'll be fine. Let's cross that road when we get there." You tell her. "So, we have the rest of the day to ourselves. What do you wanna do together?"
131111111111111111111111211.title: After breakfast, you and Akiza enjoy the day

choices: Take a seat underneath a tree
1311111111111111111111112111.content:
“I was thinking about going to the park. After all, it’s such a lovely day outside.” Akiza said.

“You know what? Yeah. A nice stroll should keep us relaxed. Let’s go.” You said as you two head straight for the park.

You didn’t take your runners as you needed them prepared for the next match. So you and Akiza walked there together for it’s not really that far. Once you’re both there, you looked to see a bunch of people hanging around and enjoying the day. The view looks nice and clean as you grabbed Akiza’s hand and took her with you down the walkway.

“It’s so beautiful here.” Akiza said as she grabs on to your arm.

“Sure is, babe. It’s nice to see everyone just getting out and enjoying themselves.” You said while you kept walking.

Akiza then spotted a swing set and she takes you with her. You then see her sitting down on it and you guessed what she wanted.

“Think you can give me a push?” Akiza asked.

“Well, I don’t see why not.” You said.

You got behind her and you started pushing Akiza on the swing. You can tell she was having fun as she was laughing like a little child. You always feel happy every time she laughs so joyful. It was soothing music to your ears as you kept on pushing.

“Having fun, Akiza?” You asked.

“I am, Yuten. This is great.” Akiza said.

Soon enough, she stopped swinging as you went in front of her face to see those beautiful eyes of hers closely. You kissed her and it made her giggle in such a cute way.

“Do you love me, Yuten?” Akiza asked you softly.

“I love you so much, Akiza. Now and forever.” You said as you give her another kiss.

What do you do now?
1311111111111111111111112111.title: A Stroll At The Park

choices: You spot an ice cream cart
13111111111111111111111121112.content:
The midday sun was beginning to beat down upon you, so you try to look for some shade for now. You spot a nearby tree that seemed big enough for you both to sit under and decide that that's your best bet. "Hey, wanna go take a seat by that tree?" You ask.

"Sure, this sun is starting to bake me." Akiza comments as you take her by the hand and lead her into the shadow. You both sit down on the grass and stare out into the park. Enjoying the sight of everyone enjoying themselves. "So Yuten, I wanna know?"

"What's up?" You ask her.

"What happens next? I mean, we've been so focused on this tournament and winning it as the next step to your dream, but then what? What comes next?" She asks.

"Hmmmm... I dunno." You say bluntly. "There's so many options, and so many outcomes, I can't imagine how things are gonna go that far down the line. All I can say for certain, though, is that whatever comes next, I'll be by your side."

"How sweet." She giggles before kissing you on the cheek. "I guess I'll just have to hold you to that, huh?"

"Yup." You answer.

What happens next?
13111111111111111111111121112.title: Take a seat underneath a tree

choices: Have more fun in the park
131111111111111111111111211121.content:
You looked over to see an ice cream cart coming by and you figured you can have a scoop or two for you and Akiza.

“Hey, Akiza. There’s an ice cream cart over there. Want some?” You asked.

“That sounds tasty. Sure.” Akiza said.

You and Akiza walked over to the cart and asked the man for some scoops. You ordered the vanilla while Akiza ordered the strawberry. The man gave you your orders and you two go on to enjoy your tasty flavors together while walking around again.

“How’s the ice cream, Akiza?” You asked as you licked on yours.

“Delicious. Thanks for ordering it for me, Yuten.” Akiza said happily.

“No problem.” You said as you then see her giggling at you. “What?”

“Your nose.” Akiza said while chuckling.

You must have some ice cream on your nose and she finds this funny.

“Wait.” Akiza said as she takes a finger of ice cream and draws on your face.

You looked like a clown now and your girlfriend was laughing at the design she did on you.

“Yeah. Hilarious.” You said as you take a napkin and wiped your face clean.

“Come on, Yuten. It was funny.” Akiza said.

“Okay. It was. I’ll admit.” You said.

You licked on your ice cream before it fallen off and landed in Akiza’s cleavage.

“Oops! Sorry, Akiza.” You apologized.

“Yuten, you could’ve at least waited until we get home.” Akiza said in a sort of seductive tone.

“Ha ha. Here. I’ll clean it up.” You said as you take more napkins and picked the ice cream off of Akiza’s cleavage before throwing it out. “Better?”

“Very. Thank you.” Akiza said before you two moved on.
131111111111111111111111211121.title: An Ice Creamy Taste

choices: Get Some Lunch From the Vendors
1311111111111111111111112111211.content:
As you continued your walk, you come across a flyer on a nearby pole. "What's this?" You wonder as you lean in close. It was an advertisement for a fireworks show being held at this very park tonight.

"This seems like fun. How about it Yuten? Can we stick around until the show?" Akiza asks with a begging look you still cannot muster the will to say no to.

"Sure." You tell her. "But... just one problem with that. This says the show is tonight. It's still the middle of the day. What are we supposed to do until the show starts?"

Seeing the truth in your words, Akiza begins to quickly scan the horizon of the park, hoping to spot something to keep you both occupied for a while. First, she notices a small outdoor food court of sorts, complete with various food stands, carts, and trucks. You may have just had ice cream, but that was hardly filling enough to be considered lunch.

Her eyes then drift over the lake, where she spots a boat rental shop. Surely peddling through the water can eat away the clock. Plus, she has been eager to try one now that she has you with her.

What does she choose?
1311111111111111111111112111211.title: Extended Plans

choices: Enjoy your time in the lake
Skip to where you get off
13111111111111111111111121112112.content:
“How about we go on the lake? I’ve always wanted to try that out.” Akiza suggested.

“Sounds like a fun time. Sure.” You said.

You and Akiza walked over to the lake and go to the stand. You asked for a boat for two and you paid for it. You pushed the boat into the water and you two climbed in before you start rowing. Akiza was smiling nicely as she sees how nice and clean the lake is and how fresh the air is. This is truly a tremendous sight as you kept on rowing.

“Like it so far, Akiza?” You asked.

“I do. The view is so pretty here.” Akiza said.

“It’s more pretty now that you’re here.” You said to flirt with her.

“Oh, Yuten.” Akiza said before she kisses you on the lips.

As she was done kissing, something funny happens as a fish comes flying out and smacked you in the face before diving back into the water. It was hilarious to Akiza as she started laughing.

“You know, I was going to eat that.” Akiza said while laughing.

“Yeah. Laugh it up.” You said as you wiped your face.

What now?
13111111111111111111111121112112.title: Fun On The Lake

131111111111111111111111211121122.content:
You both had a nice, long row around the lake for a few hours. It was getting near the end of when lunch should be while you were out there, so you were both quite relieved to spot a burger cart near the lake. You pulled as close to shore as the boat allowed and asked the man if he could serve you real quick. He agreed and brought you both burgers, which you paid for.

It was now nearing 3:00 PM as you pulled the boat up to the dock of the rental place. "I'm gonna get this thing back on land over there. Mind going to give the guy the rental ticket saying we brought it back?" You ask her.

"Sure thing." She replies before stepping onto the dock and letting you row a good distance away to the nearest river bank. You pull the thing ashore before stopping to see where you had to take it. You see the other rentals nearby the shop and prepare to bring it over, however, something caught your eye while you were looking at the boat shack.

You see some guy standing there with his hand against the wall, as if cutting off the escape of whoever he was talking to. You can't see who exactly he's cornered at first, but one sight of a familiar red hairstyle told you all you needed to know as you leave the boat behind to head over.

"Hey baby. What's a pretty little thing like you doing all alone in a place like this?" You hear the guy say as you get near. Most guys would hear this and rush over in a jealous fit. But you know Akiza well enough to be certain she can handle this without you rushing in like a meathead. You can get involved when the time was right.

"Actually, I'm with someone." Akiza replies, trying to look for a peaceful exit, but still showing no care for what this guy is offering.

"Oh really? Well I don't see him." The guy retorts. "I think you're just playing hard to get." He says while leaning in.

This had him meet with Akiza's fist in his gut, causing him to double back in pain towards you. "And I think I said I'm with someone." She repeats.

The guy stumbled back a bit before bumping into you, where you grab him by the shirt collar and spin him around to face you. "That would be me." You tell him before you toss him to the side into the lake, where he was now sitting in the water, soaked.

You both apologize to the owner for any possible trouble as you drag the boat back to the others before walking off. "You okay?" You ask her.

"Yup. That guy was a creep, but he was all talk." She replies.

"I was half expecting you to skip him across the lake like a stone with your powers." You admit.

"I considered it." She reveals. "But then I remembered some wise words telling me that doing that only gives the haters what they want." She hints.

"I see... Someone very wise must've told you that." You say, keeping up her act.

"You bet." She replies as you walk on.

What happens next?
131111111111111111111111211121122.title: An Unwanted Intrusion

1311111111111111111111112111211221.content:
It was close to dinner time and you and Akiza went by the food stands to order. You both ordered some hot dogs and fries before you sit by the tables nearby.

“This is really good.” You said as you started eating.

“It really is.” Akiza said as she eats her fries. “Yuten?”

You looked at her before she grabs the ketchup and starts squirting it on her hot dog. You looked to see that she made a small heart in her dog and it was fantastic.

“Now that’s what I like to call art.” You complimented.

“Thank you, Yuten.” Akiza said as you two continued eating.

You both finished eating and threw your trash away.
1311111111111111111111112111211221.title: Dinner At The Park

choices: You make your way back safe
The guy from the docks is back, and still pissed
13111111111111111111111121112112211.content:
As you dispose of your trash, you take notice that the sun is beginning to set. "Akiza? Where was the show supposed to take place?" You ask her.

"The flyer said they'd be shooting off from the South side of the lake." She replies. "From the looks of the sun, we're on the East side."

"Then let's get to the North edge, quick. It'll give us the best view as they reflect off the water." You suggest.

"Right." She replies as you take her hand and rush down the path. Once there, you find the tree you sat under earlier, with no one around. "Looks like we found our spot." She says before taking a seat on the grass and patting her lap. "Your cushion awaits."

Taking her hint, you lay down in front of her so you can rest your head on her lap. Once she has you there, she wastes no time stroking your head as you both stare into the darkening sky. You see other park goers soon gather around your spot and looking up into the sky like you. Soon, the sun set over the horizon, and the show began.

It was a spectacle, to be sure. You'd never really seen fireworks this close up before. The most you've ever seen where when someone in the Tops shot some off and you were lucky enough to spot some from your apartment. They were so cool, and everyone agreed as they all 'oooed' and 'aahhhed' with you

The guy in charge of this was certainly a fan of recent events. He had displays that showed several familiar dragons. Stardust, Red Dragon Archfiend, Black Rose, and of course, Blue-Eyes. Perhaps this guy was a big fan of the Fortune Cup last year?

Your suspicions were confirmed come the finale, where it showed Stardust and Red Dragon Archfiend going head to head. Then, an eruption of fireworks shot up, exploding into the shape of the Crimson Dragon like it did that day.

As the flares died down and the show was over, the crowd began to disperse. "That was fun." You say as you get up.

"Yup." Akiza replies as she stands up with you. "We should get back soon. Need to rest up for tomorrow, after all." With that, you take each other's hand and begin the walk home.

What happens next?
13111111111111111111111121112112211.title: Time for the fireworks special

131111111111111111111111211121122111.content:
You and Akiza made it back home safe and sound as you two go to your room. After getting changed, you both went off to bed.

“Nervous about tomorrow?” Akiza wondered.

“Not in the slightest. We’re going to show them who’s boss.” You said with confidence.

“Let’s be careful though. I heard they don’t exactly play nice.” Akiza said.

“True. But we can still beat them. We just need to be cautious.” You said as you climbed in.

“Exactly my point.” Akiza said as she climbs in too.

You and Akiza kissed each other nicely before drifting off to sleep while you have your hand on her butt, which you give it a nice squeeze that made her giggle as you two get ready for tomorrow.
131111111111111111111111211121122111.title: You make your way back safe

choices: Ren and Misty show up just in time for the lineup
1311111111111111111111112111211221111.content:
It took no time at all for you two to wake up and throw on your riding outfits. After a quick breakfast, you head on down to the garage, where Sion and Michelle are waiting for you. "Good morning sir, ma'am." Sion says as he bows.

"Morning Sion." You say as you approach. "Where are Ren and Misty? We gotta go soon."

"Ren said they would meet you at the arena. He fell asleep at the twins' place and ended up crashing there for the night." Sion explains.

"Miss Tredwell says she was making sure he was awake in time to leave." Michelle adds.

"Got it. Well, if they're gonna meet us there, then let's get riding." You say as you mount your runners with Sion and Michelle taking his car.

*****

"Ladies and gentlemen. Welcome to the next match of the WRGP. Coming up will be the match between Team Arcadia and Team Catastrophe. Stay tuned." The announcer says over the intercom.

"Alright you guys, here we go. Second round. Let's show 'em some of that fire from the first round and we'll win no problem" You say to your team members in the pit to psych them up.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111.title: The Next Match

13111111111111111111111121112112211111.content:
You all looked to see Ren and Misty coming up to see you guys.

“Hey, guys. Sorry we’re late. Did we missed the lineup?” Ren said.

“Nope. You’re just in time.” You said with a smile.

“That’s a relief.” Ren said with a sigh.

“Come on. We better get ready.” Akiza said as you all nodded.

“Here we are, ladies and gents! The final round before our main event! Few teams had advanced this far! But only fewer can move further! Now then, let me introduce you to our competitors! They came out of nowhere, but they might be going somewhere! Team Catastrophe!” The announcer said.

Almost everyone in the crowd was booing them loudly while others cheer them for some crashing to happen.

“Next, we have the team that are moving at a powerful pace! Team Arcadia!”

The crowd was actually giving you more cheers than you’d gotten the other day. It’s not everyone, but it’s a good sign this far.

“Looks like some of the people have different opinions about us than before.” Akiza said.

“Guess that means we’re going on great this far.” Ren said.

“I would say so.” You said.

You looked at Team Catastrophe and they don’t appeared to be very friendly. You’re not sure what it is, but something is definitely up. You just need to be careful. The lineup came and it’s Akiza that’s going first this time as she goes against this Hermann guy.

“Duelist, get your decks and engines ready!” The announcer said.

The light turned green and they get driving.

“Let’s duel!”

Akiza: 4000
Hermann: 4000
13111111111111111111111121112112211111.title: Ren and Misty show up just in time for the lineup

131111111111111111111111211121122111111.content:
The two take off from the starting line, neck and neck. You then watch as Hermann begins to slam his runner into Akiza's. "Hey, watch it!" She scolds.

"What's the matter? Can't handle a little pressure?" He questions as he continues to do so.

"That creep." Ren mutters.

"That's gotta be cheating, right?" Michelle asks.

"Sadly, no." You answer. "It would be if he knocks her off intentionally, but since it's just horseplay right now there's nothing that can be done but hope she'll be okay."

Hermann winds up for another ram, only for Akiza to be prepared for this one. Just before he collided with her, she quickly slowed her runner, causing him to go right in front of her. The unsuspecting Hermann wasn't able to stop his momentum as he slammed into the wall, letting Akiza pass him for the first corner.

"Looks like Akiza of Team Arcadia is getting the first move." The announcer calls as both duelists get their starting hands.

"Lucky trick." Hermann says under his breath.

"Let's do this." Akiza says as she draws her first card. "First, I'll Summon Witch of the Black Rose in attack mode."

WBR: 1700 ATK

"And since she was summoned while I have no other cards out, I'm allowed to draw one card, and if it's a monster, I can add it to my hand. Otherwise, both it and my Witch are sent to the graveyard." She says before drawing her card. "And the card I drew is Hedge Guard, and since it's a monster, he comes to my hand and my Witch stays on the field. Then I'll place two cards face down and end my turn."
131111111111111111111111211121122111111.title: Playing Rough

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Here I come, pretty girl.” Hermann draws.

Akiza: 1 SC
Hermann: 1 SC

“I summon Hook the Hidden Knight in attack mode.” Hermann said.

HtHK: 1600 ATK

“Then I’ll end my turn with one face down.” Hermann said.

“Never come across that monster before. How about you, bro?” Ren wondered.

“No. But there is something strange about that monster.” You guessed.

“Really, sir?” Sion wondered.

“I’m not one hundred percent sure. But something tells me that we’ll see what it is, eventually.” You said.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Hermann's Suspicious Monster

choices: Akiza manages to get back on to continue dueling
She can't ride, she has to walk her runner back to the pit
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Pretty weak start." Akiza says while she draws her card.

Akiza: 2 SC
Hermann: 2 SC

"Allow me to make up for it by summoning Dark Verger in defense mode." She continues.

DV: 1000 DEF

"But don't get too comfortable with him, because now I'm tuning him with Witch of the Black Rose to synchro summon Queen of Thorns in attack mode."

QoT: 2200 ATK

"And now it's time I attacked Hook the Hidden Knight. Go Queen of Thorns, Thorn Barrage." She calls out as her monster begins to attack.

"Not so fast. I play Hook the Hidden Knight's special ability. Now, since he was attacked while he's in attack mode, I can negate the attack by switching him and your queen to defense mode. Plus, you take 800 points of damage since he was switched from attack mode to defense mode." Hermann explains.

HtHK: 0000 DEF

QoT: 1800 DEF

Akiza: 3200

Akiza's attack is stopped as a purple light emits from Hermann's monster. Then, during the light, you notice Akiza's runner begin to lose control. She begins to spin out of control as she heads for a wall.

"Akiza!" You yell.

"Watch out!" The others finish.

Akiza barely manages to avoid hitting the wall, but at the cost of falling off her runner. "Oh no! If Akiza is unable to duel, or at least get back to her team's pit, then her team is disqualified. Can she make it?" The announcer yells.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Bad Crash

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Akiza managed to get back on her feet and get back on her runner too. She got it running and drove off back into the track.

“And it appears Akiza is coming back into the match!” The announcer said.

“Akiza, are you okay? Turn back to the pit so we can get you checked out.” You said on the comm.

“Not yet, Yuten. Not until I get back at this creep.” Akiza said as she drives.

“Oh boy.” You sighed.

“Looks like she’s not backing down. But I don’t know if she’s still in good shape.” Ren pointed out.

“That’s what I’m afraid of.” You said.

Akiza felt a little bit of pain in her arm. That fall was definitely not a pleasant ride. Still, she needs to finish this.

“Something’s not right. Right before I fell, I felt something holding on to my wheel. It was like I was caught. But by what?” Akiza thought in her head.

“Should’ve went back into the pit when you had the chance.” Hermann said.

“Well, that’s the thing. I don’t give up that easily.” Akiza said with pride.

“You wished you did.” Hermann said.

“I end my turn for now.” Akiza said.

“Then it’s on me.” Hermann draws.

Akiza: 3 SC
Hermann: 3 SC

“Now I summon...” Hermann was then cut off.

“Wait right there! If you’re going to summon a non-plant type monster from your hand, then you’ll need to pay one thousand life points for it first thanks to my queen’s effect.” Akiza said.

“Fine then. I’ll pay that many points so that I can summon Dark the Hidden Knight in attack mode.” Hermann said.

Hermann: 3000

DtHK: 800 ATK

“Now, go on for the attack, Dark!” Hermann said.

“My queen has much more defense points then your knight.” Akiza said.

“Who said anything about your queen? He’s gunning for you thanks to his effect.” Hermann said as Akiza got hit.

Akiza: 2400

“Then I’ll end my turn with one card face down.” Hermann said.

“Akiza seems to be keeping herself together for now! But will she last long enough?” The announcer said.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Akiza’s No Quitter

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"I'm up then. I... ugh draw." She says, fighting through her injury.

Akiza: 4 SC
Hermann: 4 SC

I can't say it for sure, but I just know that he's gotta be behind what happened to me. The question is, how? She wonders before making her move. I guess all I can do now is test the waters and keep my guard up.

"I'll start by switching my Queen into attack mode." She says.

QoT: 2200 ATK

"Then I'll summon Seed of Flame in attack mode."

SoF: 1600 ATK

"Now Queen of Thorns, attack Hook the Hidden Knight." She calls as her monster begins to attack. "And since he's already in defense mode, his special ability can't save him."

"That's why I play Dark the Hidden Knight's special ability." Hermann reveals. "By sacrificing him, I can switch the battle position of a defense position monster that's being attacked. So Hook the Hidden Knight is changed into attack mode, and you know what that means."

HtHK: 1600 ATK

"Oh no!" Akiza yells.

"That's right. Now I can use his ability to stop your attack by switching both monsters into defense mode." He adds.

QoT: 1800 DEF
HtHK: 0000 DEF

"And since Hook the Hidden Knight was switched to defense mode, you take 800 points of damage." He says. "You're gonna regret getting up from that wreck."

Here it comes, need to watch out. The light comes from Hermann's monster. As it happened, she kept her eye on her back wheel.

That's when she saw it. A shadowy hook coming from the ground near her back wheel. That must be what did it last time. The hook reached for her wheel, only for her to swerve out of the way at the last second, avoiding another crash as it went back into the ground.

Akiza: 1600

"Too close." You say to your team.

"I'll say." Ren adds. "Think she figured out what caused her to wreck last time?"

"I hope so." You say.

Akiza now knew what she needed to do, get rid of that knight, no matter the cost. "Well then, Seed of Flame can now attack your knight freely. Go Seed of Flame." She orders as her other monster begins to attack.

"Not so fast. I activate my trap, Shadow Concealing Darkness." Hermann retorts. "Now, defense position monsters I control can't be destroyed by battle. So tough luck."

Akiza's attack bounces off his like nothing happened. "I'll end my turn with a face-down."
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Dueling Through the Pain

“Now, it’s my turn.” Hermann

Akiza: 5 SC
Hermann: 5 SC

Hermann was going to make his move before his trap card suddenly got destroyed.

“What happened?” Akiza wondered.

“I guess one of your monsters is a light monster. If that’s the case, it gets destroyed when you do.” Hermann said.

“That’s what Queen of Thorns is. Sweet.” Ren said.

HtHK: 1600 ATK

You see the hook that came out of the shadows and it almost knock Akiza out again.

“That must be it. That must be why he was able to knock her down.” You said.

“I’m not too sure.” You said.

Hermann: 2400

"And now Seed of Flame has an opening right for your life points." Akiza's other monster shoots out a column of fire, burning away a good chunk of Hermann's life points.

Hermann: 800

"With that, I end my turn." Akiza wraps up.

"Not so fast." Hermann cuts in. "I activate my face-down, Revival Knight. Now since a fiend-type "Knight" monster was destroyed this turn, I can special summon him back during the end phase in defense mode. So say hello again to Hook the Hidden Knight."

HtHK: 0000 DEF

Shoot, so close. Akiza thinks to herself. Injury or not, I have one job here, to stop that thing before it even comes close to hurting the others, and that's what I'm gonna do.

“It all comes to me.” Hermann draws.

Akiza: 7 SC
Hermann: 7 SC

“Next, I’ll switch Hook the Hidden Knight to attack mode.” Hermann said.

Akiza’s queen got destroyed and her runner almost got caught again as she moved on to the right quickly.

Akiza: 1100

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Almost Got Hooked Again

choices: Hermann has lost, Nicolas is up
Akiza can't take anymore. You're up
Akiza returns, but Ren wants next go
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"I don't know what a shadow card is, but it won't save you." Akiza says as she draws.

Akiza: 8 SC
Hermann: 8 SC

Angel Baton? With this, I can use Speed World 2's effect to dish out 800 points of damage, just enough to finish him off. But if I do, then Hook the Hidden Knight will still be around for their next duelist. No, I have to finish him off the old fashioned way. She thinks.

"I'll start with the speed spell, Angel Baton. Now I can draw two cards as long as I discard one." She says as she draws more cards. Perfect. Just what I need. "So that's two in the hand and one in the graveyard. Next I'll summon Copy Plant in defense mode."

CP: 0000 DEF

"And now I'll activate Copy Plant's special ability and copy the level of one plant monster on my field. And I choose Seed of Flame." She continues.

CP: LvL 1->3

"And now I'll tune my level three Copy Plant with my level three Seed of Flame. From these two seeds shall bloom your defeat. I synchro summon Splendid Rose in attack mode."

SR: 2200 ATK

"And now, Queen of Thorns, attack Hook the Hidden Knight."

"I'm starting to think that crash made you lose brain cells. Hook the Hidden Knight's effect will save him once more." Hermann speaks up. "And you know what happens when he switches to defense mode."

HtHK: 0000 DEF
QoT: 1800 DEF

The light emitted from Hook once more, and once more, Akiza notices the shadow hook coming for her rear wheel. This time, though, Akiza didn't bother with just a simple swerve. No, she went as far away as possible, causing the hook to try and extend, revealing itself as a shadowy version of Hook the Hidden Knight.

"No way!" You say in awe as you finally get a good look at what she's been dodging this whole time.

"Get out of here. You won't make me crash again." Akiza yells at it as it retreats back into the ground.

Akiza: 300

"And now Hook the Hidden Knight is wide open. Go Splendid Rose, attack." She calls out as her other monster finally destroy's the knight.
