1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Blossoming Win

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
After it was done with, Akiza returns to the pit and pulls over to you.

“Told you I would get back at that creep.” Akiza said while holding her arm.

“You did well, Akiza.” You said as you kissed her. “Now let’s see that arm.” You said.

“No time. One of you has to go next. I don’t think I can go another round.” Akiza said.

“I’ll do it.” Ren said.

“Are you sure?” You wondered.

“Yep. You’ve got a girlfriend to take care of. I got this next bastard.” Ren said as he was passed with the baton and Akiza’s cards

“Thank you, Ren.” Akiza said.

Ren nodded before getting on his runner and driving off.

“It seems Ren has taken over for his team. Now, according to tournament rules, if the baton is passed on by the previous player, he keeps the counters, but starts off with four thousand life points.” The announcer stated. “And it’ll be Nicholas from Team Catastrophe that’ll be taking the driver seat.”

“I hope you won’t feel the burn like your teammate did.” Nicholas said with a grin.

“We’ll see.” Ren said as the driving began.

Ren: 4000; 8 SC
Nicholas: 4000; 8 SC

“I go.” Nicholas said as he draws.

Ren: 9 SC
Nicholas: 9 SC

“I place one card face down and end my turn.”
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Akiza’s Deserving Rest

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"That's it? One Card? Your funeral." Ren says as he draws.

Ren: 10 SC
Nicolas: 10 SC

"First, I switch Queen of Thorns into attack mode." He starts.

QoT: 2200 ATK

"Heh, I don't even need to play a card to win, Akiza's already done it for me. Queen of Thorns, attack him directly." He calls out.

"If Ren can connect with both Queen of Thorns and Splendid Rose, then Nicolas will have no life points left, leaving it all up to Heinz." The announcer says.

"Good thing I have my face-down card, Doom Ray." Nicolas says.

"What?" Ren asks.

"You didn't think Hook the Hidden Knight was the only shadow card we had, did you?" Nicolas replies. "And this one is quite special. When you declare a direct attack, I can deal damage to both of us equal to the number of cards in my hand times 800."

"But there's five cards in his hand." You note as you look at Akiza's arm while Michelle goes to get a doctor.

"But that means..." Akiza starts.

"Ren... no." Misty mutters as she looks at what the last shadow card did to Akiza.

"That means we both take 4000 points of damage." As he says this, a bright flash comes from Nicolas' trap, enveloping both duelists. Inside, Ren was being pestered by some creepy skull spirit things while Nicolas laughed manically, until the skulls descended upon him. "Wait, no! You're not supposed to attack me, just him." He screams.

"Sorry Nicolas, but it looks like Akiza's saving me twice today. She left me one last face-down, Ivy Shield. Now, since I'm about to take damage, I can release plant-type monsters on my field to negate the damage, as long as the combined attack points of the monsters I send is greater than or equal to the damage I would've taken. So now I can release Queen of Thorns and Splendid Rose, and since their combined attack is 4400, I take no damage from your card, but you do." Ren explains as Akiza's two monsters break down to form a shield made of plant vines, protecting Ren from the spirits.

Then, the trap card exploded into a massive fireball, consuming both duelists. "REN!!!" Your team calls out, worried about what just happened. To all your relief, however, you see Ren's runner emerge unharmed from the blast, with Nicolas on his shoulder.

"That's it folks. Team Catastrophe's Nicolas cannot return to the pit, which means Team Arcadia is the winner." The announcer calls.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Failed Sacrifice

choices: Fight off as much of the Ghost as you can
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“You saved my life. Why?” Nicholas asked.

“You maybe a lousy cheat and duelist, but even people like that don’t deserve to be left to die like that. Besides, I want you to think about today and learn something. If you choose cheap tricks instead of showing your true dueling strength, then you can’t be called a duelist.” Ren said hoping Catastrophe learned their lesson.

“I understand.” Nicholas said before Ren left.

He came back to the pit and sees you guys with smiles on your faces.

“Nice work out there, bro.” You said.

“Thank Akiza. Her cards saved me big time.” Ren said.

“It was nothing.” Akiza said smiling at Ren.

“How’s your arm, by the way?” Ren wondered.

“It’s sore, but I’ll manage.” Akiza said.

“That’s a relief.” Ren said before the announcer starts talking.

“Ladies and Gentleman, we just received breaking news that there were multiple accidents in the other preliminary round matches. Thankfully, no one was seriously injured. As we learn more, so will you.” The announcer said.

“That can’t be good.” You said worriedly.

You all ran outside to see Yusei, Jack, Bruno, Trudge, and Mina all outside of the stadium hopefully that they found out what’s going on.

“Guys. Any idea what’s happening?” You asked.

“We do. Turns out an army of the Ghost suddenly appeared and now they’re running rampant all over the city.” Yusei explained.

“Just our luck.” Ren said.

“But why though?” You wondered.

“That part we don’t know. But we do know that someone must’ve programmed these bots to attack the city.” Yusei said.

“If we find him, we can stop this at once.” Akiza said.

“But he could be anywhere and there could be hundreds of these bots all over the place.” Ren said.

“Not to mention their switching the duels into battle royal mode. It’s going to be a free for all.” Bruno said.

“And they can make battle damage real.” Yusei added.

“But we can do much more than battle damage. Officer Trudge, hope Sector Security won’t mind having their project being torn to bits just to save the city.” You said.

“It’s going to flush our money down the toilet, but, if it means the Ghost stays down for good, I guess it’s fine.” Trudge said.

“Wait!”

You all see a girl with blonde hair and in her runner with a man in a suit on his runner coming to you.

“It’s Sherry and Ellsworth.” Yusei said.

“We’re joining on this too. Any advantage you can get will be good against this army.” Sherry said while Ellsworth nodded.

“Thank you, Sherry.” Yusei said.

“I’m coming too.” Akiza said getting up only to feel much pain in her arm.

“No, Akiza. Your arm is pretty messed up right now. Just stay here and get healed. Misty, keep her safe until we get back.” You said.

“You got it.” Misty agreed.

“Sion, Michelle, I need you two to go back to the movement and keep those students safe.” You said to them as they nodded.

“Yes, sir.” Michelle agreed.

“I’ll give you both a ride back.” Mina offered.

“Okay. We’ll split into groups to take them down quicker. Ren, you’re with me.” You said as Ren nodded.

“I’ll go with Sherry and Ellsworth.” Yusei said.

“Think you can handle riding with me, Jack?” An officer named Kaz asked Jack.

“If you don’t do anything that’ll get you hurt again.” Jack said.

“Just be careful.” Akiza said.

“We will. Promise.” You said as you kissed her.

“You too, Ren.” Misty said.

“You got it.” Ren said as he and Misty kissed as well.

“Alright, let’s ride.” You said as you all got on your runners and left to save the city.

What do you do?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: New Domino Under Attack

choices: It's Sherry, Yusei's dueling the leader
It's a doctor, Akiza's run off
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Alright bro, what's the plan?" Ren asks.

"There's too many Ghosts. There's no way of knowing where the leader is. For now, lets just use our powers to skip the whole dueling part and get right to making these guys into spare parts." You tell him.

"I can live with that." He says. "Chew 'em up and spit 'em out."

"You got it." You say as you see a small horde of Ghost bots on the move. "Looks like we've got our first target." You and Ren make your way to get as close to the combat lane they are in.

"I got this one. Rip 'em apart Beelze." Ren says as he slaps his ace on his duel disk. The two-headed dragon flies ahead of the Ghost pack before turning around above the poor guy they were attacking and firing a blast from each mouth, destroying all of them in one shot.

"So let's see, that's... te..twe..thir... sixteen. Sixteen of those bots under my belt. Think you can top that bro?" Ren asks.

"Let's find out." You say as you spot another pack on a combat lane not too far from you attacking two more duelists. "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, help them out."

Now your beast pops out and makes his way over to the combat lane. "Go Neutron Blast!" You call as your dragon blows through all of them, saving the two.

"Thanks man." You hear one of them say.

"No problem, now get to safety, both of you." You tell them.

"Got it." He says as he leads the other and gets off the road.

"So how many was that?" Ren asks as he pulls up next to you.

"I'd say about twenty. You better pick up the pace if you don't want to be left behind." You tell him. Then, there was an incoming call on your monitor. "Who's this now?" You wonder as you answer it.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Ghost Busting

choices: Join with you two in the fight
Have her return to HQ. They need a guardian angel
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Sir, this is the doctor you requested. I’m afraid Akiza has run off.” The doctor said.

“Are you kidding me?! She’s such a stubborn girl. Okay. I’ll go find her.” You said before hanging up.

“Is it Akiza?” Ren asked.

“It is. I’d better go find her before these robo creeps do.” You said.

“I’ll cover you.” Ren said.

You two drove off for a minute before you see Akiza driving on dueling highway with a bunch of Ghosts driving behind her.

“She’s going to get overrun.” Ren said.

“Not for long.” You said as you picked up the pace.

You made it to her and you both uses your dragons to smash every single one of these robots before attending to Akiza.

“I thought I told you to stay and get healed.” You said.

“I know. I just couldn’t just standby and let you handle this situation by yourselves. We’re a team, after all.” Akiza said.

“Still, it’s too dangerous for you.” You said.

“We’ve faced tougher situations than this, Yuten. Like it or not, I’m helping.” Akiza argued.

“Don’t you think that...”

You stopped talking when Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon got knocked down.

“Blue-Eyes!” You said.

You see another Ghost coming in with his monsters with an evil grin on his face.

“Now, warrior, prepare to meet your fate.” The Ghost said evilly.

“In your dreams!” Akiza said as she sent Black Rose Dragon to take him down for the count. “I may have a bad wing, but I can still fight on.” Akiza said.

“Thanks.” You said.

“Bro, we need to get going now.” Ren said.

What should you have Akiza do?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Akiza Needs Back Up

choices: Your eyes start to glow, Yusei's in trouble
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Alright Akiza. There's no way I can tell you to sit this out at this point. But you're still in no shape to turbo duel. If you're gonna fight like this, at least head back to HQ. If these things attack there, it'll be completely unguarded. You can keep it safe, though." You tell her.

"But..." She starts to object.

"Please Akiza, do it for me at least. I don't want to risk you getting in another crash so soon after the match today. At least do it to put my mind at ease, please." You beg her.

"Alright Yuten, I'll do it. On one condition, you come home safe to me. No exploding factories or duel bot clones of yourself." She tells you.

"I promise." You say as you notice you're getting close to Headquarters. "We're getting close."

"Alright then. Stay safe you two." She says as she pulls off the road to make her way back.

"You sure about this bro?" Ren asks. "We could use all the firepower we could get."

"I'm sure. If Akiza's gonna duel while injured, I'd prefer she stand on the ground while she does it instead of driving at over three hundred miles an hour." You justify.

"Fair enough." He says.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Have the Queen Guard the Castle

choices: Just try to smash this guy
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Just then, your eyes starting to glow and you guessed something is wrong.

“Bro? Are you alright?” Ren said seeing you like this.

“It’s Yusei. Feels like he needs help. We need to get to him now.” You said.

“Are you sure it’s him?” Ren wondered.

“Positive. Now come on.” You said.

You and Ren drove on the road until you see Yusei along with Sherry and Ellsworth being chased by a whole lot of Ghosts.

“It’s like the whole army has them closed in.” Ren stated.

“Well, let’s change that.” You said as you two go in to help.

You and Ren go down until you see Sherry and Ellsworth, who are in pretty bad shape.

“Are you two alright?” You asked them as you both checked on their conditions.

“Yes. Thank you.” Ellsworth said struggling to get on his feet.

“Never mind us. Yusei is being pressed on by tons of Ghosts. He can’t hold them back alone.” Sherry said.

“Ren, get these two to safety. I’m going to help Yusei.” You said.

“Can do, chief.” Ren said as you drove off.

You looked all over until you see Yusei being chased alone by the Ghost army. They don’t even know that you’re tailing them, which gives you the element of surprise.

“It’s over, Yusei Fudo. There’s nowhere to run or hide.” The Ghosts all said together.

“He won’t need to.” You said as you summoned three Blue-Eyes this time to blast some of them away.

“Who did that?!” The Ghost wondered as they all spotted you.

“Surprise, assholes!” You cried out as your dragons blast every single one of them with White Lightning.

“Thanks, Yuten.” Yusei said.

“No problem. Now let’s get out of here.” You said.

You and Yusei picked up the pace as you see another runner that’s white with someone in a white runner suit driving it.

“Who’s that?” You wondered.

“Don’t know, but I’ve got a bad feeling about him.” Yusei said as the duelist comes closer.

“You have interfered in plans and my schemes long enough. Now you’ll face punishment at the hands of my Meklord Emperor.” The duelist said.

“You’re Meklord Emperor? So then, this Ghost invasion and everything else that happened, it was you?” You said.

“So what if I am, warrior?” He said.

“Why are you doing this?” Yusei wondered.

“You couldn’t comprehend the reasons for my actions. Your feeble human minds can’t withstand the grand idea governing the pure nobles.” The duelist said.

“Well, here’s a tip. Don’t try to play god.” You said.

“And don’t try to play hero. I’m about to bury the both of you.” The duelist said.

What do you do?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Helping Yusei

choices: You vs. The Ghost Army, all alone
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"We'll see about that." You say as you prepare to attack, only for a man to ram into this unknown duelist, knocking him back a bit. Once he stabilized, you got a good look at your new ally. It was that Visor guy from before.

"It's you." You say. "What are you doing here Visor?"

"Helping you out, that's what. I need to talk with Yusei for a bit. Think you can keep this guy busy for a bit?" He asks.

"I don't know who you think you are calling the shots, but if the only hope to beating this guy and stopping all this means listening to you, then I don't have much choice." You admit. "Protector with Eyes of Blue, let's get this guy." You say as you slap the card on your duel disk, causing Tema to emerge and take a swing at the duelist with his sword, only for your opponent to block with a blade of his own.

"Please, how pathetic." He mocks as he has no problem holding back the massive sword while staying balanced.

"Oh yeah? Well let's see how pathetic this is!" You yell as you cut your speed and fall back, slamming into him and letting Yusei and Visor get way ahead until they were out of sight.

"You fool. All you'll accomplish with a crash is killing yourself." He says.

"Well I don't plan to crash or die today. I made a promise that I would come home safe and I plan to keep it." You tell him as you both level off.

"Then it's a shame that you'll have to break that promise." He taunts. "You'll never stop us or our Grand Design."

"Us? So there are more of you? Who was it that attacked Luna and Leo the other day? Answer me." You tell him.

"You dare make demands of me? I have no reason to give you any information." He says.

You were about to attack him again with your powers, only for another one of those Ally Salvos to crash into one of your dragons. You look behind you to see another small army of Ghosts closing in. "I'd love to stay and chat, but it seems you have your hands full already, and I'm only after Yusei Fudo." He says before speeding away again.

"Hey, get back here!" You call out. Damn it. You want to go after him, but if you did, then this army behind you would follow you right to Yusei. You had to take them out before you could even consider going after that guy.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Cavalry's Arrived

choices: Show them the might of the Warrior with Eyes of Blue
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Prepare to perish, fool.” One of the Ghost said as he draws. “Come to me, Ally of Justice Quarantine.”

AoJQ: 1700 ATK

“And it’s bad news for you because he prevents any light monster from being special summoned.” He said.

“Just what I need.” You complained.

“I then place one card face down and end my turn.” He said.

“It’s my turn now.” Another Ghost draws. “I summon Ally of Justice Nullifier from my hand.” He said.

AoJN: 1600 ATK

“Now destroy that Protecter.” He said as Tema was taken out.

“Tema!” You said as you got damaged.

You: 2400

“I then placed one card face down and end my turn.” He said.

“It’s my turn.” A third draws.

“I play the trap, Ally Support. This will give control of one of my Ally of Justice monsters to another player and I’ll give Quarantine to my partner.” The first one said.

“I play the same trap card to give Nullifier to him as well.” The second said.

“With that out of the way, I can now summon the tuner monster, Night’s End Sorcerer.” The third said.

NES: 1300 ATK

“A tuner monster?!” You said.

“Indeed and I’ll put him to use by tuning him with Ally of Justice Nullifier and Quarantine. I synchro summon Ally of Justice Decisive Armor!” He said.

AoJDA: 3300 ATK

“That’s not good.” You said.

“Next I’ll use its special ability since you have a light monster out. By discarding every card in my hand to my graveyard, I can see your hand and send every single light monster you have to the graveyard.” He said.

You show your hand and you only have two light monsters shown.

“Those two have to go. Oh yes. Did I forget to mention that you take damage equal to their combined attack points?” He said evilly.

“Oh great.” You said.

You: 1300

“Go, Decisive Armor! Send his dragon into oblivion!” He said before one Blue-Eyes got destroyed.

You: 1000

“I end my turn.” He said.

As the Ghosts were taking their turns. You realized that this could be too much for you as this could be it.

“Mom, Dad, Ren, Yusei, everyone. I’m sorry. Looks like this as far as I can go in my life.” You thought as you have one last image of the smiling face of your girlfriend, Akiza, in your mind. “Akiza, looks like I’m not coming home. I will always love you.” You thought as you wait for the end.

“Do not give up on yourself just yet.”

Your eyes shot opened when you heard someone talking. You looked to see that it’s your Blue-Eyes that talked to you.

“You... You spoke to me?” You asked in awe.

“I have. Listen, warrior, you still have a lot to do in your world. Do not allow yourself to fall because it looks hopeless. Rise up and fight.” Blue-Eyes said to you.

You know that your dragon is right. You can’t give up now and you’re not going to let down everything you stand for.

“You’re finished!” Another Ghost said making his attack.

It was blocked as the Ghost was shocked. You then turned to let them see your eyes glowing so
much.

“Impossible! How did you stop my onslaught?” The Ghost asked in shock,

“Remember when you made me discard my light monsters? Well, this one saved me. It’s known as Electromagnetic Turtle. By removing it from my graveyard from play, I can stop this battle phase.” You said.

“Why you!” He said angrily.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Words of The Dragon

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Then I guess it's my move." You hear a voice say from nearby. You look to see Ren on a nearby road with Mystic Tomato and Double Coston.

"Ren, your back." You say in relief. He finds a small ramp which he uses to jump onto your combat lane.

"You bet I'm back. It's a brother's job to protect his baby bro, and that's what I'm about to do." He says with a thumbs up.

"Thanks bro." You say.

"Just buy me a burger later and we'll call it even. For now, I'm seeing a lot of tasty morsels out there, and I have just the thing to chow down. I summon Plaguespreader Zombie to the field." He says.

PZ: 400 ATK

"And now I'll tune my Zombie to my Mystic Tomato and Double Coston to synchro summon Beelzeus of the Diabloic Dragons in attack mode."

BotDD: 4000 ATK

"And now I'll use his special ability to drain that Decisive Armor of all it's attack points and use them to restore my life points." He says.

AoJDA: 0000 ATK

Ren: 7300

"But I'm not gonna attack him, I'm gonna attack one of you goons directly. And since Beelzeus didn't drain any of your monsters, you aren't protected by his ability that halves the damage. Go Beelzeus, attack him directly." Ren says as his monster fires a blast at one of the first two Ghosts, blasting it into a wreck on the road, as well as a few unfortunate bots behind that one.

Ghost: 0000

"I'll end my turn with a face-down." He closes.

"Then it's my move." Another voice can be heard. To your relief and a bit of disappointment, you see Akiza riding nearby.

"Akiza!? I thought you were protecting Headquarters?" You ask.

"They can handle themselves, and my mark told me you were in danger, so I had to come, injury or no." She says. Damnit you both loved and hated her stubbornness sometimes.

"Well since you're here anyway, might as well join the party." You offer. Like Ren, she too managed to find a way to ramp her way onto your combat lane by your side.

"I think it's about time we showed these clowns what Team Arcadia is all about." She says.

"Go for it." Ren cheers.

"I summon Twilight Rose Knight to the field." She begins.

TRK: 1000 ATK

"And with his special ability, I can special summon one plant-type monster in my hand that's level four or below, so say hello to Lord Poison."

LP: 1500 ATK

"And now my Knight will give Lord Poison a little tune-up, to synchro summon my Black Rose Dragon!" She says as her ace monster hits the field.

BRD: 2400 ATK

"And now Black Rose Dragon, attack that Decisive Armor with Rose Retaliation!" She says as the two monsters battle and the Ghost's is destroyed. Lucky for you, Akiza didn't hold anything back, as her attack wrecked another large group of the bots behind the one that had Decisive Armor.

Ghost: 1600

"I'll end my turn with two face-downs." She wraps up.

"Then it's my move." You say.

"We are with you, warrior. Always." Your dragon says.

"I activate the speed spell Speed Resurrection. Now by removing ten of the speed counters all your turns have given me, I'm allowed to special summon one monster from anyone's graveyard. So say hello again to my Blue-Eyes White Dragon." You start.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"Now it's time. Time for a little fusion!" You yell out.

"But you only have two dragons bro. You hit your head or something after I left?" Ren asks.

"No, because this isn't for my Ultimate Dragon, this is for something else entirely." You say as your eyes glow blue along with your entire runner.

"Yuten?" Akiza asks with concern.

"Now it's time to show you the power of the dragons! I contact fuse my two Blue-Eyes White Dragons in order to fusion summon Blue-Eyes Twin Burst Dragon!!!" You announce as your two dragons combine into a two-headed version of themselves.

BETBD: 3000 ATK

"Woah!" Ren awes.

"That's amazing." Akiza adds.

"You have done it warrior. This is the next stage of our evolution, and you were the cause of it." Your new dragon speaks.

I'm honored. Now let's put it to use. You mentally tell it.

"Now, Twin Burst Dragon, attack Ally of Justice Garadholg!" You call out. Your new beast fires blasts from both it's mouths, destroying the monster and yet another swathe of duel bots with your powers.

Ghost: 2600

"And don't get too comfortable. because Twin Burst Dragon can attack two monsters per turn, so how about you blast through that Ally of Justice Cyclone Creator. Attack again." You reveal as you monster destroys one last group of duel bots. None remained after that attack, leaving you clear.

"Wohoo! We did it!" Ren says.

"Yeah. That was amazing Yuten. Where did you even get that monster?" Akiza asks.

"It's a long story, but right now Yusei needs help, come on!" You tell them as you all punch it to try and catch up with Yusei.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Team United

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You and the others looked on to find where Yusei could be until lightning comes striking down nearly hitting you.

“That was close.” You said keeping balance.

“Where that lightning come from?” Akiza wondered.

“Probably whoever Yusei’s dueling.” You said.

“Then let’s put the petal to the metal.” Ren said.

You all looked over to see Yusei battling the guy from before and it doesn’t look very good for him.

“Face it, Yusei. The only support you have is a stone tablet that can’t do anything. You have nothing and no one left.” He said.

“Oh yeah?” You said to get his and Yusei’s attention. “Then what are we? Chopped liver?”

“Yuten! Akiza! Ren!” Yusei said.

“It seems my army had failed to get rid of you.” The mysterious duelist said.

“And that’s bad new for you.” You said before seeing Meklord Emperor Wisel. “I see you’ve got yourself in a pickle, Yusei.”

“No kidding!” Yusei said.

“Silence worm!” The mystery duelist said as he had lightning striking down on you three.

“NO!” Yusei cried.

“Well, that’s three annoyances down.” He said before seeing you all coming out unharmed with your dragons saving you all.

“We’re not down just yet, pal.” You said as you all picked up the pace.

“No matter. The damage is already been done. My army has New Domino up in panic and trembling with fear. Face it, no matter what, you’re all doomed to fail and fall.” The duelist said and laughed evilly.

He’s right, there’s still so much chaos going on in different directions. There’s no time to go back now. That’s when an explosion happened and you all looked down to see the Ghosts all knocked down.

“What’s this?” The duelist said.

“What just happened?” Ren wondered.

“I don’t know.” You said before getting a call. “Hello?”

“Yuten. Hope you won’t mind us giving you a hand.” A voice said that sounded familiar to you.

“Tetsu?!” You said surprised to hear him.

“In the flesh. And I’m not the only one.” Tetsu said.

It was then shown that the psychic duelists are tearing apart the remaining ghosts while protecting the citizens.

“What in the world?!” Akiza said in awe.

“What are you doing?!” You asked Tetsu.

“We’re here to help. Sion made extra runners for us. So those who can drive can smash these bucket of bolts while those who can’t can get the citizens to saftey.” Tetsu said as you can’t believe what you heard.

*********

A family nearly got hurt before a female psychic destroyed the Ghosts to save them.

“Are you all okay?” She asked them.

“You.....you saved our lives!” A mother said to her.

“Not yet, I didn’t. Not until I get you somewhere safe. Come on.” She said while getting them away from the chaos.

**********

“Get out of our city, rust buckets!” A male psychic said as he smashed the robots into scrap.

**********

“Quick before more of them gets here!” Another psychic said escorting a bunch of people away.

**********

“There’s more where that came from! Come on, boys!” Another psychic said with his friends against the corrupt robots.

**********

“I..... I don’t know what to say.” You said completely stunned.

“Don’t worry about that. Just do what you got to do. We’ve got you covered.” Tetsu said.

“You got it.” You said before hanging up.

You looked to see the duelist looking completely pissed off.

“Well, looks like your little invasion plan is not really working out for you, huh?” You said smiling.

“You little! That is it! Once I take care of Yusei, you’re next, Yuten Anjiou!” He said not happy.

“Yeah. Good luck with that.” You said.

“I don’t need luck. Especially, since I have Yusei’s Stardust Dragon on my side for Wisel.” He said.

“Not for long. Just watch.” Yusei said.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Psychic Revelation

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"My draw!" Yusei yells out.

Yusei: 2 SC
???: 12 SC

"I summon Rescue Warrior." He starts.

RW: 1600 ATK

"Now go, attack Meklord Emperor Wisel with all your might."

"You fool, Rescue Warrior is no match for Meklord Emperor." The man says.

"He's right, just look at that thing." You say.

MEW: 5600 ATK

"Maybe not, but when he attacks, any battle damage to me becomes zero." Yusei mentions.

"That may be, but you still have to deal with the special ability of Skiel Carrier V. So since I destroyed a monster in battle, you now take 300 points of damage." The man adds as his monster fires a beam of light, damaging Yusei.

Yusei: 300

"That's true, but Rescue Warrior has an ability too. Since he was taken down, it now activates, letting me regain control of one monster of mine that's on your side of the field. With this monster back, I'm back too and more dangerous than ever. Stardust Dragon, come home." Yusei says as his monster is fished free from the Meklord Emperor.

SD: 2500 ATK

"Welcome back to team good guy Stardust. And because Stardust has switched teams, Meklord Emperor's attack points now decrease."

MEW: 3000 ATK

"Looks like Yusei might pull off a win." You say as you watch him revive a tuner monster and end his turn.

"So even getting Stardust back, you still couldn't mount an attack." The man gloats.

"Everyone's depending on us Stardust." Yusei says as his beast roars as if agreeing.

"Please, you're all bark and no bite. Now my Meklord Emperor is quite a different story." The man brags as his monster whips up a storm. "Everyone hold on tight." Ren says as you all brace yourselves.

You can see the duel still going, but you can't make out what they're saying through the winds. What you do know is that you can see this Melord Emperor thing about to steal Yusei's Stardust again.

"Oh no!" You say. "He needs to do something or he's done for."

"You're not getting Stardust this time." Yusei says as he revs his engine. You then see his and Akiza's marks start glowing, as do your eyes and deck. "Time to act. Level two synchro tuner Formula Synchron tune with level eight synchro monster Stardust Dragon."

"No way, you're synchro summoning during my turn, but how?" The man questions.

"Some things defy explanation. But the one thing that won't be defied again is my attempt at creating the ultimate monster. My attempt... to Accel Synchro!!!" Yusei yells as you can see slipstreams form around him before the synchro rings surround him and his monsters. Then, he reappeared, now with a new monster. "Behold, the Shooting Star Dragon!"

SSD: 3300 ATK

"What the heck did he just do?" Ren asks.

"I don't know, but that looks like one strong monster." You say as you watch Yusei negate his monster's destruction and the man's attack all at once.

"I now activate another of Shooting Star Dragon's abilities. An ability that allows me to take a peek at the top five cards of my deck to see how many tuner monsters there are, and then attack that many of your monsters." Yusei reveals.

"Woah." You all awe as one by one, Yusei was able to draw five tuner monsters all together.

"Alright Stardust, attack Meklord Emperor Wisel!" He orders as his new monster attacks the mechanical menace five times in a row, leading to Yusei's win.

???: 0000
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Yusei’s Big Moment

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“You okay?” You asked the guy who is messed up before he was being levitated up.

“Primo is fine. He doesn’t need your pity. But it surprised me that you would even offer him after all he has done. You truly are fascinating.” An old man in a white robe with a kid next to him said.

“Who are you guys?” You asked them.

“If you must know, we are the Emperors of Iliaster. I am Jacob.” Jacob said.

“And I am Lester. Of course, you already met Primo here.” The kid named Lester said.

“What do you want from us?” Akiza asked them.

“Simple. We want to repair the future.” Jacob said.

“Repair the future? Is it even broken?” You wondered.

“So broken then you realize. You see, there is a balance in this world between the good and the wicked. We are here to tip the balance to us and lead the future to the path we offer to all.” Jacob said.

“By having Primo over there destroying our city?” You said.

“Well, that was part of the plan since he was the one that used your program to create his Ghost army and boy did it end bad.” Lester said.

“So it was him that had Lazar took his program.” You answered.

“Bingo. Of course he’s in hiding and I don’t blame him one bit.” Lester said.

“Also, we are responsible for what has happened this far in your journey. We were the ones that had Roman destroy Yusei’s father’s reactor. But, it ended in failure and Zero Reverse happened. The effects still flows throw time. But we have found a solution to this problem.” Jacob said.

“That is?” You asked.

“Destroy New Domino City.” Jacob said.

“You’re insane.” Ren said.

“By destroying this city, we destroy the source of the effects.” Lester said.

“That won’t happen because you’ll fail just like Primo did.” You said.

“You have it all wrong, Yuten Anjiou. He wasn’t trying to destroy this city. He wanted you all to think that way.” Jacob said.

“What sense does that make?” Akiza said.

“All will be revealed at the World Racing Grand Prix.” Jacob said.

Just then, another stone tablet appeared and landed next to Jacob, where he got his deck before the tablet got destroyed. An earthquake then happened and you all see a giant golden brown robot that could mean one thing.

“Behold, Meklord Emperor Granel!” Jacob said.

You then got the vision of the Emperors playing in your head.

“It’s.... the final Meklord Emperor.” You figured out.

“So you had a glimps of the might of their power. Though, if you want to stop us, duel us at the World Racing Grand Prix.” Jacob said.

“Till then, bye.” Lester said before creating a portal and left and Granel vanished.

This just left you with more questions than answers. You wished you could get more out of them. Guess you’ll wait until the tournament to find out.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Facing The True Enemies

choices: Rounding up the students to go home
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Yusei!" You hear called out. You all turn to see Jack and Crow pull up on their own runners to see what happened. "What's going on here?" Jack asks as they dismount and run up to you.

"It's a long story." You say as you begin the long process of explaining everything that happened since you split up to fight the Ghosts. From your students pitching in, to yours and Yusei's new dragons, as well as the final warning from the Emperors of Illiaster. "And that's all we know." You wrap up.

"So whatever these Emperors of Illiaster are planning, it ends with destroying New Domino City to somehow save the future?" Crow sums up.

"That's what the creepy bearded guy said." Ren answers. "Now whether it's true or not is another story."

"Whatever the case, he says it'll all come to a head at the World Racing Grand Prix. So I guess that's where we'll be having this little showdown to save the city." You add.

"Do we even know what team they are so we know who we have to take down?" Crow asks.

"Not yet. But, we're on opposing halves of the bracket. So as long as we both win all our duels, one of us should face them at some point or another." You mention.

"I suppose that's sound logic." Akiza says. "But right now, I'm more interested in those cards you two got."

At her mention, Yusei pulls out his new Shooting Star Dragon card and shows it to all of you. "This used to be a blank card until my duel with that Primo guy. Then, when I unlocked the power of Accel Synchro, the card took form into what you see now." He explains.

You search through your deck as well. Sure enough, where you once kept that blank fusion card, now sat your new Blue-Eyes Twin Burst Dragon. "Same here. I kept hearing about how I needed to unlock the next level of my dragons' power, but I wasn't sure how until those duel bots had me cornered. That's when I heard the voice of my dragon loud and clear. He helped me achieve this power." You tell them.

Hearing your story, Ren and Akiza pull out their own blank cards. "Guess it really is up to us to find out what these are destined to be." Ren says with Akiza nodding.

A message popped up on all your monitors. Your runner was closest so you all gathered around to see what it said. "Due to damages to the city and dueling infrastructure, the World Racing Grand Prix primary bracket first round has been postponed." You read aloud. "Looks like our showdown with Illiaster will have to wait."

Everyone nods in agreement. "Then let's not be idle. Everyone, use this time wisely to improve yourselves." Jack says as he gets back to his runner. "We'll need it for our battle with these guys."

"He's right." Yusei says as he and Crow mount their runners too.

"And Yuten?" Jack asks.

"Yeah Jack?" You respond.

"Just remember that you still owe me a duel. So don't even think of going and losing until we've squared off." He warns.

"Wouldn't dream of it." You say as the three of them drive off. "Guess we should head back too."

With agreement from your team, you mount up and begin to make your way home.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Plans For The Battle

choices: Stay with Akiza to help with her injury
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You decided to go round up the students first before heading home. You lay out the message to all of them to turn back now. They all got the message and they all returned home with you three. Once there, you all went inside and you gathered them up in one area to give them a little talk.

“What you did was unquestionably reckless and stupid. No doubt about it. However, the only thing I could say is...” You said as the students were anxious until you say. “Well done.”

“Mr. Yuten?” A student asked.

“You heard me. Even though it was dangerous for you, you all went in to save the lives of the citizens of New Domino. For that, I applaud for your bravery. Hopefully, the population would start to see us much more differently now thanks to your actions. I would say that, for today, you are all my heroes.” You said as everyone applauded. “You may leave.” Everyone then leave.

“That was very noble of you to say that.” Akiza said to you.

“They earned it. As for you, I was going to have a bone to pick with you, but you helped me out too. You and Ren both did. Thanks for having my back.” You said.

“It’s what teammates do.” Ren said patting you on the shoulder.

“Exactly.” Akiza said before kissing you on the cheek.

“So, now what do we do?” Ren asked you.

“Let’s take the time to relax for now. All of that battle robots in a near death situation was quite the rush.” You said as they all agreed.

What do you do with your time.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Commending On The Students Bravery

choices: Skip to when the doctor arrives
Yours and Akiza's parents come to visit you
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Now if you don't mind Ren, I have to teach a certain someone about how bedrest works." You say as you put your arm around Akiza and begin to lead her to your room.

"Go for it bro. I've gotta go check up on Misty anyway. Need to make sure she's safe after all this." He says as he heads down to his room.

As you begin to head upstairs, you tighten your grip on her, making her tense up. "Ow! Not so tight." She says as she clutches her arm.

You raise your brow a bit at this. "So you're too hurt for me to make sure you're safe going up stairs, but not too hurt to jump on a duel runner and go fight when I asked you to stay back and recover?" You ask.

"To help you, remember?" She asks with her own raised brow. "I was able to ride the adrenaline from beating Hermann into the start of the battle, then when I sensed you were in trouble, that carried me the rest of the way. Now that you're safe, the adrenaline high is dying down. Does that answer satisfy you?"

"Plenty." You say as you kiss her cheek. "I'm sorry. I didn't mean to seem ungrateful. I just don't want to see you get hurt anymore. I was terrified when I saw you crash during the match."

"I know. But don't think I'm going to be sitting out the final battle with these Emperors." She says as you finally reach your door and head in.

"Wouldn't dream of it." You say while gently laying her down on the bed. "There. Now I'm gonna go call back the doctor you ran away from before. Can I trust you not to run away this time?"

"That depends, are you gonna run off and need me to save you again?" She teases, making you roll your eyes a bit. "I'll be good, I promise."

"Good, now wait here." You say as you head over and dial up the number you saw on your runner screen.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Tending to the Injured Rose

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
After a little while, the doctor that Akiza ran away from comes to the room and begins to examine her hurting arm. After some testing, the doctor got the results.

“Okay, Ms. Izinski, it doesn’t appeared to be too bad. So, you’ll be well again by the end of tomorrow.” The doctor said to her.

“Thank you, doc.” Akiza said.

“I’ll be right back with the pills she’ll need to recover easily.” He said to you.

“Of course.” You said before the doctor left and you turned to your bed resting girlfriend. “Well, looks like you’ll be back on your feet again very soon.”

“Good thing too. No way I’m staying down and letting you and Ren have all the fun.” Akiza said.

“That’s the spirit. So, is there anything you need while you rest?” You asked her.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Checking Akiza’s Injury

choices: The food arrives, time to eat
Ren drops by, saying he's gonna head out to pick up Misty
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Well... apart from needing my feet rubbed after fighting so hard to save you..." She says teasingly before chuckling. "Hehe. No, I think I'm good. All I need is your company."

"Alright then. Well, maybe I'll take you up on that later." You say, sharing her laugh. "Right now, it's close to dinner time, and I'm guessing you're as starved as I am after all that fighting, so how about I cook us up something for once?"

"Oooo. I didn't think you cooked." She coos.

"I can't. I spend all my time on the street living on canned food and bread until I got my apartment, where I would make such delicacies as burned eggs and rice. So if you smell smoke, you know why." You warn with a laugh.

She continues to laugh with you. "How about instead of burning us to the ground you just order some food up from the mess hall?" She asks.

"But where's the romance in that?" You jest. "But, I suppose there's less romance in being extra crispy people after a failed cooking attempt, so I guess I'll do that." You say as you reach for the phone.

Before you can dial, though, the doctor returns with a bottle of pills. "Here you go Ms. Izinski. Just take one of these every four hours and you should be good as new in no time." He says as he hands the bottle to her.

"Thanks doc." She says while taking the pills and setting them on the night table. "Sorry about running out on you before."

"It's quite alright." He says, unfazed by this before looking up at you then back to her. "I've done my fair share of stupid things for love too." He says, making you both blush a tad. "Take care you two, and call me if her condition worsens."

"Will do doc." You say as you show him to the door. "Thanks again." You shut the door before turning back to Akiza, phone in hand. "Now about dinner." You say as you begin to dial up the mess hall.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Tending to your Rose

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You then hear a knock on the door before you go to open it to see Ren outside.

“Hey, bro. What’s up?” You asked him.

“Nothing really. I just came by to let you know that I’m going to get Misty. I should be back in a little while.” Ren explains.

“Of course.” You said.

“Wait, Ren. Before you go, I just want to say thank you for taking my place at the last round.” Akiza said to your brother.

“Hey, like I told little bro here, that’s what teammates do. Speaking of which, how are you feeling?” Ren asked her.

“Good. The doctor said I should make a good recovery soon enough.” Akiza said.

“That’s great news.” Ren said before hugging her as a way of hoping for a speedy recovery. “Well, I’m off now. See ya in a little bit.” Ren said before leaving.

You closed the door before you lay down next to Akiza in bed and give her a nice rubbing on her head. While you wait for dinner, you were in deep thought about the new fusion monster you required. It really saved your neck big time when you were close to Death’s doorstep. You weren’t sure why, but it was a good thing that it even happened. Akiza then noticed your expression and talk to you about it.

“Are you thinking about what happened in your duel with those bots?” Akiza wondered.

“I am. During that battle, I was close to death before I finally managed to talk to Blue-Eyes. I’m not sure how, but I can guess that I just need to let something out from inside me.” You explained.

“Sounds like a crazy experience.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. After that, I finally got my new dragon that you and Ren saw. It truly was amazing.” You said.

“I’ll say.” Akiza said before using her good arm to pull you in to kiss you deeply before looking each other in the eyes. “When this is over, I’m going to hold you so tightly that even death can’t take you from me.” Akiza said smoothly.

“I’ll take that offer.” You said before kissing her easy.

With what you have planned when this tournament is over, she’ll definitely get her wish.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Ren drops by, saying he's gonna head out to...

choices: You finish feeding Akiza and start eating for yourself
Akiza grabs the plate from you and eats for herself
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Soon enough, there was a knock at your door. "That's either our food or Ren coming to say he locked his room key in his room." You joke as you get up to answer it. As expected, it was a server with a cart of food at the ready for you. "Good, bring it in by the bed."

She wheels it right next to where Akiza lay before turning back to you. "Will that be all sir?" She asks.

"Yup, I think we'll be okay from here." You tell her. "Thank you."

"My pleasure sir." She says before bowing and leaving.

"Alright Akiza, what are you in the mood for?" You ask.

She eyes the tray to see what looks good. "Hmmm. Ooo, that there, the pork." She says, pointing to a plate of roast pork.

"As you wish." You say as you take a seat next to her and grab the plate and start cutting it up.

"Yuten, I can take care of myself, you know." She whines.

"I'm sure you can. But I feel like taking a page from your book and doing what I want anyway." You tease, getting you a gentle punch in the side from her good arm.

"Smart aleck." She says while returning to a neutral position.

"Kidding, kidding." You defend as you finally finish cutting up everything as you stab a bite with a fork. "Now say ahh."

She gives you a cold glare for a bit before her smile returns and opens up, letting you put the piece into her mouth. "There we go." You say as you go for another piece for her.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Dinnertime Playing

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“There we go. Was that tasty?” You asked her as you finished feeding her.

“Yeah. You know you didn’t have to do that.” Akiza said feeling a bit full.

“With a bad arm like that, I couldn’t just leave you hanging like this.” You said.

“I appreciate it from you.” Akiza smiles at you.

You smiled back as you started to the chicken that was on there next. After you ate, you have the chef to return and take the cart back to kitchen to get the plates clean.

“You sure didn’t want me to feed you too?” Akiza asked in a playful way.

“I’m sure. Just want you to rest that arm until it heals.” You said to her.

“Yuten, this hurt arm is nothing. It’s still useful.” Akiza said.

“Listen, you helped me when I was hurt before too. I just want to return the favor. Plus, I do owe you after scarring you with nearly dying from the insanity that’s been happening and all.” You said.

“I suppose so.” Akiza said.

You then start to go down until you reached her feet and you started to rub down on them. Akiza felt what you were doing and loves how you’re rubbing on them.

“I wasn’t sure if you were kidding about this before, but I decided to give you a foot massage regardless.” You said.

“Well, it definitely is very nice of you. You can keep going.” Akiza said as she lays back feeling relaxed.

You kept on rubbing her feet for a while before you give them a nice kiss.

“Did you really just kissed my feet?” Akiza asked with a smirk.

“Only to add a little extra on top of the rubbing.” You said to her.

“In that case...”
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Returning The Favor

choices: You get called out real quick
Akiza needs as much rest as possible. Time for bed
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Keep going please." She asks while laying back a bit.

"As you wish." You reply as you bring your lips to her foot once more.

Akiza sighed in relief as she relaxed her body further. I suppose being spoiled isn't all bad. She thinks to herself as you continue to rub and kiss her feet for her. She could feel the stress of the day melt from her body at your touch.

Seeing the time, though, she decided it would be best to take one of those pills she got now. "Yuten? Could we move over a bit? I need to grab that glass of water from the table to take my medicine." She asks.

"Here, I'll get it for you." You say as you start to get up, only for her to put her foot back in your face.

"No, you keep going. I can do it myself, I just need to slide over." She says as she begins to move.

Seeing no way to stop her, you simply move along with her, trying to be slow and gentle so as not to disturb her injury. Once she was in position, she grabbed the glass and took out one of the pills. Meanwhile, you resumed your treatment of her.

With one quick motion, she popped it in her mouth and washed it down the hatch. "Okay Yuten, you can stop now." She says. With her permission, you stand up and get back on the bed next to her.

"Feeling any better?" You ask.

"It's not an instant feel-good pill." She jokes. "But I at least don't feel as much pain as I did when I crashed."

"That's good to hear." You say as you rub her head once more.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Treating Your Patient

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“I don’t know about you, but today had me beat. I’m exhausted.” Akiza yawned.

“Me too. Perhaps, it is time to sleep. Ren should be back here with Misty while we rest.” You said as you rest your head on the pillow.

“Good to know. Goodnight.” Akiza said before you two went to sleep.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Sleep To Heal

choices: Ren, Michelle's being overwhelmed by reporters looking for you
Your parents, they heard what happened
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
As you wake up this morning, you see that Akiza's already awake. She tries to stretch, only to be reminded of her injury and lowers her arm back down in pain. "Easy there Akiza. You're still hurt. Don't try to move more than you have to." You tell her as you go to get her pill and another glass of water. "Here, take this."

She takes both from your hands and washes down the medicine. "Thanks Yuten." She says as she sets the glass on the nightstand.

Meanwhile, you find the t.v. remote and turn it on, eager to see what's being said about yesterday. As expected, when you flipped through the channels, station after station was talking about it. Duel bots taking to the streets, making duelists crash and destroying the city, what else could people possibly be talking about?

Apparently, there was one other topic on the media's lips. One station you flicked on was discussing a group of psychic duelists that had taken to the streets during the attack. You leave it on as Akiza sat up to see what was happening.

They were showing footage of one of your members blasting a duel bot off the road, where it crashed into a wall. Then, the anchors began to talk. "I think that clip says it all right there. These people, if you want to call them that, went out into the streets to cause even more chaos. They saw a city in turmoil and thought it would be fun to go out and add more." The one guy says. "And where was their illustrious leader Yuten Anjiou? At the WRGP, where his brother and fellow psychic Ren destroyed and almost killed one of their opponents. These people are dangerous and we need to accept that."

You could feel your anger boiling at this guy. He took just about every fact and ignored it so he could flip the story against you. You didn't even need to look back to Akiza to know she felt the same as you. You were tempted to turn off the t.v. right there if his co-host didn't start to speak up.

"How can you possibly say that?" She asks him. "Do you even know where that footage is from? It was sent to us by a mother and daughter who were saved by that young duelist. After destroying that bot, he then led the two back to the safety of their own home, risking his life to do so. Does that sound like someone trying to cause chaos?"

"Bah, one good egg doesn't mean the rest aren't rotten." He responds. "His actions don't justify everyone else, or what Yuten and his team did to Team Catastrophe during their match yesterday."

"Oh really?" The co-host asks. "Because we have plenty of other clips sent to us by people that were on the street that day reporting that they were rescued by these duelists. So you can hardly call this one good egg. And as for what happened with Team Catastrophe, if you were paying attention it was Nicolas' own card that destroyed his runner. Yuten and the others had no involvement in that."

Now he was flustered, and both of you were happy. "Well... I... uuuhhh." He stutters, trying to find some way out. He then made a motion to the camera to cut the feed, and "conveniently", the station experienced technical difficulties.

"Well, it looks like we at least have support now." You say as you lay back.

"Yeah, but it also looks like we still have some work to do if people like that guy still don't trust us." Akiza replies.

"That guy's an asshole. I doubt we'll ever change his mind. For now, we have supporters, that's all we need." You tell her before hearing a frantic knock at your door. "Who's this now?"
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Aftermath Of Destruction

choices: Go to the spirit world and tell the family what you’ve learned
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You go to the door and you see your parents outside to see you.

“Hello, sweetie. Are you okay?” Your mother asked.

“I am.” You said.

“We heard about what happened. We’re just glad that you’re safe and sound.” Your father said.

“And you, Akiza, how are you feeling?” Your mother asked stepping inside to see her.

“I’m fine. My arm still hurts, but it’ll manage.” Akiza said to your mother.

“We also heard the news about what everyone here did. I’m deeply ashamed that they don’t see that you were trying to help them out and they still think you’re dangerous.” Your father said in a sour tone.

“Not everyone. We’ve seen some support along during the news. We just need to take this nice and easy.” You stated out.

“I guess. It’s just not right.” He said.

“Is there anything you need from us?” Your mom asked you.

“I’m good. What about you, Akiza?” You asked her.

“I think we’re all good here.” Akiza said.

Your parents then left before you closed the door to stay by your girlfriend’s side.

“They’re right about one thing. Hearing that jackass proves that we still have a lot of work to do, even if it is irritating.” You said staying calm.

“Just be happy that tons of other people seen the good in us. That counts, like you said.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. Absolutely.” You said before kissing her on the head.

That’s when the phone started ringing and you answered.

“Hello?” You answered the phone.

“Hey, bro. It’s Ren. Umm. Listen, I think I’m going to be gone for the day.” Ren said to you.

“Okay. Why though?” You wondered.

“We just got the copy of the magazine we did together and we spotted something that said our relationship is ruining her career because I’m a psychic duelist. So Misty’s going ballistic right now and I got to make sure she doesn’t do anything stupid.” Ren said to you.

“Wow! Well, good luck and hope she’ll calm down.” You said.

“Ditto. Later. Come on, Misty! They ain’t worth it!” Ren said before hanging up.

“Sounds like he’s got his hands full.” Akiza said.

“You ain’t kidding.” You said.

What do you do now.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Your parents, they heard what happened

choices: You go see Kisara and Hamod
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Hey Akiza, I'm about to head into the Spirit World real quick. Mind watching my body for me while I do?" You ask.

"I thought you were supposed to be the one watching me?" She asks jokingly. "Alright then. Would you mind at least taking off your shirt so I have more body to watch?"

"Sorry, but I go into the Spirit World as I am out here, and it would be pretty awkward if I showed up there shirtless." You tell her.

"Fine, go ahead." She says with a mock pout.

"Thanks. I'll be back soon." You say as you begin to focus. Soon enough, you were back in the Mausoleum of White, with Otes sitting alone.

"Ah, Yuten. Good to see you again." He says as he rises to put a hand on your shoulder.

"Same sir." You reply. "How is everyone?"

"Hamod and Kisara are currently studying in the library. Nama is tending to her garden behind the mausoleum. Tema is, well..." He trails off before motioning you to follow him. He takes you outside to show you Tema training at twice the speed you've seen him do before.

When he saw you, though, he immediately stopped and rushed over and threw himself to the ground before you. "I am so sorry my champion. Please, forgive me." He begs.

"For what?" You ask. "You didn't do anything wrong."

"I have done wrong. I failed you. You summoned me to battle your enemies and I could not. I could not best the one with the sword, and then I was bested by mere lackeys. I am unfit to call myself a protector." He rants.

That was when you piece together that he's talking about last night. "Hey, it's alright man, honest. You helped us out big time. Me and my friends might not even be here right now if it weren't for you." You tell him.

"Indeed my son. Take heart knowing that you fought your hardest, buying enough time for Yuten to unlock the next evolution of the dragons." Otes says.

When he heard this, Tema quickly rose. "Truly father?" He asks.

"Indeed. Our clan's power has now grown even greater thanks to you and Yuten's efforts." Otes says.

"That is glorious news to hear." Tema cheers.

"Wait, you know about that?" You ask.

"Am I not the master of this clan?" He asks with a sly smirk. "I sensed right away when you unlocked the new beast. But, I do not know the details. Please, tell me everything."

"Yes, champion. Me as well. I must know what happened after I lost." Tema asks.

You tell both of them everything that happened. The duel bots, the emperors' warning, and especially your new dragon. "And that's everything." You say, wrapping up.

"I see. This is indeed troubling." Otes says as he runs a hand through his beard. "Just what do this lot have planned for the world?"

"But father, Yuten unlocked the next evolution of the dragons, does that not mean we are safe?" Tema asks.

"Ah yes. Blue-Eyes Twin Burst Dragon. It sounds like a powerful beast, but whether it can win alone is still to be decided." Otes replies.

"Well he won't be alone, and neither will I." You speak up. "I've got my teammates by my side, and together, we'll win this and stop them."

"I admire your confidence, champion. Let us hope you are right." Otes says.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Checking In With The Family

choices: Stay around for a little bit
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“How about we go see how Kisara and Hamod are doing?” You suggested.

“Very well.” Otes said.

You, Otes, and Tema go to the library until you spotted Kisara and Hamod sitting at a round table reading some books before they spotted you.

“Yuten! It’s good to see you!” Kisara said happily as she goes to hug you.

“It’s good to see you too.” You said hugging her back.

“Greetings, my champion. It is so wonderful to see you here.” Hamod said.

“Me too.” You said to him.

“So, what brings you here today?” Kisara wondered.

You told them what you told Otes and Tema. It was both a surprise and astonishing that you were able to reach the next step and talk to the dragon.

“You’ve done well so far, Yuten. You truly have a magical gift inside you.” Hamod said.

“I guess so.” You chuckled while rubbing the back of your head.

“Which reminds me.” Hamod said before reaching into a chest and pulled something out. “I forgot to give this to you when we were giving you the gifts. I hope it is to your liking.”

You looked to see that it’s a cloak with a hood on it. It was mixed with shiny white and sparkly blue with the Blue-Eyes’s symbol on the back. You put it on and you liked it.

“Thank you. It’s a nice fit.” You said as Hamod bowed in appreciation.

“So, I take it these emperors will likely be at this tournament you’re having.” Kisara wondered.

“That’s what the leader said.” You said.

“Well, just remember that you have the strength of both us and your love ones to assist you.” Otes said.

“No doubt about it.” You said while smiling.

What now?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Seeing Kisara and Hamod

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"It's been nice seeing you all again, but I need to get back. Akiza's hurt right now and I don't want to leave her alone for too long." You tell them.

"Well, here's hoping she gets well soon." Kisara says with concern.

"She'll pull through, my sister." Tema says as he picks up Kisara in a hug.

"Oh? Thanks brother." Kisara replies, shocked at first before returning his hug.

"I gotta go. Tell Nama I said hi and that I was sorry I couldn't see her this time." You tell Otes.

"Will do. Good luck, champion." He says as you begin to leave the Spirit World.

You appear back on your bed as you rise to a stir. "Good to see you're back." You hear Akiza say as you sit up. "So how'd it go, and what's with the new threads?"

"I told them about the mess we're in. They know and are ready to help however they can." You tell her. "As for this cloak, it's another gift from them to me."

"Man, another gift? I can only imagine how generous they are around the holidays." She jokes.

"So, did I miss anything?" You ask.

"Not much. I mostly just laid here and watched you lay there. Pretty boring, honestly." She says.

"Well right now, I'll take boring." You say as you finally stand up.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Going Back

choices: Akiza’s parents came by to see you
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You turned the t.v back on right on the news channel. Before you could change it, you hear something that caught your attention.

“Greetings to all of our viewers today. Today’s story, young famous model, Misty Tredwell, was in a furious mood when she discovered on her latest magazine where they’re were comments about her relationship with a psychic duelist. Not just any psychic duelist, but the brother of the Arcadia Movement leader, Yuten, who goes by the name of Ren Anjiou. We now go live to Angela Raines to talk to them about this matter.” The newsman said.

“Thank you very much. I’m standing here with the couple at this moment.” Angela said before turning to Misty and Ren. “So, you must be infuriated after reading what was on the magazine. How do you respond to that?”

“I’ll tell you how. Just because they have some psychic powers, doesn’t mean they’re all bad. Sure, he can be an idiot every now and then, but he’s anything but a terrible person. In fact, he’s the reason I’m reunited with my long lost brother, Toby, who also happens to be a psychic.” Misty said.

“Is that correct?” Angela wondered.

“You bet it is. Toby was one of the missing people that took very long to find where he was. If Ren here didn’t find the place Toby was being held at, I would still never be able to see him again. For that, I owe him more than I could think of.” Misty said holding Ren’s hand tightly. “In fact, may I borrow your mic real quick?” Misty asked her.

“Of course.” Angela said before giving the mic to Misty.

“Toby, if you’re watching this, just remember that your big sister loves you so much. I don’t care about the abilities you have. All that matters is that you’re family. Nothing more and nothing less.” Misty said before turning to Ren. “And Ren? You finding my brother made you my hero. That’s why I love you so much. You’re protective of others and very very caring of them too. Remember that I will love you to the ends of the earth.” Misty said to your brother’s face.

“I know, baby. I know.” Ren said before Misty gives Angela the mic back and kissed him on the lips.

That right there was a touching moment. You smiled on while Akiza was too but with a tear going down her face.

“And Mr. Ren? You and your team are still in the WRGP tournament once the rebuilding is done. How do you feel about the opponent you might be facing?” Angela asks him.

“All I can say is that I hope for the best to anyone we face and we put on a great duel.” Ren said.

“And one more thing, do you feel the same as what Misty feels right now?” Angela asked.

“Of course. Just because they’re different from the rest of society, does not mean that you should go and judge them. My advice, get to know them and try to feel some compassion a little. You may never know what surprises you might find.” Ren said to the camera.

“Thank you very much. We’ll see you soon. For now, back to the studio.” Angela said before you turned the tv off.

“That was so touching with what Misty just said.” Akiza said.

“Sure was. And I agree with Ren said too. He makes perfect sense on that statement he made.” You said.

“If they’ve just shown that much love like that, I have a feeling that you’ll no doubt be getting a new sister-in-law soon.” Akiza said.

That’s ironic when she said that.

So now what happens?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Misty’s Touching Words

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
As you were about to lay back and relax again, you hear another knock at the door. "Well aren't we the popular ones today?" You joke as you get up to answer it. You open up the door to see Akiza's parents standing out in the hall.

"Hello Yuten. Is Akiza home?" Her dad asks.

"Yeah. She's laying in bed right now. Come on in." You say as you lead them inside.

The second they see Akiza in bed, her mom quickly throws herself on top of her in a hug. "Oh my little rose, I'm so happy you're okay." She cries out.

"I'm sorry sweetie. We tried to see you sooner, but we weren't allowed to leave yesterday until we were told it was safe, and by then it was late at night. Then all the destruction made traffic a nightmare, turning a simple drive across the city into gridlock of mayhem." Her dad says.

"It's okay you guys. I'm fine." Akiza says softly. "But mom, if you wouldn't mind loosening up your hug a bit..." She asks, hinting to her injury.

"Oh my! I'm so sorry Akiza." Her mom says before getting off.

"So what brings you two here?" She asks.

"We watch our daughter get hurt then hear she was off fighting some army and you think we aren't gonna come check on you?" Her dad asks.

"I suppose you're right." Akiza surmises.

"And how are you holding up?" He asks you.

"Just fine. It's Akiza that took the brunt of the injuries yesterday." You shamefully admit. "I'm sorry. I tried to protect her as best I could, but..."

"It's alright. We know you did everything in your power to help her, and that's all we ask of you." Her dad says with a pat on your head. "Sorry we can't stay for too long, but I'm needed to help oversee the reconstruction effort."

They take no more time as they walk out the door, leaving you both alone again. "It was sweet of them to come by." You say as you lay back next to her again.

"Yeah." She sighs as she cuddles back up next to you.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: More Visitors

“Looks like it’s time for lunch. I’ll call in for them to give us something.” You said as you dialed up the phone and called the mess hall for you order.

You waited until the food arrived and it was revealed to be sandwiches.

“I can handle a little sandwich with one arm.” Akiza said.

“If you insist.” You said as you two started eating.

Once you two are finished with your meals, you got up and give Akiza her pill and water before she took it.

“So, got any new tricks for us when we get into dueling shape?” Akiza wondered.

“I think I know a combo or two we can try out. But let’s focus on getting you healed.” You said.

“Okay.” Akiza said.

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Lunch With The Bed-resting Akiza

No sooner had Akiza gotten settled back in was there another knock at the door. Thankfully, you were already up this time. "I swear, we need like a button that lets us open the door from bed." You mumble.

You throw open the door to see Ren and Misty standing there. "Hello Yuten." Misty says. "Can we come in?"

"Sure, come right on in." You offer. They both follow you inside as Ren shuts the door.

"Well isn't this a surprise. I'm being visited by New Domino's hottest celebrity couple." Akiza teases.

"Ah, I see you guys saw the news." Ren says while rubbing his head.

"Don't be embarrassed. It was really sweet how Misty risked her own career to defend you." Akiza says, not helping Ren's blush.

"We stopped by to see how you're doing." Misty says. "Do you need anything? Food, pillows, anything at all?"

"No thanks. I'm good. I just need to rest for a bit and I'll be just fine by tomorrow morning." Akiza responds.

"Good to hear." Ren says before turning to you. "And what about you, bro?"

"Me?" You question.

How do you respond?

After which, you and Ren went out of the room and walked together.

“Eh. Good point.” You said after you relaxed. “Also, you must be very happy with what Misty said to you.” You said.

“No doubt. I feel really proud of her for that, even though it would’ve cost her career.” Ren said.

“Perhaps. But she proves that she’ll take family and friends over that any day.” You said.

“Amen to that.” Ren said as you two...
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Time To Stretch The Legs

Some fans approach while you eat

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Let's head out for a bit. You said I owe you a burger for saving me, anyway." You tell Ren as you lead him downstairs.

"Sure, why not. Let's hit the mall, I know just the place." Ren says as you both mount your runners and ride out.

As you drive, you see more and more of the damage caused last night. You'd seen some of it then, but at the time you were more focused on fighting and then on getting everyone home to notice too much. Now though, you watch as you see craters in the roads and holes in buildings. Entire turbo duel combat roads had their glass shattered.

"Dang. This place got messed up." You say to Ren.

"Yeah, things are pretty torn up all over. I've seen crews working with no breaks just to try and get the major highways back in working condition." Ren says. "We're lucky for our runners letting us not have to drive conventionally. I've seen cars backed up for miles." He says as you swerve past two craters a car would have no chance of making.

Finally, you both arrived at the mall and dismounted. "Come on, it's on the third floor." Ren says as he heads in.

As you walk through, you could almost immediately tell that you were recognized. No one approached you, but you could feel the eyes watching you walk. "Seems like we have attention." You tell him.

"Yeah." Ren says as you both look out of the corners of your eyes. You see a mixed bag of emotions, some excited, some looked pissed at the sight of you. "You think someone might start something?"

"Not sure. It seems like a lot of people here like us, though." You tell him.

"Yeah, but it looks like there's a lot of assholes here too." He says with a clenched fist. "No doubt the same kind of assholes that wrote that article about me ruining Misty's career."

"Yeah, or this guy we saw on the news this morning trying to blame us for the attack yesterday." You add.

"That's messed up." He says as you step on the escalator to the third floor. "You really think we have enough support to balance out guys like that?" He asks.

"I don't think so, I know so." You say to him. "On that same news show, the guy's co-host called him on his bullshit and revealed that a lot of people sent in clips of us and the students saving them and calling them heroes. And as for your guy, I think Misty's little speech should keep him quiet and earn us some support."

"Yeah... Misty." Ren mumbles.

"She's a hell of a woman, man. She's willing to put her multi-million dollar career on the line to defend you. She's definitely one you should hold on tight to." You say as you approach the place.

"You bet I will! I'll hold tight and never let go!" He declares as you walk up to the counter. "So, your treat, right?"

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Hanging Out

Just as you two were eating, you see a bunch of people coming closer to you. You weren’t sure what their attentions were as you have a nervous feeling going on inside you.

“Hi, are you Yuten and Ren?” A young boy asked you.

You and Ren were surprised by the offer, but accepted for the goodness in your hearts. They gave you each a notebook to sign and the parents took a picture with you two and their children.

“Thank you very much.” The father of the kids said before they all left.

“That was.... definitely unexpected.” Ren said.

“I’ll say. But at least we can see the good of society before us.” You stated.

“Yeah.” Ren said.

You two finished eating and go walking around until...
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Psychic Fan Club

choices: Ren's up for going somewhere else
You feel ready to go back to Akiza now
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Excuse me, sir?" You hear called out from behind you. You both turn around to see a man running up to you.

"Wait, I know you, don't I?" You ask.

"You might not know me, but I remember you, sir. You saved my life and my store from a thief not too long ago." The man says.

"Oh yeah. Now I remember you. You were the cashier from the jeweler's." You say as the pieces fall together. "How are you doing?"

"Good sir. I just wish to thank you again for what you did saving me, as well as saving the city yesterday." He says. "Ever since that day, I'd tell people about the man that saved me. If there is ever anything you need, just let me know."

"Uh... thanks. I'll keep that in mind." You say with a bit of awkwardness. "You have a good day, sir."

"You two." The man says before leaving.

"Well ain't you just a regular superhero?" Ren asks as you resume walking. "You know, that fancy new cloak of yours would be great for hiding your secret identity..."

"No thanks. I'd rather not give Akiza a heart attack by turning into some part-time vigilante. Besides, I'm already doing enough good as I am now." You remind him.

"Fine, fine. But if you change your mind, just know that I'm not going to be a sidekick. Either an equal partnership or no deal." He jokes.

"I'll think about it." You joke back.

You and Ren walked all the way back before they they made it home. Once inside, you two walked to your room and knocked on it before entering.

You stopped talking when you two see Misty and Akiza on the bed in their bra and panties.
