“Are you sure you want one of his cards, bro?” You wondered.

“Sure. Even I’ll admit that some of the cards here are very useful, including this. Besides, he’ll likely have his deck confiscated when he gets back.” Ren said.

“Okay. You do have a point.” You said before you all get out of here.

Security took Sayer back to jail and Yusei, Jack, and Crow took Leo and Luna back to Satellite to let them stay for a while as you, Ren, and Akiza went back home.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: He's barely alive

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
As you all pulled into the garage, you waved hello to Sion as you went up to your rooms. "Hey guys, can we talk real quick?" Ren says, breaking a bit of silence you've been having since you left the blacksite.

"Sure bro. What's on your mind?" You ask him. Instead of answering with words, he walks up and throws his arms around both you and Akiza, wrapping you both in a tight hug.

"I just want to say thanks. I was a nervous wreck after I found out the twins were taken, and you guys didn't even hesitate to drop everything and help me." He says, fighting back tears of joy.

"What are teammates for?" Akiza says as she pats his back.

"Yeah. You'd have done the same for us. In fact, you have done the same for us with how many times you've pulled my ass out of the fire since we met." You say as you return the hug.

"I know. It's still nice to know that you guys have my back no matter what." He starts to sob. "I owe so much to you guys that I don't think I could ever repay it. Thanks to you I've patched things up with mom and dad, met Misty, finally controlled by powers, and so much more."

"Come on. How about you come in and have dinner with us? It's been a long day and we've barely eaten since we were busy hunting." You offer.

"Y-yeah. That sounds good." He sniffles before you see a fire enter his eyes. "I'll whip up something amazing as a 'Thank You' for your help today." He says as he storms into yours and Akiza's room and you can already hear him going around the kitchen inside.

"Well... this should be interesting." Akiza says as you both go in after him and shut the door.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Ren's Thanks

choices: You and Akiza just stay here together
There was a knock on your door
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
After you all ate, you took the plates and washed them clean for it was the best meal your brother ever cooked up for you and Akiza this far. It was nice for Ren to make you this dinner after you both helped cheered him on his duel with Sayer. After cleaning up the dishes, you all relax in the room as you guys talk.

“That was amazing, Ren. I feel like I ate like a pig.” You said.

“You are a pig.” Akiza teased as Ren chuckled while you playfully glared at her.

“In any case, I’m glad you like it. Took me a while to get it right the first few times. But, I still want to thank you two.” Ren said deeply.

“Stop being so mushy, man. It’s what we do.” You said as you gave your brother a playful punch to his arm.

“Cant help it.” Ren said.

“So, what now?” Akiza wondered.

“Well, we still have two more days before the tournament resumes. We can use the time to get accustomed to our new cards.” You suggested.

“Like creating new combos with them?” Akiza guessed.

“Bingo.” You answered.

“I agree. With these new cards along with a proper strategy, I think we can come out on top in the tournament.” Ren said with fire in his eyes.

“No doubt.” You added.

Ren then went to his room so he can take a nice late shower for he smells like a sewer.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: After Dinner

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
With Ren now gone for the night, you and Akiza finally took the time to relax. "So how are you holding up Akiza?" You ask her.

"What do you mean?" She asks. "I wasn't the one having panic attacks or throwing furniture when we found out the twins were taken."

You sit down behind her and begin to rub her shoulders. "Yeah, but I can tell that you probably had some more venting to unload on Sayer after we visited him last. I'm guessing you wanted to let it out on him once you heard he escaped, but you never got the chance and now he's in a coma." You tell her.

She sighed a bit as she leaned into your rubbings. "I just... I don't get him. We've made so much progress. The pulsars, the PR, the tournament, saving the city during the duel bot attack. So much, and yet not only does he still want to hold us back by trying to get us to focus on revenge, but by using Luna and Leo to fit his needs, he's still just as much of the ruthless manipulator he was before. Even children aren't safe from him." She admits. "Oooo, that's the spot."

"Well, it just means that we've got a second front to fight this battle on. First we have to get the people of the city to accept us, then we have to convince people like Sayer that all revenge does is hurt us more than help." You explain as you finish the massage and stand up. "I'm gonna hit the shower real quick before bed. Wanna join me?"

"As fun as that seems... I wouldn't mind just turning in as soon as possible. All this excitement has got me exhausted." She says as she begins to undress for bed.

"Fair enough." You say as you head into the shower. You turn on the water before undressing and stepping in.

"So, any idea who's our next match in the tournament?" Akiza calls in to you.

"No clue. But seeing as how tomorrow is the day before the next match, I'd assume we'll be told then." You call back as you wash out your hair.

"You think we'll be fighting the Emperors of Iliaster next?" She asks.

"Don't know. We still have no idea who their team even is." You answer while washing your body.

"It's scary to think that what started out as something that just seemed like a fun way to boost public opinion has quickly turned into another save the world scenario." She admits.

"Maybe. That just means we need to bring our A-game once again." You say as you step out of the bathroom to see Akiza already lying under the covers. You finish drying off and crawl in to join her. "Here's to another good duel two days from now." You say before pecking her lips and turning out the lights. "Goodnight."
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Washing the Stress Away

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Morning shines brightly into your room as you wake up feeling something soft on you. You looked to see Akiza’s breasts in your face. She must’ve cuddled you up to her in her sleep. You weren’t complaining as you do enjoy this position. Although, you need to get up as you started poking on her face. She then woke up and she sees you so close to her.

“Enjoying the view down there?” Akiza asked with a smirk.

“I’m not mad about it.” You said with a small chuckle.

You both kissed each other and get up before getting dressed. After which, you both had breakfast and went out only to find your parents outside.

“Mom. Dad. Hi there.” You said nicely.

“Hello, sweetie. We heard about what happened to the twins. Are you all alright?” Kourin asked you.

“Yes. We’re all still in one piece and the twins are back safe and sound.” You said to your parents relief.

“That’s great news. So, what’s your agenda today?” Kai asked you next.

“The tournament will resume tomorrow. So we’re going to take the time to train.” You said.

“Of course. Good luck.” Kourin said before kissing you on the cheek and they left.

You went to get Ren and sees that he’s all set to go. After you all went down to the training grounds, you got on your runners and start revving on to the track.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Preparing Yourselves

choices: You head inside and head for the cafeteria for dinner
Someone approaches you before you enter
You get a call on your runner
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
The three of you had been training long into the afternoon, getting near dinner time. You learned more and more about your new cards and how to combine them with your decks and each others'. With the day's training nearing it's end, you pull over and signal for the other two to follow suit. You pull off your helmet to look them in the eyes. "That was good, both of you." You tell them.

"We were better than good. We were great." Akiza cheers.

"Yeah. Whoever it is we're going up against tomorrow, they're gonna be sorry." Ren comments. "And if it is those emperor creeps, then they're in for a big surprise when we show them how strong we are."

As if listening to your conversation, your runner's monitor begins to flash with a message. "What's this now?" You say as you tap the message. Akiza and Ren dismounted their runners to walk up to see what was going on.

"What is it Yuten?" Akiza asks.

"Looks like a release of the new tournament bracket. From the looks of it, we're up against... Team Sherry." You tell them.

"Correct me if I'm wrong, but wasn't Sherry the name of that girl that showed up when you and Yusei were kidnapped and she invited him to join her team?" Ren asks.

"That's her. But Yusei has his own team. So I don't know what she did without him." You muse.

"Well, they made it to the quarterfinals, so they have to be doing something right." Akiza brings up.

"Fair point." You agree. "Guess we'll just have to figure that out when we throw down tomorrow. For now, though, its time for dinner. I say it's about time we went in for the day."

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Announcement Made

choices: Michelle stopped you along the way
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You three made it up to the cafeteria and grabbed your food before you all started eating together.

“Well, cheers for making through the tournament this far and best of luck for this team.” You toasted.

You all toasted and drink your drinks as you chowed down.

“So, any idea how Sherry’s team will play out against us?” Akiza wondered.

“Not really. But I hear she’s quite a powerful duelist. Taking her head on could be a challenge.” You said.

“Well, as long we plan ahead and just believe we’ll win, we’ll definitely come up on top.” Ren said with confidence.

“Hell yeah.” You said as you cheered again.

“If you’ll excuse me, I have to go the little ladies room.” Akiza said before leaving.

“Yuten?” Ren said to get your attention. “Do you still have that ring?” He asked you.

“Yeah. It’s all locked up in my office safe and sound.” You said.

“Good. I just can’t believe you’ll be proposing to her when this tournament is done with. I have a feeling she’s going to make a great sister-in-law.” Ren said.

“She definitely will, bro.” You said.

“And I think she’ll make a cool mother one day too with you as a good father.” Ren said.

“Woah woah, bro! I don’t know about that.” You said.

“Why not?” Ren wondered.

“Well, with the mistakes mom and dad made, I’m worried that it’ll happen again. I don’t want my kid to suffer the tragic childhood we went through.” You said with a little doubt about being a father.

“Bro, just because our parents did bad in the past, doesn’t mean you have to. I know you’ll make a good dad.” Ren said.

“How can you be so sure?” You wondered.

“Because you’re you. The you with the biggest golden heart I ever seen. You just need to trust yourself.” Ren said.

“I supposed you’re right. Thanks.” You said smiling before something else came into your mind. “What about you and Misty? What are you going to do when this tournament is over?” You wondered.

“I was thinking about being out of town for a while. Maybe go for a vacation.” Ren said.

“That’s a great idea. I could use one too.” You said before seeing Akiza coming back.

After which, you decided to go somewhere before going to your room.

“I’ll be back, Akiza. Just need to do something real quick.” You said as Akiza nodded before kissing you and you left.

You went down the hall and...
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Eating And Talking

choices: You make it to your office
Michelle has one other thing to say
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Excuse me Mr. Yuten." You hear Michelle's voice say as you turn to see her approach you. "Can I have a moment?"

"Of course. What's going on?" You ask her.

"Well sir, I just wish to inform you the Officer Trudge just called. He left a message saying that Sayer has been properly secured." She explains.

"We had him arrested yesterday. What took so long?" You question.

"Apparently they wanted to ensure his cell had the proper medical equipment to keep him alive in his comatose state, while also being isolated from the rest of the inmates before removing him from the hospital." She answers.

"Alright then. Good to know. Anything else?" You wonder.

"Yes sir. He also asked if we could provide him with one of our pulsars for his cell to prevent him from escaping with his powers." She tells you.

"Alright then. Head down to Sion and tell him the situation and see if he has one to spare or can throw one together quick." You tell her.

"Yes sir." She says dutifully as you begin to walk away.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Threat Secured

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You made it towards your office and you sat down on the chair. You took the time to think back on how far you’ve gotten in your life. Met the girl of your dreams, made some good friends, reunited with your parents, met your brother, going great with your powers and the people here, made it this far in the tournament, and still have the chance to make your vision one that could last as long as it takes. Everything that happened, every choice you made has helped you made it this far and there’s no way in hell you're turning back now.

It was amazing how this is looking up as you turned to see the nice sunset. It truly is an amazing ride and you can’t wait to see what happens next once the tournament resumes.

“Are you alright, Yuten?” Blue-Eyes asked as she appeared next to you.

“Yeah. Just thinking about how we managed to get to this point.” You said to your dragon.

“You must be very proud.“ Blue-Eyes said.

“I am without a doubt. Now we just need to get through the next round against Sherry’s team.” You said back.

“Are you concerned about the Emperors of Illiaster should you face them?” Blue-Eyes wondered.

“A little. But I somehow have a good feeling about our chances. I just know it.” You said.

“Well, just remember that we are here to battle beside you, my champion.” Blue-Eyes said that made you smile more.

“I know you will. And thank you for helping me when I was a kid. You have no idea how much that means to me.” You said.

“I believe I do. And you are welcome.” Blue-Eyes said before fading away.

You then looked on at the drawer that contains the box with the ring in it. You opened it and looked at the ring knowing that it’s drawing near. Once she say yes and you put that ring on her finger, things are going to be different for the better. You just know it in your heart of hearts.

“Soon. Very soon.” You thought as you put the ring away and left your office.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Reflecting On The Journey

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You get back into the room to see Akiza already undressed and in bed. "Hey! About time you showed up." She says. "I was starting to worry that you'd gotten lost in your own building."

You chuckle a bit as you begin to disrobe. "Well don't worry. If I ever get that bad, you have every right to toss me in a padded cell." You joke back.

"Not on your life." She says as her tone snaps back to serious. "I would never abandon you to rot in some crazy house. Don't even joke about that."

"I'm sorry. It won't happen again." You reply as you crawl in with her and she swiftly snuggles up close.

"It better not." She huffs. "I'd never leave you behind."

"I know." You say as you wrap your arms around her. "So, you ready for tomorrow?"

"You bet. This 'Sherry' is going down and we're gonna win this thing." She says with confidence.

"That's my girl." You say as you click off the lights. "Then lets give it our all tomorrow."

"Right." She says just before the two of you begin to drift off to sleep.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Night Before the Return

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You woke up with Akiza as you got dressed and head straight for Ren’s room to get him. You all eaten breakfast before you got on your runners and head straight for the arena. Misty was already there for she was waiting for you to show up.

“Glad you guys made it.” Misty said.

“Wouldn’t miss this for the world.” Ren said as Misty kissed him.

“Well, lets do this.” You said as you all went inside.

Once you’re all inside, you listen to the announcer as he begins talking.

“Ladies and Gentlemen! After a serious of reconstruction of the passed destructive invasion, I’m happy to announce the continuation of the World Racing Grand Prix!” He said as the crowd was cheering. “Now, for the our quarterfinal participants! The first match will feature Team Arcadia vs Team Sherry! Who will be advancing to the semifinals? We’re about to find out!”

You looked to see that Sherry’s team is made of just her and Ellsworth, which is very strange.

“How come they only have each other and not a third member?” Ren wondered.

“Beats me. In any case, we better get started.” You said as the screen revealed to be you versus Ellsworth first.

You meet up with him and waited for the light to change.

“Hope you brought your A-game.” You said.

“I would say the same for you.” Ellsworth said.

The light changed and you two began riding

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000
Ellsworth: 4000
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The WRGP Resumes

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
As you both floor it off the line and race for the first turn, you would've sworn you had it, but Elsworth surprised you by rocketing ahead and seizing the corner. "Well, you got some moves man. But let's see if your dueling is as good as your riding." You say, trying to strike conversation.

"As you wish, sir." He says plainly. "I draw. I'll start with summoning Command Knight in defense mode."

CK: 1900 DEF

"And when Command Knight is on my field, all warrior-type monsters on my field gain 400 attack points." He continues.

SK: 1200-1600 ATK

"With that, I will place two cards face-down and end my turn. It is your move." He concludes.

"Jeez man, right to it, huh? No banter or anything?" You ask.

"I am not here to talk. I am here in service of Mistress Sherry and the pursuit of her goals. It is for that reason that I will defeat you and your teammates by myself. None of you shall even touch her, this I swear. Now are you going to talk, or duel?" He rants.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Knight's Duty

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Okay. No need to get antsy.” You draw.

You: 1 SC
Ellsworth: 1 SC

“Okay. I’ll just set this monster and another card face down to end my turn.” You said.

“That is it? I do not know if you are playing mind games or you have such bad luck.” Ellsworth said.

“Relax. We’re just getting started. No need to jump to conclusions.” You said.

“How is this for jumping to conclusions? I play the trap card, Solemn Wishes.” Ellsworth activated his card.

“I see. Trying to keep your life points high with that trap card? That’s somewhat clever, I must say.” You said as your turn ended.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Playing It Easy

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Then it is my turn. I draw." Elsworth starts. "And since I drew a card, Solemn Wishes restores my life points by 500."

Elsworth: 4500

Elsworth: 2 SC
You: 2 SC

"Next, I summon Warrior Dai Grephor in attack mode."

WDG: 1700 ATK

"But don't forget about Command Knight's effect. He also gains another 400 attack points." He reminds.

WDG: 1700-2100 ATK

"Now Warrior Dai Grephor, attack his face-down card!" He announces as his monster slashes right through yours.

"Thanks for that. Now Kidmodo Dragon's effect activates." You say smugly.

"What?" Elsworth asks in confusion.

"My face down? He's called Kidmodo Dragon, and when he's destroyed, I can special summon a dragon-type monster from my hand. So say hello to Blue-Eyes White Dragon!" You reveal as your ace hits the field.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"I see, this was a ploy, then. How shameful of me. Forgive me for this oversight, Mistress Sherry." Elsworth says. "I end my turn with a face-down, then." He concludes.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Knight and a Dragon

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Here comes the thunder.” You said as you draw.

You: 3 SP
Ellsworth: 3 SP

“First off, I think I’ll go ahead and attack your Command Knight with my Blue-Eyes.” You said.

“That’s not going to happen. My Knight’s effect makes it so you can’t attack him while I have another monster on my field.” Ellsworth said.

“In that case, I’ll go for Warrior Dai Grepher instead. White Lightning!” You called for your attack.

“Before you hit him, I’ll play my trap card, Gift of the Mystical Elf. This lets me gain three hundred life points for every monster on the field. So, before Dai Grepher is destroyed, I’ll count him as a third monster so I gain nine hundred life points.” Ellsworth said.

Ellsworth: 5400

That was when your dragon hits his warrior.

Ellsworth: 4500

“So it was like you didn’t took damage at all. Not bad. During my main phase two, I’ll normal summon my Sage with Eyes of Blue.” You said.

SwEoB: 0 ATK

“When he’s normal summoned, his effect allows me to add a level one light tuner monster from my deck. I choose my White Stone of Ancients. Next, since my sage is a tuner monster himself, I’ll tune him with my Blue-Eyes to Synchro summon my Blue-Eyes Spirit Dragon!” You said.

BESD: 2500 ATK

“Amazing! Yuten has managed to get his synchro monster out and it looks like he’s in the driver seat of this duel.” The announcer said.

“With that, I’ll end with one face down. I know you’ll gain life points when you draw again. So go ahead and draw. Let’s see what else you have in store for me.” You said with no fear.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Going Offensively

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"I have plenty. I draw." He begins.

Elsworth: 5000

Elsworth: 4 SC
You: 4 SC

"And I shall begin by summoning Rose, Warrior of Revenge in attack mode." He says.

RWR: 1600 ATK

"And with Command Knight on my field, her attack points are increased."

RWR: 1600-2000 ATK

"Is that it? My dragon is still plenty more powerful." You tell him.

"Perhaps. But my Rose just so happens to be a tuner monster." Elsworth revealed.

"No way!" You say in awe. "But that means..."

"That my Rose will be tuning to my Command Knight, in order to synchro summon Driven Daredevil in attack mode." He finishes as his new warrior is created.

DD: 2400 ATK

"And now my Daredevil will attack your Spirit Dragon." He says as his monster attacks.

"Are you nuts? Spirit Dragon is still stronger." You remind him.

"True, but Driven Daredevil has an ability that means he cannot be destroyed by a monster with higher attack than him." He says as the attack connects.

Elsworth: 4900

"And now his other effect activates. Now, since he battled a monster with higher attack than himself, he can destroy the monster he battled."

"Not so fast. I play Spirit Dragon's special ability. Now I can send him to my graveyard to special summon a light synchro monster from my extra deck in defense mode. I choose Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon." You counter.

AESD: 3000 DEF

"I was foiled again." Elsworth says in defeat. "I'll end my turn with a face-down."

"Well, normally since Azure-Eyes was summoned by my Spirit Dragon's effect, he would be destroyed during the end phase, but his special ability prevents him from being destroyed by effects until the second end phase after he's summoned." You tell him.

"Just make your move." Elsworth says.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Daring Attack

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“If you say so.” You draw.

You: 5 SC
Ellsworth: 5 SC

“First off, since it’s my standby phase, my Azure-Eyes’s effect activates. I get to summon a normal monster from my graveyard. So, Blue-Eyes White Dragon, make your presence known once again.” You said as your ace returns.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

“Next, I play the speed spell, Angel Baton. I draw two cards and discard one.” You did just that. “Next up, I’ll have Blue-Eyes White Dragon attack your Daredevil.” You said.

Ellsworth: 4300

“Thank you. Now my Driven Daredevil can destroy your precious Blue-Eyes.” Ellsworth said as your dragon was gone.

“Now I thank you, Ellsworth.” You said.

“How so?” Ellsworth wondered.

“Because when you destroyed my Blue-Eyes while I have another dragon already in my graveyard, I can special summon this. Meet Deep-Eyes White Dragon!” You said as you seemed to have a new monster.

DEWD: 0 ATK

“That’s a new one.” Ren complimented as Akiza and Misty agreed.

“Not bad. However, it is a shame that he has no strength.” Ellsworth noticed.

“Oh he definitely does alright. You see, Deep-Eyes can inflict six hundred points of damage for each dragon with different names in my graveyard. I have four right now. Here comes the pain.” You said as your dragon’s effect hits Ellsworth.

Ellsworth: 1900

“Not only that, his attack points becomes that of one dragon in my graveyard. So his attack points becomes that of my Blue-Eyes.” You said

DEWD: 3000 ATK

“Incredible! Yuten used Ellsworth’s Driven Daredevil’s effect to not only get himself a dragon that dealt him a big dose of damage, but he also made it stronger. I think Ellsworth might as well just throw in the towel!” The announcer said.

“You ain’t seen nothing yet. Deep-Eyes, attack Driven Daredevil!” You commanded.

Ellsworth: 1300

“You never learn. My Daredevil can now destroy your new dragon.” Ellsworth said as your dragon goes away.

“That’s fine, because when you destroy Deep-Eyes with an effect, he can destroy all of your monsters.” You said as Driven Daredevil bites the dust too.

“He won’t be gone for long. I play the trap card, Call of the Haunted, to bring him back.” Ellsworth said as his ace is back.

“Fine. I’ll end my turn. And during my end phase, my White Stone of Ancients can now activate its effect. When it gets sent to my graveyard this turn, I can summon another Blue-Eyes monster from my deck. And since his effect let’s him count as a Blue-Eyes monster, I can special summon Dragon Spirit of White in defense mode!” You said.

DSoW: 2000 DEF

“When my dragon spirit is summoned, he can remove one spell or trap card on the field from play. I think I’ll choose your Solemn Wishes. No more life points for you.” You said as Ellsworth’s trap is gone.

“So far, Yuten is pushing Ellsworth back into a corner! What can he do to get himself back into the match?” The announcer wondered.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Making It Interesting

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"I will defeat you, Yuten. No matter what." Elsworth exclaimed as he drew his card.

Elsworth: 6 SC
You: 6 SC

"I'm sorry Yuten, but I must remove you from this contest now." He says. "I activate the speed spell Speed Energy. Now, since I have two or more speed counters, I can increase the attack of one monster on the field by 200 points for every speed counter I have."

"Not good. Looks like he's gonna power up his Daredevil to cut right through Azure-Eyes." Ren says.

"And at six speed counters, that's 1200 attack points." Akiza adds.

"The monster I choose... is Azure-Eyes Silver Dragon!" He reveals.

"Say what!?!?" You question as your monster's attack is increased.

AESD: 2500-3700 ATK

"What's that guy thinking?" Michelle questions. "I don't know much about dueling, but even I know not to power up my opponent's monsters, especially points that don't matter since Azure-Eyes is in defense mode."

"Now I activate my continuous trap, Master and Servant's Resolve. Now, when a monster is destroyed by a monster effect during the battle phase, the owner of the controlled monster takes damage equal to the attack of the destroyed monster. And with that, Driven Daredevil, attack Azure-Eyes." He declares as his monster slashes yours.

Elsworth: 700

"But with Daredevil's ability..." You trail off.

"That's right. Since Azure-Eyes had higher attack then he did when they battled, Azure-Eyes is destroyed." Elsworth finishes while your monster explodes. "And do not forget about my trap. Since Azure-Eyes was destroyed by a monster's effect, Master and Servant's Resolve deals out damage equal to your monster's attack at the time it was destroyed."

That was when it clicked. "That power boost..." You say as it all becomes clear.

"That is correct. Now you take every last one of those points as damage." Elsworth says as his card fires a beam of light at you.

You: 300

"And now for the Speed World 2 field spell. Now by removing four speed counters, I can deal 800 points of damage to you directly." He concludes as the card activates, blasting you once more.

You: 0000
Elsworth: 2 SC

"Amazing. Elsworth turned everything around, going from a huge disadvantage to taking out Team Arcadia's first member. Yuten may be out of the running, but at least he still has cards to pass on to his teammates." The announcer calls out as you make your way back to the pit.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Driven Attack

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You pulled in to the pit as you stopped by the others.

“Sure as hell didn’t saw that coming.” You said.

“Well, look at it this way. You did managed to dish out some incredible damage.” Akiza said to help you feel better.

“Yeah. I say the odds are still in our favor. Now it’s up to me to help pick up where you left off.” Ren said as he gets ready.

“Of course. Good luck.” You said as you and Ren fist bumped.

“Show him what you got, Ren.” Misty said as she kisses Ren before he went on to the track.

“And it looks like Ren Anjiou has stepped up to the plate! Let’s see how his luck will turn out!” The announcer said.

“Get ready to be surprised. Here I go!” Ren draws.

Ren: 4000; 7 SC
Ellsworth: 700; 3 SC

“First up, by sending my Summoned Skull from my hand straight into my graveyard, I can special summon my Dark Grepher in attack mode.” Ren said.

DG: 1700 ATK

“Next, I’ll summon the tuner monster, Plaguespreader Zombie, in attack mode.”

PZ: 400 ATK

“Now I tune my zombie with my Grepher to synchro summon a new monster of my own. Meet Celestial Wolf Lord, Blue Sirius!”

CWL, BS: 2400 ATK

“Now we see Ren pulled off a new monster as well! I wonder what he’ll do with it?” The announcer wondered.

“Time to find out. But first, I’ll switch Dragon Spirit of White into attack mode!” Ren said.

DSoW: 2500 ATK

“Blue Sirius! Attack Driven Daredevil!” Ren commanded.

“But why? They have the same attack points. However, only your monster will be destroyed.” Ellsworth said as Daredevil slices Ren’s wolf lord in half.

“True. But that’s the point. You see, when Blue Sirius is destroyed and sent to my graveyard, he can drain away one of your monster’s attack points by twenty four hundred. Permanently.” Ren explained.

“What!?” Ellsworth said in shock.

DD: 0 ATK

“Now then, Dragon Spirit of White, let’s avenge my brother and send Ellsworth packing.” Ren commanded.

Ellsworth: 0000

“And just like that, Ren has finished what Yuten started! Now it all comes down to Sherry LeBlanc!”
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Big Brother Steps In

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Elsworth pulled into his team's pit and handed off his cards to Sherry. "I am sorry Lady Sherry. I have failed in my duty to you." He says.

"It iz okay Elsworth. I shall best zis lot myself." Sherry says as she pulls out. "Let us begin Monsieur Ren." She says with a draw.

Sherry: 4000; 4 SC
Ren: 4000; 8 SC

"Due to ze effects of Master and Servant's Resolve, I am forced to eizer pay 1000 life points or destroy ze card. I choose to not pay." She says as Elsworth's card is destroyed.

"First, since I have three or more speed counters, I can activate ze speed spell Star Changer. With zis card, I can raise or lower a monster's level by one. I shall use zis to decrease ze level of Driven Daredevil by one." She begins.

DD: 7-6*

"Next, I summon ze tuner monster Fleur Synchron."

FS: 200 DEF

"A tuner already?!" You exclaim.

"This is bad." Akiza adds.

"Now I shall tune my level two Fleur Synchron to my now level six Driven Daredevil to synchro summon Chevalier De Fleur in attack mode." She exclaims.

CDF: 2700 ATK

"And now Chevalier, attack Dragon Spirit of White." She calls out as her monster skillfully dices up the last card you left Ren.

Ren: 3800

"With zat, I end my turn with a face-down." She concludes.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A New Knight

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“My move.” Ren draws.

Ren: 9 SC
Sherry: 5 SC

“I activate the effect of Speed World 2. By releasing seven speed counters, I can draw another card.” Ren draws again.

Ren: 2 SC

“Now let me show you something very intriguing, Sherry. By tributing my Red-Eyes Black Dragon that is in my hand or on my field, I can summon this monster. Say hello to Red-Eyes Alternative Black Dragon.” Ren said as a newer version of Red-Eyes appeared.

REABD: 2400 ATK

“Wow!” You said as you were amazed.

“Guess his new upgrade really made his deck stronger.” Misty said.

“I’ll say.” Akiza said.

“Now, Red-Eyes! Attack Chevalier De Fleur!” Ren commanded.

With that, Sherry’s monster destroyed your dragon and damaged you.

Ren: 3500

“A shame, Monsieur Ren. Your dragon was weak to my De Fleur.” Sherry said.

“Maybe. But it was well worth it. When Red-Eyes Alternative Black Dragon gets destroyed, I can summon back the original Red-Eyes Black Dragon from my graveyard.” Ren said.

REBD: 2400 ATK

“It is still no difference.” Sherry said.

“Think again. When Red-Eyes Black Dragon is summoned by the effect of the alternative dragon, his attack points, permanently, becomes doubled of his original.” Ren explains with a grin.

“Impossible!” Sherry said in shock.

“Oh it’s quite possible.” Ren said.

REBD: 4800 ATK

“Now Red-Eyes has more attack points than that of my Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon.” You realized.

“And when he hits De Fleur, Sherry will lose half her life points in one blow.” Akiza said.

“Now destroy Chevalier De Fleur! Inferno Fire Blast!” Ren commanded as Red-Eyes unleashed the biggest fire blast ever.

“I do not zink so! I play ze trap card, Negate Attack. Your attack is stopped and ze battle phase ends.” Sherry said.

“Dang. Okay. I’ll just set a monster before ending my turn.” Ren ended.

“Even with a super charged up Red-Eyes, Ren was unable to dish out any damage to Sherry! But how can the french duelist fight back against this beast?” The announcer said.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: An Alternative Method

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"We shall ze." Sherry says as she draws.

Sherry: 6 SC
Ren: 3 SC

"I start by activating ze speed spell, A Blade Inherited." She begins. "Zis is a costly card, but it shall be what helps me slay your beast. Now, by removing six speed counters, I can remove from play one warrior-type monster in my graveyard to increase ze attack points of a warrior on my field equal to ze attack of ze removed monster until ze end of ze turn."

"Uh oh." Ren says, knowing where this was going.

"Even in defeat, Elsworth continues to serve dutifully, and I shall show you zat dedication." She says. "I remove from play Driven Daredevil to increase Chevalier De Fleur's attack points equal to his until ze end of ze turn."

CDF: 2700- 5100 ATK
Sherry: 0 SC

"Not good." You say as you watch this unfold.

"And now my Chevalier will attack your Red-Eyes Black Dragon." She says as her monster once again dices up another of Ren's monsters.

Ren: 3200

"With zat, I shall end my turn wiz anozer face-down." She concludes.

CDF: 5100- 2700 ATK

"Wow. I just one turn, Sherry used her teammate's monster to once again help her out. Now Ren's big plan has gone up in smoke. Can he recover?" The announcer says.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Knight Slaying the Dragon

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Time to find out!” Ren draws.

Ren: 4 SC
Sherry: 1 SC

Ren looks at his card and perhaps he can use it stall for more time.

“I set a monster face down and end my turn.” Ren said.

“Zat is it? I zought you’d put up more of a fight than zat.” Sherry said not impressed.

“Believe me. I have more than plenty of fight in me. But, if you believe that my skills are so insignificant...” Ren gives Sherry a jester that tells her to bring it to him. “Come prove it.”
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Going Defensive For Now

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Very well zen. I shall." Sherry says with a draw.

Sherry: 2 SC
Ren: 5 SC

"Chevalier, attack his face-down card." She commands.

"So quick? No other cards you wanna play?" Ren asks.

"I have no need. All I must do is slice away until I reach your life points." Sherry admits as she cuts through one of Ren's face-down cards.

Ren smirks at this attack. "Thanks for that." He says.

"Excuse moi?" Sherry questions as his face-down reveals itself.

"Behold Giant Germ." Ren reveals. "When its destroyed by battle, you take 500 points of damage. Then I get to special summon as many Giant Germs from my deck as possible." He says as two more Germs appear on the field while the original blasts Sherry before disappearing.

Sherry: 3500
GG: 1000 ATK

"Blast! I have fallen for such a simple trap. Very well zen. I shall end my turn wiz a face-down." She concludes.

"Looks like Ren's strategy is holding out. Now Sherry has to cut through three monsters before reaching his life points. And if those two new Germs bite it, that's another 500 points of damage each. Looks like Sherry might not even make it past Team Arcadia's second duelist." The announcer says.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Catching A Cold

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Okay then. Here goes.” Ren draws.

Ren: 6 SC
Sherry: 3 SC

“First, I’ll flip up my face down monster. My Mystic Tomato.” Ren said.

MT: 1400 ATK

“After that, by placing a card back on top of my deck, I can summon my Plaguespreader Zombie from graveyard.” Ren said.

PZ: 400 ATK

“Even though he’ll be removed from play once he leaves the field, it’ll be worth it. Because I tune it with my Tomato and one of my germs to synchro summon my partner in crime! Beelze of the Diabolic Dragons!” Ren called forth.

BotDD: 3000 ATK

“And there he is, folks! Ren’s number one monster is up and about and looks like he wants Sherry’s life points for dinner!” The announcer said.

“He will go away starving. I play ze trap card, Compulsory Evacuation Device!” Sherry said.

“Damn it!” You said.

“Zis trap card will bounce your monster back to your hand. However, since your dragon is a synchro monster, I am afraid he will return to your extra deck.” Sherry said as your dragon is bounced back.

“That sucks. I’ll just switch my Giant Germ into defense mode and set one card down before ending my turn.” Ren said.

GG: 100 DEF
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Slight Delay

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Very well zen. My draw." Sherry says.

Sherry: 4 SC
Ren: 7 SC

"Chevalier De Fleur, attack Giant Germ." She begins.

"Say what?!" Ren says in confusion as her monster attacks.

"I may take damage from your Germ's effect, but now your field will be completely empty to attack next turn." She explains.

"Not if I have anything to say about it. I play the trap Mirror Force. Now all your attack position monsters are destroyed." Ren counters.

"I'm afraid not." Sherry retorts. "Once on each of my turns, Chevalier iz allowed to negate one of your spell of trap cards. So Mirror Force will reflect nothing zis turn." Sherry's monster cuts right through the Mirror Force barrier right into Giant Germ.

Sherry: 3000

"Wiz zat, I shall end my turn wiz one face-down. Your move, Monsieur Ren." She concludes.

"Ren's getting lucky so far." Misty says.

"Yeah. If Sherry draws just one monster she can play, she can start going on the offensive directly unless Ren can step it up soon." You add.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Spreading the Sickness

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Okay. Time for a new plan.” Ren draws.

Ren: 8 SC
Sherry: 4 SC

“Good. By removing the three Giant Germs from my graveyard, I can special summon the Dark Necrofear in defense mode.” Ren said.

DN: 2800 DEF

“And with twenty-eight hundred defense points, you’ll have to find a different way to get to my life points first. So I’ll end my turn.” Ren said.

“Nice work. That Necrofear should by him some more time.” Akiza said.

“Yes. But how much time will that be?” You wondered in your mind.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Setting Up A Good Wall

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Zen it is my turn." Sherry starts.

Sherry: 5 SC
Ren: 9 SC

"And I shall have Chevalier attack your Dark Necrofear." She begins.

"What good's that gonna do? Necrofear’s defense points are stronger.” Ren questions.

"Not true. Wiz ze trap card Strike Slash, I can increase ze attack points of an attacking monster I control until ze end phase. So I increase Chevalier's attack by 700 points." She answers.

CDF: 3400 ATK

"Now attack!" She calls out again as her monster goes in to slash through Ren's. "And zere's more. When a monster boosted by Strike Slash attacks a monster in defense mode, ze controller still takes damage equal to ze difference between ze attack of my monster and ze defense of yours."

Ren: 2600

"And now your field iz wide open once more. So I shall end my turn." She concludes.

"Not so fast. Since you destroyed my Necrofear, his ability activates. During the end phase he was destroyed, I can equip him to one monster on your field and bring it over to my team, and I choose your Chevalier." Ren reveals as his monster returns and moves for Sherry's.

"Not so fast. I play my second face-down, Solemn Strike. Now, by paying 1500 life points, I can negate ze activation of a monster effect. So much for your Necrofear." Sherry dismisses as Ren's monster dissipates once more.

Sherry: 1500

"Sherry's holding on by a thread more and more as the duel goes on. She's lost half her life points already, and Team Arcadia still has their third duelist on standby. Can she even make it to the Black Rose herself? Or will the Black Knight prove too much for her?" The announcer wonders to the crowd.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Solemn Attack

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Here goes nothing.” Ren draws.

Ren: 10 SC
Sherry: 6 SC

“Alright, Sherry. You’re in for it now. Since I have five or more dark monsters in my graveyard while I have no monsters on my field, I can summon forth The Dark Creator in defense mode.” Ren said.

TDC: 3000 DEF

“Yeah! Now we’re getting somewhere!” You cheered.

“Next, with the effect of my Dark Creator, by removing a dark monster from my graveyard from play, I can summon another dark monster from graveyard back on to the field. I’ll remove my Dark Grepher in order to summon back my Red-Eyes Black Dragon.”

REBD: 2400 ATK

“It iz no concern to me. I defeated it before and I will defeat it again.” Sherry said with no fear.

“Not this time. I now summon the tuner monster, Unknown Synchron.” Ren said.

US: 0 ATK

“Another tuner monster?!” Sherry gasped.

“You got it. With this, I tune it with my Red-Eyes to bring back the monster you stopped dead in its tracks earlier. Beelze, come on back!” Ren said as his ace is called forth to the field and he’s here to stay this time.

BotDD: 3000 ATK

“There you have it, folks! Ren has his ace back on to the field and I have feeling it’s back for payback from before!” The announcer said.

“You better believe it. Beelze, give Sherry a taste of sweet revenge and destroy her Chevalier De Fleur. Twin Plasma Cannon!” Ren said as his ace destroys hers.

Sherry: 1200

“That’s my bro! Way to go!” You cheered while the girls smiled on with you.

“With that, my turn is done. You better hoped that you can pull off a miracle in this turn, Sherry. For it’s going to be your last. I promise you that.” Ren challenged.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Dark Dragon Returns

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Zen it iz my last chance." Sherry says with a draw.

Sherry: 7 SC
Ren: 11 SC

"I summon Necro Fleur in defense mode." She begins.

NF: 0000 DEF

"And zen I vill place two cards face-down and end my turn."" She concludes.

"Some miracle." Ren jokes. "That can't seriously be all you have. You might as well give up at this point."

"Never." Sherry spits back. "I vill not stop until I avenge my mozer and fazer's deaths as ze hands of Iliaster."

"Excuse me?" Ren replies.

"I do not know for what reasons you fight in zis tournament, nor do I care. All I care about iz defeating Iliaster and avenging what zey did to my parents. And to do zat, I must fight through you." She tells him.

"That's crazy." Ren says. "You're seriously planning to take those guys on all alone?"

"I vill do vat I must." Sherry replies.

"Well sister, sorry to say, but we've got our own date with those guys, and we can't be late." Ren retorts.

"Ve shall see. Now make your move." Sherry orders.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: One Last Defense

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“If you say so.” Ren draws.

Ren: 12 SC
Sherry: 8 SC

“First, I’ll use speed word 2’s effect to draw another card simply by removing seven speed counters.” Ren said.

Ren: 5 SC

“Okay, Sherry. You have your chance to finish me and you let the ball drop. Now I’m going to make you pay for it. And I’ll do that by summoning my Doomsday Horror in attack mode.” Ren said.

DH: ???? ATK

“His attack points are determined?” Sherry realized.

“That’s right. His attack and defense points are determined by the number of dark monsters that are removed from play times three hundred. Since there are five monsters, his attack and defense points are fifteen hundred.” Ren said.

DH: 1500 ATK

“Now to finish this. First, I’ll have Doomsday Horror destroy your Necro Fleur.” Ren declared.

“I do not zink so! I play ze trap card, Fleur Guard. Now Necro Fleur cannot be destroyed by battle zis turn.” Sherry said as she protected her monster.

“That means I can’t attack with Beelze this turn. You avoided a big casualty. I’ll just set this card down and end my turn. However, before you make your move, I want to say that I’m sorry if what you said about what happened to your parents is true. It must’ve been terrible.” Ren said with sympathy.

“I do not need your sympathy, Mousier Ren.” Sherry said shaking his words off.

“Actually, you kinda do. Look, I may not know what it’s like to lose parents, God forbid, but I know this, revenge won’t get them back. In fact, it won’t even heal the wounds in your heart. It’ll only make it worst. Besides, these Illiaster punks have some of the greatest powers we know so far. How do you expect to take them on alone?” Ren wondered.

“I do what must be done.” Sherry answered.

“What? Like dying?” Ren said that shock Sherry a bit. “I don’t know about you, but the chances are about you getting back at these guys are pretty low.” Ren said.

“And you and your friends have a better chance zan me?” Sherry asked.

“Well, we’re not sure one hundred percent, but you asked about what we’re fighting for and you don’t seemed to care, right? I’ll tell you anyway.” Ren said as Sherry listens. “For peace.”

“What?” Sherry wondered.

“For so long, the psychic population were outcasted by the rest of society and almost led a madman go to war with them. However, that was stopped thanks to my brother. We all have this dream that we can create harmony and peace between us just like the connection that was made between Satellite and New Domino. In order to make that into a reality, we must protect it by protecting the future. That’s why we duel and that’s why we’ll win.” Ren said.

Sherry was quite astonished with your speech as she sees you and the others at the pit when they come around. She sees the fire in all of your eyes that you all are fight for something so honorable. So noble.

With that done and with a smirk on her face, she makes her move.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Giving Sympathy

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Quite ze speech, Monsieur Ren. But I shall not give up so easily." She says as she draws.

Sherry: 9 SC
Ren: 6 SC

"First, I begin wiz ze speed spell, Star Speed. Now, by destroying one monster I control, I gain speed counters equal to it's level. So I destroy Necro Fleur." She begins as her monster is destroyed.

Sherry: 10 SC

"But now you're completely defenseless." Ren points out.

"Not quite. You see, when Necro Fleur iz destroyed by an effect, I am allowed to special summon Sorciere de Fleur from my deck." She reveals. A new monster appeared on her field as she says this.

SdF: 2900 ATK

"Too bad. Even if you attacked my Doomsday Horror, you still wouldn't do enough damage to finish me. Looks like that's the end." Ren says.

"Monsieur, you must learn to not speak when you do not know ze truz. It makes you look ze fool." Sherry says. "Wiz Sorciere's special ability, I can special summon one monster from your graveyard to my side of ze field. And I see it as only poetic zat I summon your precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon."

REBD: 2400 ATK

"No way! Not Red-Eyes!" Ren exclaims.

"Indeed. But before I continue, I play Speed World 2's effect to remove ten speed counters to destroy your face-down." She says as Ren's card is destroyed.

Sherry: 0 SC

"Next, I play my last face-down, High Half. Wiz zis card, I can take one of your monsters wiz 2000 or more attack points and cut zose points in half, and I choose your Beelze."

BotDD: 1500 ATK

"This is gonna hurt." Ren says.

"Wiz zat, I agree. And it will hurt even more wiz my last two speed spells." Sherry says. "Wiz ze Overboost speed spell, I can increase my speed counters by six until ze end of ze turn."

Sherry: 6 SC

"And wiz my speed counters now above four, I can play ze Rapid Shotwing speed spell to increase Red-Eyes' attack by 100 for each speed counter I have until ze end of ze turn."

REBD: 3000 ATK

"And now, Sorciere de Fleur, attack Doomsday Horror!" She declares as her monster fires a blast from it's staff to destroy Ren's monster.

Ren: 1200

"And now, my new Red-Eyes will attack Beelze. Go my dragon, and wipe out his life points." She concludes as Ren's own monster fires at him. Beelze survives, but Ren's life points don't.

Ren: 0000

"Since zis match is technically over, Beelze does not gain his attack bonus from zat battle. And since my turn ended, Red-Eyes is destroyed once more." She concludes.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Win Through Sorcery

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Ren pulls over to you guys and gets off.

“Sorry, guys. I tried.” Ren said.

“It’s alright man. You actually did hold your own out there.” You said.

“Thanks. Now it’s on you, Akiza. Good luck.” Ren said.

“You got it.” Akiza said as she gets on her runner, kissed you, and left on the track.

“So it is just you and me, Ms. Black Rose.” Sherry said.

“Yes it is and I’m going to knock you down.” Akiza draws.

Akiza: 7 SC
Sherry: 1 SC

“First, I’ll summon my Wall of Ivy in defense mode.” Akiza said.

WoI: 1200 DEF

“Then I’ll place two cards down and end my turn. It’s your turn now, Ms. French Pretty Face.” Akiza taunts.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Girl Action

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Oh? Do I detect a hint of jealousy?" Sherry comments on Akiza's tone as she draws her card.

Sherry: 2 SC
Akiza: 8 SC

"Not on your life. No matter what, I still have Yuten's love, and as long as I have that, what do you have for me to be jealous over?" Akiza asks rhetorically.

"Such confidence. Let us see if it vill last. Sorciere, attack Wall of Ivy." Sherry commands as Akiza's monster is destroyed.

"Sorry. But when Wall of Ivy is destroyed,I get to sprout up an Ivy token on your side of the field." Akiza points out.

IT: 0000 DEF

"No matter. Zis duel will end soon, and we vill avenge my family. I end my turn." Sherry concludes. "Let us see if you can make somezing of zis, miss Wilted Rose."
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Simple Trap

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“I tend to.” Akiza draws.

Akiza: 9 SC
Sherry: 3 SC

“First, since Beelze is still on my field thanks to Ren’s generosity, I’ll have him attach that Ivy Token. Go Twin Plasma Cannon!” Akiza said as her partner’s dragon destroyed the token. “Oh. And one thing I left out. When an Ivy Token gets destroyed, you take three hundred points of damage.”

Sherry: 900

“With that stunt. I’ll end it right there.” Akiza said.

“Nice play of her using your dragon, bro.” You said.

“All in a day’s work.” Ren said trying to look cool.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Touch of A Burning Rose

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Pazetic." Sherry mocks as she draws.

Sherry: 4 SC
Akiza: 10 SC

"I shall summon Fleur Squire in defense mode as a start." She begins.

FS: 500 DEF

"And now I play my Squire's ability. I can equip him to any 'Fleur' monster to increase its attack by 500. And I choose my Sorciere." She begins.

SDF: 3400 ATK

"But that makes his attack..." Akiza begins.

"Higher zen your Dark Creator. Now go Sorciere de Fleur, attack Dark Creator." She commands as a blast is fired at Ren's leftover monster. Akiza's life points were once again spared with it in defense mode. "Wiz zat, I place one card face-down and end my turn." She concludes.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Destroying the Creator

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Okay. Here we go!” Akiza said.

Akiza: 11 SC
Sherry: 5 SC

“First, by removing four speed counters, I can use the effect of Speed World 2 inflict eight hundred points of damage for each speed spell in my hand.” Akiza said.

Akiza: 7 SC

Sherry: 100

“Impressive. But I am still alive by one hundred points.” Sherry said.

“Not for long. I play the speed spell Angel Baton. I draw two cards and discard one.” Akiza said as she looks like she’s waiting for something. “Finally, I’ll remove my last seven speed counters to draw a new card.”

Akiza: 0 SC

Akiza hopes she draws the card she needs otherwise she’ll be in trouble. She draws and looks at it.

“This is it. I summon Twilight Rose Knight.” Akiza said.

TRK: 1000 ATK

“And with her special ability, I can summon my Rose Witch.” Akiza said.

RW: 1600 ATK

“Following that, I’m tuning my Knight with my Witch in order to synchro summon the one and only Black Rose Dragon.” Akiza said as her ace appeared.

BRD: 2400 ATK

“Oh yeah! That’s what I’m talking about!” You cheered for your girlfriend.

“And with my dragon’s special ability, she can destroy every card on the field when synchro summoned. Black Rose Gale!” Akiza said as every card on the field is destroyed, except for Beelze.

“This is it. Beelze, finish her off with your mighty Twin Plasma Cannon!” Akiza commanded for the win.

Sherry: 0000

“And there you go, folks! Team Arcadia is going to the semi finals!”
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Akiza's Finishing Blow

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Akiza pulled back into the pit with a smile on her face. "Alright Akiza, you did it!" You cheer as she gets up and the two of you hug.

"It's all thanks to Ren. He gave me the setup I needed to bring it all home. I would've been sunk without him." She says.

"Yeah, well, what can I say? I guess I just carry this team." Ren brags, getting him an elbow in the side from Misty.

"How about a little humility, huh?" She teases, causing all of you to laugh.

"Hey guys, good news." Sion says as he runs up. "Team 5Ds just won their match. They're going to the semifinals in their bracket."

"So then, that just leaves two teams. Only one of them could be our guys, and either us or Yusei and his friends will be facing them in the semis." You point out.

"So what? If we fight those Emperors of Iliaster next, then we'll just trash 'em like we've done every other team so far." Ren says.

"Easy there, mister sword. Before you start cutting through what isn't there yet, let's wait to see who we're up against." Akiza scolds.

"She iz right." You hear a voice say from behind you. You turn to see Sherry walking up. "Congratulations on your victory, Yuten Anjiou. But, you would do well to not underestimate Iliaster."

"Right, you were saying you had experience with them during our duel." Ren says.

"Indeed. Zey are powerful, both in duel monsters and in life. Zey control much of ze world secretly. No one would notice if not pointed out to zem. I warn you all, be careful when you face zem." She says before turning to leave.

"Well then, shall we head home to celebrate?" You offer.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Post-Match Warning

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You all made it back home and parked into the garage before heading upstairs. As you went up, you see your parents who has smiles on their faces.

“There you are! Well done today!” Kai said to congratulate his sons.

“I take it you guys saw it?” You guessed.

“We sure did! We’re so proud of you all!” Kourin said.

“Thanks, guys. How about you join us to celebrate?” Ren suggested.

“That sounds fun.” Kai said.

You all then went to the mess hall to get some food and drinks to enjoy together. You were having the good time until Ren wants to talk to you.

“This next match might be one of our toughest so far.” Ren said.

“Yeah. But I know we can over come this obstacle like we did today.” You said with confidence.

“You got that right. After that, we’ll win the finals and you’ll propose to Akiza.” Ren said while patting you on the back.

“Got that right.” You said as you see Akiza talking to Misty in the back room. “What about you?”

“Hmm?” Ren hummed

“What are your plans when this is over with? You thinking about proposing to Misty?” You teased a little.

“Woah now! We’re still like a month or two in our relationship. Let’s not jump the gun.” Ren said while blushing. “Although. I’m not so sure. I think maybe see the world. You know, have a nice vacation.”

“I think that’s a great idea. Perhaps Misty would like to join you.” You said.

“Yeah. That would be nice.” Ren said as you continued to celebrate.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Semi-Final Cheer

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
As the party wrapped up and your parents returned to their room and Misty went home, Ren was preparing to turn in as he stood in the doorway to his room. "Alright bro, I'm turning in. Two more days, then we're taking on the semis." He says.

"I can't wait." You tell him.

"Here's hoping these new cards bring us victory." Akiza says while pulling out Black Rose Queen.

"As strong as it is, my deck's strong enough that I can probably sweep those guys on my own without it." Ren jokes as he takes out his card.

"Just don't rule it out as an option, okay?" You ask as you take out Twin Burst. "We were given these cards for a reason, and if I recall, the spirit family specifically warned me about you not getting that card before the battle with the Meklord Emperors."

"Sure, sure." Ren shrugs off. "Just make sure that once I trounce those guys and we win this thing, I want my name in big bold letters engraved at the top of the trophy. R.E.N." He boasts.

"And just how do you know you're gonna be the one that brings down those three?" Akiza asks jokingly. "Last I checked, I won our duel at the demonstration. Who's to say I won't win it all for us when we fight them? I think my name should be emphasized in the engraving."

"Excuse me, both of you are wrong." You step in, joining their fun. "Unless I missed something, I'm team captain. Ergo, I should be the one that gets top billing on the trophy no matter what."

You all shoot each other angry glares before your scowls break down to quivering grins as you all start laughing at your "fight". "Ahaha. Alright you two, see ya later." Ren says before going in his room.

You and Akiza return to your own room and begin to undress for bed. "So... Akiza." You speak up.

"Yeah?" Akiza questions as she slips out of her riding outfit.

"About your duel with Sherry. Were you actually jealous of her?" You ask.

"Not a chance. Like I said, as long as I have you, what does she have?" She says with confidence. "Besides, it's not like she's sexier than me, right?"

"I don't think such a thing is possible." You say as you two snuggle into bed for the night and turn in.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: After the celebration

choices: You got a phone call first
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You opened your eyes to a new bright morning. You then looked over and you see Akiza sleeping so peacefully on her stomach. You decided to have a little morning fun as you climbed down her body before you reached your face to her butt that is covered by her lacy pink panties.

You moved the panties aside before you stick your face in her butt and give her butthole a few licks. You can hear her soft moaning as you keep up with the licking.

Eventually, she looked behind you and you see the smirk of satisfaction on her face.

“What do you think you’re doing back there?” Akiza asked.

“Just thought I make the morning a little more entertaining.” You said to her.

“You’ve certainly did well with that, you little sneak. In fact, get back in there.” Akiza said as she grabbed the back of your head and shoved your face right back in her ass. “If you want to have your fun, then make it worth while for me by licking my butt clean.”

You do just that as you swirled your tongue around her anus and she was feeling very turned on. After a few minutes, she was satisfied enough and you take your face out to see Akiza’s wonderful face.

“Bet that beats any alarm clock.” You said to her.

“Sure did.” Akiza said with a blush.

“Let me go wash up and we’ll start our day.” You said as you go shower.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Wake Up Fun

choices: Take a nice ride through town
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
As you step out of the shower and begin to dry off, you hear the phone ringing nearby. "Hello?" You respond as you pick up.

"Hey, it's Yusei." You hear on the other end.

"What's up, man?" You ask.

"Jack, Crow and I just had a run-in with our opponents for the next match, Team Ragnarok." He says.

"You don't mean they were..." You trail off.

"No. They're another group looking to take out the emperors in this tournament. They're strong, I can feel it." He replies.

"Good to know we have strong allies. But if you're dueling them in the next round, then that mean's we really are facing the emperors next." You sigh.

"Yeah, I took the liberty of checking out the bracket. They're called Team New World." He tells you.

"Good to know. Well, here's hoping we win this so you don't have to worry. Thanks man." You say before hanging up.

"Who was that?" Akiza asks as she steps in from the kitchen while you begin to get dressed.

"Yusei. He's confirmed that we're getting first crack at the emperors of Iliyaster tomorrow." You tell her while throwing on your cloak.

"Then I guess we're going to be the one's getting the glory, after all." She says with a smirk. "So, shall we?"

"What's the plan for today?" You ask.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Call to Confirm

choices: You two go see some friends along the way
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“How about we go through town for a while? You know, to enjoy the view together.” You suggested.

“That sounds lovely.” Akiza said as you go to your runners.

You both drove off in the streets until you reached the bridge. You took the time to look at the bridge and remembered your two duels against that evil robotic version of you. It was a mental hell for you and you over came that humongous obstacle. Tomorrow, that obstacle is going to get bigger when you face the emperors.

“Something wrong, Yuten?” Akiza asked.

“No. I’m just thinking about everything that has happened in this crazy journey of ours.” You said.

“I know. It was quite the ride. Stopping bad guys, reuniting families, beating evil robots, it was nuts.” Akiza said.

“I’ll say. You know, I talked to Ren last night about what he wanted to do when this is all over. He said he wanted to travel around the world like a vacation. Also told him that he should take Misty with him.” You said.

“I think that’s a great idea. After all that’s happened, I don’t blamed him for wanting one.” Akiza said.

“Same here.” You said as you drive ahead.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Date Through Town

choices: "Are you sure you guys will be okay?"
She's interrupted by another knock at the door.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Hey, aren't we near The Tops right now?" You ask.

"I think so, why?" Akiza asks.

"How about we check in on Leo and Luna? Since we haven't seen them other than when Sayer took them, and all." You suggest.

"That sounds like a great idea. I'm sure they'd love to see us again." She agrees as you both make a sharp turn towards the twins' home.

*****

After passing through the security at the parking lot, you both made your way up the elevator to the twins' penthouse. "Man, remember the last time we were doing this?" You ask as you head for their door.

"Yeah, back when we were looking for Ren the first time, and we didn't even know we were going to their home." She responds. "It feels so long ago after everything that's happened, even though it's only been a month or so."

You knock on the door and find it quickly answered by Luna. "Oh, hey guys. What's up?" She asks as she waves you inside.

"Not much. We were in the neighborhood and bored out of our skulls, so we figured we stop by." You say as you walk in. "Hope that isn't a problem."

"Not at all. We're friends, after all. Besides, after all you guys and Ren have done for us, we certainly don't mind, right Leo?" She asks as you all walk into the main room to see her twin brother laying back on the couch.

"Huh?" He asks as he cranes his head to see who was here, only to have his eyes go wide when he sees it's you two. "Hey! I was just thinking about calling you." He says as he runs up to Akiza.

"Oh? And what would that be about?" She asks.

"Well, I've been interested in your deck for a while, so I was hoping you could show me a few combos you like to use." He says.

"Leo... is this because our homework this week is about plant monsters?" Luna scolds.

"Aww, come on, sis. I work better with machines, I just don't get plants." He whines, making you both laugh a bit.

"So what, am I your go-to guy when it comes time for dragon homework?" You jokingly ask.

"Very funny." Leo pouts as he returns to the couch.

"Hey... guys?" Luna speaks up. "About your match tomorrow, with those emperor guys?"

"Yeah? What's up?" You ask.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: You two go see some friends along the way

choices: You want to order lunch for you all
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Are you sure you guys will be okay?” Luna asked in concern.

“Of course we’ll be. You have nothing to worry about, Luna.” You said.

“It’s just that they did everything they could to hurt us, mostly you guys.” Luna said nervously.

“We understand. We’ll make sure they’ll get what’s coming to them. You just need to believe.” Akiza said as well as Luna nodded.

“Well, make sure you give them a few hard blows for us. Especially to that Lester jerk.” Leo said.

“You got it.” You said.

“So what do we do now?” Luna asked.

“If you want, I’ll be more than happy to help you with that homework of yours.” Akiza said.

“Really? Thanks, Akiza!” Leo said happily.

“No problem. I’ll be right back.” Akiza said as she goes get her deck and duel disk from her runner.

She came back and has her duel with Leo outside while you watched on with Luna.

“She seems to up her game a little.” Luna said.

“We all did. With this, the emperors will get the bashing of a lifetime.” You said.

“So Yuten? What are your plans when the tournament is over?” Luna wondered.

“I have something in store for us.” You said as the image of you purposing to Akiza plays in your head again.

“Can’t wait. Hope you do well.” Luna said as you smiled.

Then you went to the phone for...
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Relaxing With The Twins

choices: You and Akiza stick around a little longer after lunch
Once lunch is done, you and Akiza head back out
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Hey!" You call out to the two duelists. "I'm ordering lunch, anyone interested?"

"Ooo, ooo. Pizza!" Leo shouts out.

"That would be great. Pepperoni, if you can." Akiza adds as all eyes go to Luna.

"Sure, I can eat." The green-haired girl comments.

"Alright then, I'll order up a large." You say as you dial up the nearest place that delivers.

*****

You had placed the order nearly twenty minutes ago. In that time, the duel between Akiza and Leo had come to a close, with Leo having barely damaged Akiza before she won. "Dang it! I'm still no closer to figuring out plants then I was when we started." He says in frustration. "There's no way I'm gonna have a good practice plant deck made in time."

"Relax, Leo. Just remember that plant monsters are strongest when they have a good graveyard setup and you'll be fine." Akiza assures as she helps him off the ground.

"Alright. Thanks for the help, then." Leo sighs as they come back to you and Luna watching. "So when's this pizza showing up?"

"Believe me, I wish I knew." You sigh as you were starting to get hungry. "Although, that reminds me, where's your normal babysitter today? I've noticed that my brother hasn't come by this whole time."

"We gave him the day off so he can focus on winning tomorrow." Luna answers. "We weren't expecting you guys to show up here."

"Honestly, neither did we." Akiza admits as the doorbell finally rings.

"About time, looks like that's our food." You say as you get up to go grab it.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: You want to order lunch for you all

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
After you all eat, you sat at the couch looking at your deck. You were just thinking about how you’ll fair against the emperors tomorrow. It’ll definitely be one of the most toughest duels you’ll have. But you just have the feeling that you’ll come out on top. You don’t know how, but you just know it in you.

“Thinking about tomorrow?” You looked to see Luna asking you.

“Yeah. This is a duel we just have to win.” You said.

“No kidding. But we know you’ll win.” Leo said.

“Thanks guys.” You said as Akiza sits next to you.

“Don’t forget that we have everyone’s support for us.” Akiza said.

“Right. You two, 5d’s, Misty, our parents, everyone.” You said with a smile.

“And the support we share for our team itself.” Akiza said.

“Yeah. Me, My brother, and this hot rose that you are.” You complimented Akiza.

“Stop it.” Akiza said while blushing.

“That’s so adorable.” Luna said loving how you two look together.

“Heh. You know, it feels like yesterday you two just got together after the dark signers were beaten.” Leo said.

“Yeah. It’s been a road of unexpected revelations. Though, it’s been unexpected for the best and we’ll make sure it stays that way.” You said.

“Well, if you want, I can duel you to help you get ready.” Luna said.

“Sure. Let me get ready.” You said as you prepare yourself.

Outside, it was now going to be you vs Luna.

“Hope you won’t be scared, Luna.” You said.

“Don’t worry. I’ll be fine.” Luna said and you nodded before starting the duel.

“Let’s duel!”

You: 4000
Luna: 4000
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: After Lunch

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"I'm warning you, Luna, don't think I'm gonna go easy on you," You tell her.

"I don't expect you to. I'll even give you first move." She says.

"Why thank you." You say as you draw. "I'll start by summoning Protector with Eyes of Blue."

ProEB: 800 ATK

"And when he's summoned, I can special summon a level one light tuner from my hand, so I'll play Priestess with Eyes of Blue."

PriEB: 0000 DEF

"Next, my Protector's other ability, I can target one other effect monster on my field and send it to the graveyard to special summon a Blue-Eyes monster from my hand. So I sacrifice my Priestess to summon my Blue-Eyes White Dragon." You say as both your monsters disappear.

BEWD: 3000

"Man, you weren't kidding when you said you weren't going easy on me, huh?" She says. "But wait, why'd your Protector go too?"

"Because, when Priestess is targeted by an effect, I can send another effect monster to the graveyard to add two 'Blue-Eyes' monsters to my hand, and I sent my Protector to add another Blue-Eyes White Dragon and Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon to my hand." You explain. "I think that'll do for now. You're up Luna."
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Simple Beginning

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Then I draw.” Luna draws her card. “First, I summon Sunlight Unicorn in attack mode.”

SU: 1800 ATK

“Then I activate my unicorn’s special ability. I look at the top card of my deck. If that card is an equip spell card, I can add it to my hand.” Luna said as she looks at the top card and reveals it to be...

Horn of the Unicorn.

“Since it’s an equip spell card, I add it to my hand.” Luna said.

“I see what you’re trying to do. You want to increase your unicorn’s attack points with that card. Not bad. However, even if you do activate it, it’ll only stand at twenty-five hundred attack points. That’ll still make it no match for Blue-Eyes.” You pointed out.

“I wouldn’t be so sure, Yuten. Who said I was thinking about making my unicorn stronger?” Luna said with a smirk.

“You’re not?” You wondered in confusion.

“Nope. I have something else in mind. And it involves with this. The spell card, Creature Swap.” Luna said.

“Uh oh!” You gasped.

“This spell would normally allow us to pick a monster on our fields to switch places with. But, as you can see, we each only have one monster out. That means we don’t have much of a choice.” Luna said as both her Unicorn and your Blue-Eyes trade places.

“Wow! Now Luna can use Blue-Eyes against Yuten.” Leo said as he and Akiza watched the duel.

“Impressive, Luna.” Akiza complimented.

“Now I play Horn of the Unicorn to increase Blue-Eyes’s attack and defense points by seven hundred.” Luna said.

BEWD: 3700 ATK

“This is going to hurt.” You said.

“Now, Blue-Eyes. Attack Sunlight Unicorn with your White Lightning!” Luna said as your dragon actually attacks you by hitting the unicorn.

You: 2100

“Forgive me, Yuten.” Blue-Eyes said.

“No worries. She was just smart. I’ll give her that.” You said.

“It sure was. For now, I’ll end my turn with two face downs.” Luna said.

“You made an interesting strategy, signer.” Blue-Eyes complimented to Luna.

“Well, like Yuten said, I’m just smart.” Luna said.

You remembered that Luna can talk to spirit monsters too. It does make sense that she can understand your dragon.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Using Your Dragon Against You

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You draw your card as your turn begins. "Sorry Luna, but I can't exactly let you hold on to my monster. So, by revealing one Blue-Eyes White Dragon in my hand, I can special summon Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon from my hand to the field."

BEAWD: 3000 ATK

"And now for his special ability, I can destroy one monster on your field at the cost of my dragon's attack this turn." You continue.

"Not quite. With the Fiendish Chain trap card, I can negate the effects of one monster on the field and prevent it from attacking." Luna interrupts as your dragon was bound in chains.

"Not bad, too bad he's not staying around." You retort.

"What's that supposed to mean?" She asks.

"With Priestess with Eyes of Blue's effect, I can send one 'Blue-Eyes' monster from my field back to the deck to special summon her from my graveyard." You tell her.

PriEB: 0000 DEF

"Now, I'll play the effect of Sage with Eyes of Blue from my hand. So by discarding him and sacrificing an effect monster on my field, I can special summon a 'Blue-Eyes' monster from my deck. This time, I'll choose Dragon Spirit of White." You reveal.

DSW: 2500 ATK

"Hey wait, that card doesn't have 'Blue-Eyes' in the name, how come he can summon it?" Leo questions.

"Because, Leo. My Spirit is always considered a Blue-Eyes monster, even if it's not in his name." You tell him. "And now, since he was summoned, I can banish one spell or trap card on the field, so say goodbye to your Horn of the Unicorn and Blue-Eyes' attack boost."

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"And before you go bragging that your dragon is still stronger, let's take a look at my Spirit's other ability, shall we? Since you have monsters on your field, I can release my Spirit to special summon a Blue-Eyes of my own from my hand, and as you recall from summoning Alternative White Dragon, I do have one. So now arise to my side, Blue-Eyes White Dragon." You announce.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

"I hate to do this to you two, but I can't let her keep you. Go Blue-Eyes, attack your brother with White Lightning!" Both dragons prepare to fire their blasts.

"I don't think so! I still have one face-down, Threatening Roar. Now, you can't declare an attack this turn." Luna interrupts once more. "Sorry Yuten, but this dragon is mine to hold on to for another round."

An admirable attempt, master. The Blue-Eyes on Luna's field says to you.

Indeed. It just means we'll have to try harder to reclaim my kin. The Blue-Eyes you control says.

"Very well, then. I'll set a card face-down and end my turn." You conclude.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Mirror Match

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Here we go.” Luna draws. “I play Graceful Charity. I draw three cards and then discard two.” Luna does just that. “Then I’ll activate Monster Reborn. Now I can bring back the monster I just sent away. Meet Fairy King, Truesdale.”

FKT: 2200 ATK

“After that, I summon the tuner monster, Sunny Pixie.”

SP: 300 ATK

“A tuner huh?” You wondered with interest.

“That’s right. Now I tune my pixie with my king in order to synchro summon this. Ancient Fairy Dragon!” Luna said as her ace appears.

AFD: 2100 ATK

“Alright. Now she has two dragons on her side.” Leo cheered on for his sister.

“It is an honor to battle beside you.“ Ancient Fairy Dragon said to the Blue-Eyes on Luna’s field.

“I can say the same for you.” Blue-Eyes said back.

“I’m up against this dragonic duo?” You said.

“You better believe it. Next, I’ll play the spell, Shrink. This will cut your dragon’s attack points in half.” Luna said.

BEWD: 1500 ATK

“Oh boy.” You said.
