“Now, Blue-Eyes. Take out your twin.” Luna said as her Blue-Eyes destroyed yours.

You: 600

“Woah! I never seen her this good before.” Leo said surprised at Luna’s skills.

“Her studies at duel academy really paid off.” Akiza said.

“Sorry, Yuten. But I win. Ancient Fairy Dragon. Attack Yuten directly.” Luna said to finish the game.

“I don’t think so. I play the trap card, Counter Gate.” You said as you’re safe.

“What?” Luna said.

“It stops your direct attack dead in its tracks. After that, I get to draw one card. If the card I drew is a monster, I get to summon it.” You said as you draw and you smiled at what you got. “I summon Maiden with Eyes of Blue.”

MwEoB: 0 ATK

“Okay then. I end my turn.” Luna said.

“Great Ancient Fairy Dragon. It is a pleasure and honor to see you.“ Kisara said to Luna’s dragon.

“And to you too, Lady Kisara.“ Ancient Fairy Dragon said.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Two Top Dragons Against You

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"It's my move then." You begin as you draw. "And I'll start with the Monster Reincarnation spell card. Now I can send one card from my hand to the graveyard to add a monster to my hand from the grave. So by discarding Master With Eyes of Blue, I can add Sage With Eyes of Blue to my hand. Next, I'll play my Master's effect. I can shuffle him from my graveyard back into my deck to target an effect monster on my field and send it to the graveyard to special summon a Blue-Eyes from the grave. So I'll target my Maiden."

"That's not good." Luna notes.

"Nope, and it's about to get worse. Since my Maiden was targeted by a card effect, I'm allowed to special summon a Blue-Eyes White Dragon from my hand, deck, or graveyard, and as it just so happens, I have a third one waiting in the wings, so now I gain two Blue-Eyes White Dragons." You explain as Kisara disappears and two of your dragons show up.

BEWD: 3000 ATK

So, it would seem we are all here, my kin. The Blue-Eyes Luna controls says.

Let us do battle swiftly so our master can control us all once more. One of your dragons says.

"Agreed. Let's continue with that little mirror match from before, shall we? Blue-Eyes, attack with White Lighting! Bring back your fellow dragon!" You order as both beasts clash, destroying both.

"And now I have one dragon left, so, Blue-Eyes number two, attack Ancient Fairy Dragon with White Lightning!" You call out as your second dragon fires, destroying Luna's ace.

Luna: 3100

"And with that, I'll end my turn with a face-down."
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Reclaiming Your Dragon

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“It’s my turn.” Luna draws her next card. “I play the spell card, Pot of Greed. Now I can draw two extra cards. Then I’ll summon Kuribon to the field.” Luna said.

K: 300 ATK

“Then I’ll play one card face down and end my turn.” Luna said.

Blue-Eyes took a look at Kuribon and growled at it to scare the furry monster, which succeeded as Kuribon almost wet herself.

“It’s okay, Kuribon. Blue-Eyes isn’t that scary.” Luna said to calm her monster.

“Yeah. She’s really friendly. As long as you don’t get on her bad side, of course.” You said as you sweat dropped at that last statement while laughing sheepishly.

“Oh dear.” Akiza sighed while shaking her head.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Little One Steps Up

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Uhh, right, it's my move." You say with a draw. "And I think it's about time that Kuribon got to meet my dragon in person. Go White Lightning!" You call out as your dragon fires a blast.

"Not so fast, Kuribon's special ability activates. Now she returns to my hand completely safe, while you gain life points equal to your monster's attack points." She explains as her monster returns.

"How generous of you. It's just a shame that his ability doesn't negate my dragon's attack for the turn, and now your field is wide open." You rant.

"It's a shame then that you've lost this duel before you get to do that attack, huh?" She asks.

"What's that supposed to mean?"

"Aww, here we go." Leo chants. "It's Luna's big combo."

"Big combo?" Akiza questions.

"I play my face-down, Bad Reaction to Simochi. Now, any life points you would recover are instead dealt as damage, and since Kuribon's effect would've given you your dragon's full attack of 3000, that means you take 3000 points of damage instead." She explains. "And with only 600 life points left, I don't think you'll survive."

A purple beam fires from her card, hitting you and causing a massive explosion. "Alright Luna, you won! Way to go!" Leo cheers.

"I wouldn't be so sure." Akiza says with a smirk.

"Huh?" Both twins look back at the clearing smoke where you stood.

You: 600

"B-but that's impossible. How didn't you lose?" Luna questions.

"Simple, with my own trap, Guardian Light of Blue. Now, since I would've taken damage from a card effect, I can remove from play light monsters in my graveyard to negate a thousand points of damage each. So by removing my Protector, Priestess, and Maiden from play, I'm saved from all 3000 points." You explain. "And since I'm still in this duel, my dragon still gets his attack. Now attack with White Lighting!" You repeat as your dragon fires at Luna directly.

Luna: 100

"With that, I end my turn." You conclude
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Close Call

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“I go now.” Luna draws. “I play the spell card, Pot of Greed. I can now draw two more cards.” Luna does that. “Then I’ll summon Regulus in defense mode.”

R: 1000 DEF

“Then I’ll use his special ability to put the field spell, Savage Colosseum, from my graveyard to my deck. Then I’ll place one card face down and end my turn.” Luna said.

“Regulus.” Blue-Eyes said as she recognized the lion.

“Great White Dragon. It is a true honor to be in your presence.“ Regulus said in respect.

“Indeed. Now let us continue our battle.“ Blue-Eyes said.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Lion Faces The Dragon

choices: You and Akiza hang around a bit longer to make sure Luna's okay
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Sorry Luna, but it's all over now." You say as you draw. "I'll start with a spell card, Silver's Cry. Now I can special summon a normal dragon-type monster from my graveyard, and since my Dragon Spirit of White just happens to be treated as a normal monster in my graveyard, he gets to be summoned." You say as your dragon returns.

DSW: 2500 ATK

"And with his special ability, when he's summoned, I can remove from play one spell or trap card on your field. So that face-down you played is getting removed." You explain as her card vanishes. "And now, my spirit, attack Regulus." You dragon blasts the lion apart with ease.

"Uh oh, Luna's field's completely empty." Leo says. "She's gonna lose."

"And now, Blue-Eyes, attack with White Light..." You start to announce before you see Luna looking a bit faint as she begins wobbling while she stands. "Oh shoot! Luna, you alright?"

"Y-yeah. Guess I just exerted myself a bit too much." She says with a light chuckle as Akiza walks over and grabs the child, carrying her back inside.

"I think that this duel's been decided anyway, wouldn't you?" She asks.

"Yeah, you win Yuten." She says before closing her eyes.

"Is she alright?" You ask as you run up while the holograms fade.

"She's fine. She just must've been tired from the duel." Akiza assures as you follow her inside to see her tuck the girl into bed.

"Yeah, Luna does that sometimes when a duel gets too intense for too long." Leo adds. "Remember what happened against that creepy professor guy from the Fortune Cup?"

"Fair enough." You say as you remember those events while leading the two out of her room and softly shutting the door behind you.

What happens next?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: A Final Attack?

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Listen, you guys can leave if you want. I’ll keep an eye on Luna.” Leo said.

“Are you sure, Leo?” Akiza asked.

“Yep. Just leave it to me.” Leo said.

“Alright. If anything happens, just call us. Okay?” You suggested.

“You got it.” Leo said before you two left.

You felt bad for leaving Luna in her state. But Leo can, hopefully, take care of her and she just needs a little nap before getting back up. That’s all you can hope for as you ride down the street with Akiza.

“She’ll be just fine, Yuten. She just needs to get some good sleep is all.” Akiza said.

“I know. And I trust Leo will take good care of her.” You said as you...
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Leaving Luna To Rest

choices: The night before the big day
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Alright, Akiza, it's starting to get late. And we'll need all we got for tomorrow's duel." You tell her as you continue to ride. "I think it's time we went home and started to unwind."

"Yeah, that sounds nice." She says in agreement as the two of you take off back home.

*****

Once you arrived, it was almost dark. You quickly parked in the garage and secured your runners for the night and began to go up to your room. "Hey, Yuten?" She says questioningly. "Do your legs feel heavier going up these stairs than usual, or is it just me?"

"What, do you need me to carry you up?" You jokingly ask. Your joking attitude quickly fades with the look she's giving you. "Yeah, I know what you mean. This time around, we're not just walking up to our room for another night together. We're going up for what could very well be our last time. Once we're there, and we go to bed later tonight, there will be no going back. Tomorrow could very well be our last day together if they beat us and Team 5Ds."

"Then, maybe we should make tonight special. You know, just in case." She offers as she takes your hand.

"No. Because if we talk like that, then we've already lost." You say with confidence.

"But what about that whole speech you just made?" She asks. "About how this could be our last day together?"

"I meant that as our bodies being nervous. We just need to be stronger than our bodies. We just need to be confident that we're gonna win this. Tomorrow morning, we'll beat Team New World, and then come the finals, we'll beat Team 5Ds and win it all. If we start acting like this is our final night together, then we've accepted our loss already." You rant.

"I see." She says, intently listening to your ramblings.

"So no, there won't be any fooling around tonight 'just in case'." You tell her. "Because once we win this thing, I will do everything to you that night. So let that be your motivation to push on past these emperor freaks."

"Aye aye, captain." She replies with a giggle at your words as you reach your room. "Then I'll go get dinner ready."
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Going Home

choices: Just one last thing before you sleep
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
It was time for dinner and you and Akiza eat together. As you eat, you think about tomorrow as you’ll be up against one of the biggest threats since the dark signers. Everything you and the others worked on, trained, and build has lead you to this big moment in the semi finals. This may well be your last day for if you lose, the whole world loses. That is something that you just can’t let to happen.

“Thinking about our match tomorrow?” Akiza asked you.

“I am. Everything will definitely be on the line in this one duel. One team’s victory could determine our future’s fate.” You said with seriousness.

“I know you feel anxious about this. But remember who and what you’re fighting for. That’s your motivation.” Akiza said to get you to feel better.

You indeed remember who and what you’re fighting for. Your friends, family, a chance for world peace, and, of course, a chance to ask for Akiza’s hand in marriage. All of that will motivate you to win when it’s all said and done. Akiza still see your hand shaking a little and she gets up to rub herself on you.

“I know you said no fooling around. But it doesn’t mean I can’t help you relax.” Akiza said as she pressed her breasts on your back while rubbing her hands on your shoulders.

“Thanks, Akiza. I do needed that.” You said as you calmed down.

“You’re my boyfriend, Yuten. I love you so much to where I’ll do anything to help you.” Akiza said.

You then grasped on to her hand and hold on it to it real tight.

“I know. And so will I for you.” You said before give your girlfriend a deep kiss.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Remembering Your Purpose

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"Come on. It's time." Akiza says as she breaks the kiss and pulls you over to the bed. You both undress as you prepare for tomorrow.

"Here we go." You say as you finish and climb in with her. "Hey, turn around for me, please." You ask her.

"I thought there wouldn't be any fooling around tonight." Akiza says as she turns her back to you anyway.

"There won't be. I just figured I would pay you back for your massage earlier." You tell her as you proceed to rub her shoulders. "Sorry I only have my hands to rub you with compared to what you gave me."

"It's fine. Your hands are all I need." She coos as you continue to rub. "In fact... I think I'm starting to... toooo." She says drowsily before nodding off completely.

Noticing this, you decide to turn in yourself. Just before you click off the lights, you notice your deck on the nightstand. You put your hand on it and focus a bit. This is it, everyone. I need all of your help tomorrow. We need our A game if we wanna save everyone. You think as your cards give a faint glow in response.

With that, you finally turn off the light before turning back to spoon Akiza, making sure you comfort her even while you slept as you finally felt yourself get tired enough to fall asleep as well.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Time for bed

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You wake up in the morning to see Akiza’s beautiful sleeping face this close to you. You bring yourself closer to her and give her a kiss on the cheek.

“Time to get up, baby.” You whispered as Akiza did get up.

You both took your showered, ate breakfast together, and got dressed before going to get Ren too. You knocked on his door and he answers the door, only to see him with Misty.

“Misty? I didn’t know you were in here.” You said surprised to see her.

“Today’s going to be one of your toughest duels ever. I decided to surprise Ren by coming here last night.” Misty said holding Ren’s hand.

“She surprised me good and really helped me get some motivation.” Ren said.

“That’s what we all need for this duel.” Akiza said.

“Better believe it. How about we show these emperors that they don’t call the shots about our future, we do?” You said as you extend your hand out.

“You can count on us, Yuten.” Akiza said bringing her hand on top of yours.

“Without a doubt.” Ren said bringing his in.

“Agreed.” Misty said bringing in hers.

“Yeah!” You all yelled before raising your hands up.

“Wait!” You all turned to see your parents. “Don’t forget about our support.” Kai said as your parents come in to hug you and Ren.

“Promise us you’ll be safe.” Kourin said to you two.

“We definitely will, mom. Count on it.” You said while Ren just nodded.

Your parents then turned to your girlfriends and they hugged them too.

“Those boys mean a lot to us. We’re so happy they found love with you two.” Kourin said to Akiza and Misty

“We’re just happy to find them.” Akiza said.

“Yep. They maybe knuckleheads, but they’re OUR knuckleheads.” Misty said to tease you and Ren.

“Hey!” You two said at the same time as the girls playfully sticked the tongue out to you while your parents just chuckled.

“Alright. Anyway, let’s do this!” You said as they all agreed.

You then started walking out with your team as your parents just looked on at you two feeling proud of you guys of how far you’ve come.

“Our boys are all grown up, honey.” Kourin said happily.

“They sure are, sweetheart. They sure are.” Kai said.

It was as if heroes were born on this day for this could be your finest hour.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Big Day Is Here

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
You and your team pull into the arena and begin setting up to duel. "So, anyone else's hands shaking a bit?" Ren asks while revving up his runner, causing Misty to walk over and hold his hand steady.

"Yeah, all of us probably are." You tell him. "This isn't gonna be like our other duels so far. This one is for all the chips."

"The fate of the world..." Akiza trails off.

"You three will do great, I'm sure." Michelle says with confidence.

"Your runners are all running at peak performance." Sion reports. "You got this."

"Alright then, gather 'round." You declare, causing those in your pit to stand up around you. "Now we don't know much about who these guys are or why they're doing this, but we do know this, if they succeed, then all of New Domino is gonna get wiped out, and we're not about to let that happen, are we?"

"Hell no!" Ren shouts.

"If these bastards wanna threaten our friends, our families, our home, then they better be prepared to get a fight for it." You continue to rant. "So give it all you got, and don't give up till the last draw!" You conclude.

"Not a chance." Akiza chimes in. "So, who's going first?"

"That little twerp, Lester is gonna be riding first. I dunno about you lot, but I owe him a little payback for what he did to the twins." Ren declares. "Any objections?"

"None here. Yuten?" Akiza asks.

"Go for it, bro." You tell him as he goes to prepare.

"I'll be taking next after him." Akiza tells you with no room for discussion.

"Alright then, just be safe." You request with a kiss on her forehead as you all pile around the monitor to watch the duel.

Ren and just pulled up to his line, while this Lester kid rides up in some sort of skateboarding contraption. "What's this now? Can you even turbo duel with that?" Ren questions.

"Indeed. This right here is a duel board, and it's going to be the last thing you or this whole city ever sees." Lester cackles.

"Alright folks, here we are at the semifinals!" The announcer bellows over the microphone. "In this legendary match, we have Team Arcadia versus Team New World. From Team Arcadia, we have the Black Knight himself, Ren Anjiou, and his opponent from Team New World, it's the mischievous Lester! Duelists, on your marks!" He calls out as the countdown begins. "And begin!" He says as the green light signals and both duelists floor it.

Who goes first?
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Light is Green

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Ren and Lester goes back and forth in this race for the first turn until Lester manages to make it there first.

“Looks like I’ll start the show. Shall we?” Lester draws. “I summon Sky Core to the field.”

SC: 0 ATK

“Then I’ll place three cards face down and end my turn.” Lester said.

“That doesn’t seemed to like a good start to me.” Akiza said.

“Actually, it might be.” You said getting her attention. “Whatever that core is, it may have no attack points, but I have a feeling there is more to it than that. Besides, that starting move is like one of the oldest dueling tricks in the book. Ren needs to be careful.”
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: New World Begins

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
"If you think you can psych me out, you have another thing coming." Ren growls as he draws his card.

Ren: 1 SC
Lester: 1 SC

"I'll start by summoning Armageddon Knight in attack mode." He begins.

AK: 1400 ATK

"And with his special ability, when he gets summoned, I get to send a dark monster from my deck to my graveyard, and I choose Plaguespreader Zombie." He says.

"That's good and all, but it's too bad you fell right into my trap card, Torrential Tribute." Lester says as his first trap flips up. "Now, since a monster was summoned, all monsters on the field are destroyed."

A large wave sweeps over the two of them, destroying both Ren's monster and Lester's core. "But why do that? Why not wait until I have more?" Ren questions.

"Simple. Because when Sky Core is destroyed by a card effect, at the cost of all other monsters on my field, that being none, I can summon out my mightiest beast." Lester reveals.

"Here we go." You say.

"So soon?" Misty asks.

"I now summon my Meklord Emperor Skiel Infinity! And with him, I summon Skiel Top, Skiel Attack, Skiel Guard, and Skiel Carrier to my field as well." Lester announces.

MES: 0 ATK
ST: 600 ATK
SG: 200 ATK
SC: 400 ATK
SA: 1000 ATK

"And now, Skiel Infinity gains the attack points of all the Skiel parts around him."

MES: 0 -> 2200 ATK

"So this is it, huh? This is the thing you used to bully Leo and Luna?" Ren asks with clear anger in his voice.

"Did I?" Lester mocks. "I can't remember. They must've really been weak for me to not recall something like that."

"You bastard!" Ren says through gritted teeth. "Guess I better protect myself, then. I'll place two cards face-down and end my turn."
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The First Emperor

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“My turn.” Lester draws.

Lester: 1 -> 2 SC
Ren: 1 -> 2 SC

“Ashamed you don’t have any monsters. Oh well. Skiel, flatten him by attack his life points directly.” Lester commanded.

“This is going to hurt.” You said.

“Ren! Do something!” Misty cried out to her boyfriend.

“I activate the trap card Magic Cylinder. Now Skiel’s attack goes right back at your life points instead of mine.” Ren said as Lester was hit by his own Meklord Emperor.

Lester: 4000 -> 1800

“That was close.” Akiza sighed in relief.

“And he managed to get the first damage of the duel inflicted. Score one for us.” You said.

Ren sees you all at the pit stop and gives each of you a thumbs-up before returning to the duel.

“Not bad. But I can turn that into my favor by playing the continuous trap card Infinite Aura.” Lester said.

“What’s that?” Ren wondered.

“I’m glad you asked. With this, I gain an Aura Counter for every one hundered points of damage I take.” Lester said.

AC: 0 -> 22

“Then I’ll end my turn with a face down.” Lester said.

“It seems Lester has made an advantage with that huge damage he took. I wonder what he’ll use those counters for?” The announcer wondered.

“That’s a good question. Guess there’s only one way to find out. Ren thought as he makes his move.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Team Arcadia Draws First Blood

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
Well, only one way to find out. "It's my move." Ren begins.

Ren: 3 SC
Lester: 3 SC

"And I'll summon Red-Eyes Black Chick in defense mode."

REBC: 500 DEF

"How cute. I can't wait to smash that little egg like I did those brats." Lester says with a sadistic chuckle.

"Don't let him get to you, bro." You mumble.

Ren has to bite his tongue to keep his cool and keep his anger in check as he continued. "Well unfortunately for you, my Chick is quick to hit his growth spurt, because I can tribute him to hatch from my hand my Red-Eyes Black Dragon!" Ren reveals as his monster appears.

REBD: 2400 ATK

"And now he's going to blast apart your Skiel Infinity! Go Inferno Fire Blast!" He says as he fires right at the chest of Lester's monster.

"Not so fast. I play Skiel Guard's special ability. Whenever one of my monsters is attacked, I can negate the attack once per turn." Lester cuts in as a barrier appears around his Emperor, protecting him and his monster.

"Grr. Fine, I'll end my turn." Ren wraps up.

"Is he going to be okay?" Misty asks.

"Yeah, you don't think he's going to..." Akiza starts to ask, only for you to comfort her with a hand on her shoulder.

"He'll be alright. He's been training for this to keep his anger in check." You tell her with a smile as you return to watching.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: The Black Dragon Takes Flight

1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.content:
“Time for some entertainment.” Lester draws.

Lester: 4 SC
Ren: 4 SC

“I play the trap card Sky A3. With this, I can sacrifice Skiel Attack so I can summon Skiel Attack 3.” Lester said.

SA3: 1200 ATK

“But I’m done there. I’ll sacrifice Skiel Attack 3 so I can summon Skiel Attack 5.” Lester said.

SA5: 1400 ATK

“That makes my Skiel even more stronger.” Lester said.

MES: 2600 ATK

“Now he’s stronger than my Red-Eyes!” Ren gasped.

“That’s right. But your Red-Eyes isn’t my target.” Lester said confusing Ren. “With Attack 5’s effect, all of the monsters on my field can attack you directly.”

“Oh no! Ren will lose if that happens!” You gasped.

“Time to say goodbye. Skiel, direct attack.” Lester said.

“Not quite. My trap card Negate Attack will put a stop to that.” Ren said as he’s safe and sound and you and the others sighed in relief again.

“Lucky move. I’ll end my turn. Sure hope you got more fight than those loser twins I squashed.” Lester mocked as Ren tries to keep his cool.
1311111111111111111111112111211221111111.title: Lester Keeps Pushing Ren

info.brief_description: Continuation from the other interactive story line
info.description:
